            i = s[n];

            i(...l),
            a(...l)
        } : a && (r[n] = a) : n === "style" ? r[n] = {
            ...a,
            ...i
        } : n === "className" && (r[n] = [a, i].filter(Boolean).join(" "))
    }
    return {
        ...t,
        ...r
    }
}

function VO(t) {

            },

            },

            }
        });

                        })

                };

            }

        s,

        (s = arguments[t++]) && (r = YE(s)) && (n && (n += " "), n += r);
    return n
}
const YE = t => {
    if (typeof t == "string")
        return t;
    let s,
        r = "";
    for (let n = 0; n < t.length; n++)
        t[n] && (s = YE(t[n])) && (r && (r += " "), r += s);
    return r
};
function d3(t, ...s) {
    let r,
        n,
        a,
        i = o;
    function o(c) {
        const d = s.reduce((u, m) => m(u), t());
        return r = i3(d), n = r.cache.get, a = r.cache.set, i = l, l(c)
    }
    function l(c) {
        const d = n(c);
        if (d)
            return d;
        const u = l3(c, r);
        return a(c, u), u
    }
    return function() {
        return i(c3.apply(null, arguments))
    }
}
const Wt = t => {
        const s = r => r[t] || [];
        return s.isThemeGetter = !0, s
    },
    ZE = /^\[(?:([a-z-]+):)?(.+)\]$/i,
    u3 = /^\d+\/\d+$/,
    m3 = new Set(["px", "full", "screen"]),
    h3 = /^(\d+(\.\d+)?)?(xs|sm|md|lg|xl)$/,
    f3 = /\d+(%|px|r?em|[sdl]?v([hwib]|min|max)|pt|pc|in|cm|mm|cap|ch|ex|r?lh|cq(w|h|i|b|min|max))|\b(calc|min|max|clamp)\(.+\)|^0$/,
    p3 = /^(rgba?|hsla?|hwb|(ok)?(lab|lch))\(.+\)$/,
    x3 = /^(inset_)?-?((\d+)?\.?(\d+)[a-z]+|0)_-?((\d+)?\.?(\d+)[a-z]+|0)/,
    g3 = /^(url|image|image-set|cross-fade|element|(repeating-)?(linear|radial|conic)-gradient)\(.+\)$/,
    Fa = t => rc(t) || m3.has(t) || u3.test(t),
    ki = t => Jc(t, "length", S3),
    rc = t => !!t && !Number.isNaN(Number(t)),
    Qx = t => Jc(t, "number", rc),
    gd = t => !!t && Number.isInteger(Number(t)),
    v3 = t => t.endsWith("%") && rc(t.slice(0, -1)),
    xt = t => ZE.test(t),
    Pi = t => h3.test(t),
    y3 = new Set(["length", "size", "percentage"]),
    j3 = t => Jc(t, y3, QE),
    b3 = t => Jc(t, "position", QE),
    N3 = new Set(["image", "url"]),
    w3 = t => Jc(t, N3, k3),
    C3 = t => Jc(t, "", E3),
    vd = () => !0,

        const n = ZE.exec(t);

    },

    k3 = t => g3.test(t),

function jt(t, s=!0) {

function T3(t) {

            basePrice: "0,00 €",
            iva: "0,00 €",
            totalPrice: "0,00 €",
            basePriceNum: 0,
            ivaNum: 0,
            totalPriceNum: 0
        };
    const r = s * Cp,
        n = s + r;

        }).format(s),

const z3 = ["top", "right", "bottom", "left"],
    mo = Math.min,
    sn = Math.max,
    jf = Math.round,
    sh = Math.floor,
    wa = t => ({
        x: t,
        y: t
    }),
    $3 = {
        left: "right",
        right: "left",

        top: "bottom"
    },
    V3 = {
        start: "end",
        end: "start"
    };
function _v(t, s, r) {
    return sn(t, mo(s, r))
}
function gi(t, s) {
    return typeof t == "function" ? t(s) : t
}
function vi(t) {
    return t.split("-")[0]
}
function ed(t) {
    return t.split("-")[1]
}
function zj(t) {
    return t === "x" ? "y" : "x"
}
function $j(t) {
    return t === "y" ? "height" : "width"
}
function ho(t) {
    return ["top", "bottom"].includes(vi(t)) ? "y" : "x"
}
function Vj(t) {
    return zj(ho(t))
}
function U3(t, s, r) {
    r === void 0 && (r = !1);
    const n = ed(t),
        a = Vj(t),
        i = $j(a);
    let o = a === "x" ? n === (r ? "end" : "start") ? "right" : "left" : n === "start" ? "bottom" : "top";
    return s.reference[i] > s.floating[i] && (o = bf(o)), [o, bf(o)]
}
function q3(t) {
    const s = bf(t);
    return [Tv(t), s, Tv(s)]
}
function Tv(t) {
    return t.replace(/start|end/g, s => V3[s])
}
function B3(t, s, r) {
    const n = ["left", "right"],
        a = ["right", "left"],
        i = ["top", "bottom"],
        o = ["bottom", "top"];
    switch (t) {
    case "top":
    case "bottom":
        return r ? s ? a : n : s ? n : a;
    case "left":
    case "right":
        return s ? i : o;
    default:
        return []
    }
}
function H3(t, s, r, n) {
    const a = ed(t);
    let i = B3(vi(t), r === "start", n);
    return a && (i = i.map(o => o + "-" + a), s && (i = i.concat(i.map(Tv)))), i
}
function bf(t) {
    return t.replace(/left|right|bottom|top/g, s => $3[s])
}
function W3(t) {
    return {
        top: 0,
        right: 0,
        bottom: 0,
        left: 0,
        ...t
    }
}

    return typeof t != "number" ? W3(t) : {
        top: t,
        right: t,
        bottom: t,
        left: t
    }
}
function Nf(t) {
    const {x: s, y: r, width: n, height: a} = t;
    return {
        width: n,
        height: a,
        top: r,
        left: s,
        right: s + n,
        bottom: r + a,
        x: s,
        y: r
    }
}
function dw(t, s, r) {
    let {reference: n, floating: a} = t;
    const i = ho(s),
        o = Vj(s),
        l = $j(o),
        c = vi(s),
        d = i === "y",
        u = n.x + n.width / 2 - a.width / 2,
        m = n.y + n.height / 2 - a.height / 2,
        f = n[l] / 2 - a[l] / 2;
    let y;
    switch (c) {
    case "top":
        y = {
            x: u,
            y: n.y - a.height
        };
        break;
    case "bottom":
        y = {
            x: u,
            y: n.y + n.height
        };
        break;
    case "right":
        y = {
            x: n.x + n.width,
            y: m
        };
        break;
    case "left":
        y = {
            x: n.x - a.width,
            y: m
        };
        break;
    default:
        y = {
            x: n.x,
            y: n.y
        }
    }
    switch (ed(s)) {
    case "start":
        y[o] -= f * (r && d ? -1 : 1);
        break;
    case "end":
        y[o] += f * (r && d ? -1 : 1);
        break
    }
    return y
}
const G3 = async (t, s, r) => {
    const {placement: n="bottom", strategy: a="absolute", middleware: i=[], platform: o} = r,

    let d = await o.getElementRects({
            reference: t,
            floating: s,
            strategy: a
        }),
        {x: u, y: m} = dw(d, n, c),
        f = n,
        y = {},
        g = 0;
    for (let x = 0; x < l.length; x++) {
        const {name: j, fn: v} = l[x],
            {x: p, y: b, data: N, reset: w} = await v({
                x: u,
                y: m,
                initialPlacement: n,
                placement: f,
                strategy: a,
                middlewareData: y,

                    reference: t,
                    floating: s
                }
            });
        u = p ?? u,
        m = b ?? m,

            ...y,

                ...y[j],
                ...N
            }
        },

            reference: t,
            floating: s,
            strategy: a
        }) : w.rects), {x: u, y: m} = dw(d, f, c)), x = -1)
    }
    return {
        x: u,
        y: m,
        placement: f,
        strategy: a,
        middlewareData: y
    }
};
async function ju(t, s) {
    var r;
    s === void 0 && (s = {});
    const {x: n, y: a, platform: i, rects: o, elements: l, strategy: c} = t,
        {boundary: d="clippingAncestors", rootBoundary: u="viewport", elementContext: m="floating", altBoundary: f=!1, padding: y=0} = gi(s, t),
        g = nk(y),
        j = l[f ? m === "floating" ? "reference" : "floating" : m],
        v = Nf(await i.getClippingRect({
            element: (r = await (i.isElement == null ? void 0 : i.isElement(j))) == null || r ? j : j.contextElement || await (i.getDocumentElement == null ? void 0 : i.getDocumentElement(l.floating)),
            boundary: d,
            rootBoundary: u,
            strategy: c
        })),
        p = m === "floating" ? {
            x: n,
            y: a,
            width: o.floating.width,
            height: o.floating.height
        } : o.reference,
        b = await (i.getOffsetParent == null ? void 0 : i.getOffsetParent(l.floating)),
        N = await (i.isElement == null ? void 0 : i.isElement(b)) ? await (i.getScale == null ? void 0 : i.getScale(b)) || {
            x: 1,
            y: 1
        } : {
            x: 1,
            y: 1
        },

            elements: l,

            strategy: c
        }) : p);

        top: (v.top - w.top + g.top) / N.y,
        bottom: (w.bottom - v.bottom + g.bottom) / N.y,
        left: (v.left - w.left + g.left) / N.x,
        right: (w.right - v.right + g.right) / N.x
    }
}
const K3 = t => ({
        name: "arrow",
        options: t,
        async fn(s) {
            const {x: r, y: n, placement: a, rects: i, platform: o, elements: l, middlewareData: c} = s,
                {element: d, padding: u=0} = gi(t, s) || {};
            if (d == null)
                return {};
            const m = nk(u),
                f = {
                    x: r,
                    y: n
                },
                y = Vj(a),
                g = $j(y),
                x = await o.getDimensions(d),
                j = y === "y",
                v = j ? "top" : "left",
                p = j ? "bottom" : "right",
                b = j ? "clientHeight" : "clientWidth",
                N = i.reference[g] + i.reference[y] - f[y] - i.floating[g],
                w = f[y] - i.reference[y],
                C = await (o.getOffsetParent == null ? void 0 : o.getOffsetParent(d));
            let k = C ? C[b] : 0;
            (!k || !await (o.isElement == null ? void 0 : o.isElement(C))) && (k = l.floating[b] || i.floating[g]);

                D = k / 2 - x[g] / 2 - 1,

    }),

    return typeof window < "u"
}

function al(t, s, r, n) {

function f6(t, s, r) {
    const n = Pa(s),
        a = Ia(s),

        scrollLeft: 0,

    };

function wf(t, s) {

        return !0;
    if (typeof t != typeof s)

    if (typeof t == "function" && t.toString() === s.toString())

                return !1;

            return !1;

                return !1
        }
        return !0
    }
    return t !== t && s !== s
}

function eL(t, s) {
    const r = Math.abs(s.top - t.y),
        n = Math.abs(s.bottom - t.y),
        a = Math.abs(s.right - t.x),
        i = Math.abs(s.left - t.x);
    switch (Math.min(r, n, a, i)) {
    case i:
        return "left";
    case a:
        return "right";
    case r:
        return "top";
    case n:
        return "bottom";
    default:
        throw new Error("unreachable")
    }
}
function tL(t, s, r=5) {
    const n = [];
    switch (s) {
    case "top":
        n.push({
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y + r
        }, {
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y + r
        });
        break;
    case "bottom":
        n.push({
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y - r
        }, {
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y - r
        });
        break;
    case "left":
        n.push({
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y - r
        }, {
            x: t.x + r,
            y: t.y + r
        });
        break;
    case "right":
        n.push({
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y - r
        }, {
            x: t.x - r,
            y: t.y + r
        });
        break
    }
    return n
}
function sL(t) {
    const {top: s, right: r, bottom: n, left: a} = t;
    return [{
        x: a,
        y: s
    }, {
        x: r,
        y: s
    }, {
        x: r,
        y: n
    }, {
        x: a,
        y: n
    }]
}
function rL(t, s) {
    const {x: r, y: n} = t;
    let a = !1;
    for (let i = 0, o = s.length - 1; i < s.length; o = i++) {
        const l = s[i].x,
            c = s[i].y,
            d = s[o].x,
            u = s[o].y;
        c > n != u > n && r < (d - l) * (n - c) / (u - c) + l && (a = !a)
    }
    return a
}
function nL(t) {
    const s = t.slice();
    return s.sort((r, n) => r.x < n.x ? -1 : r.x > n.x ? 1 : r.y < n.y ? -1 : r.y > n.y ? 1 : 0), aL(s)
}
function aL(t) {
    if (t.length <= 1)
        return t.slice();
    const s = [];
    for (let n = 0; n < t.length; n++) {
        const a = t[n];
        for (; s.length >= 2;) {
            const i = s[s.length - 1],
                o = s[s.length - 2];
            if ((i.x - o.x) * (a.y - o.y) >= (i.y - o.y) * (a.x - o.x))
                s.pop();
            else
                break
        }
        s.push(a)
    }
    s.pop();
    const r = [];
    for (let n = t.length - 1; n >= 0; n--) {
        const a = t[n];
        for (; r.length >= 2;) {
            const i = r[r.length - 1],
                o = r[r.length - 2];
            if ((i.x - o.x) * (a.y - o.y) >= (i.y - o.y) * (a.x - o.x))
                r.pop();
            else
                break
        }
        r.push(a)
    }
    return r.pop(), s.length === 1 && r.length === 1 && s[0].x === r[0].x && s[0].y === r[0].y ? s : s.concat(r)
}

                    status: "error"
                };

                    ...n,
                    isInvalidated: !0
                };

                return {
                    ...n,

                }
            }

            }),

function ww(t) {
    return {
        onFetch: (s, r) => {
            var u,
                m,
                f,
                y,
                g;
            const n = s.options,
                a = (f = (m = (u = s.fetchOptions) == null ? void 0 : u.meta) == null ? void 0 : m.fetchMore) == null ? void 0 : f.direction,
                i = ((y = s.state.data) == null ? void 0 : y.pages) || [],
                o = ((g = s.state.data) == null ? void 0 : g.pageParams) || [];
            let l = {
                    pages: [],
                    pageParams: []
                },
                c = 0;
            const d = async () => {
                let x = !1;
                const j = b => {
                        Object.defineProperty(b, "signal", {
                            enumerable: !0,
                            get: () => (s.signal.aborted ? x = !0 : s.signal.addEventListener("abort", () => {
                                x = !0
                            }), s.signal)
                        })
                    },
                    v = Rk(s.options, s.fetchOptions),
                    p = async (b, N, w) => {
                        if (x)
                            return Promise.reject();
                        if (N == null && b.pages.length)
                            return Promise.resolve(b);
                        const C = {
                            queryKey: s.queryKey,
                            pageParam: N,
                            direction: w ? "backward" : "forward",
                            meta: s.options.meta
                        };
                        j(C);
                        const k = await v(C),
                            {maxPages: P} = s.options,
                            D = w ? mL : uL;
                        return {
                            pages: D(b.pages, k, P),
                            pageParams: D(b.pageParams, N, P)
                        }
                    };
                if (a && i.length) {
                    const b = a === "backward",
                        N = b ? NL : Cw,
                        w = {
                            pages: i,
                            pageParams: o
                        },
                        C = N(n, w);
                    l = await p(w, C, b)
                } else {
                    const b = t ?? i.length;
                    do {
                        const N = c === 0 ? o[0] ?? n.initialPageParam : Cw(n, l);
                        if (c > 0 && N == null)
                            break;
                        l = await p(l, N),
                        c++
                    } while (c < b)
                }
                return l
            };
            s.options.persister ? s.fetchFn = () => {
                var x,
                    j;
                return (j = (x = s.options).persister) == null ? void 0 : j.call(x, d, {
                    queryKey: s.queryKey,
                    meta: s.options.meta,
                    signal: s.signal
                }, r)
            } : s.fetchFn = d
        }
    }
}
function Cw(t, {pages: s, pageParams: r}) {
    const n = s.length - 1;

function SL(t, s) {
    return $n(s.enabled, t) !== !1 && t.state.data === void 0 && !(t.state.status === "error" && s.retryOnMount === !1)
}
function Sw(t, s) {
    return SL(t, s) || t.state.data !== void 0 && Bv(t, s, s.refetchOnMount)
}
function Bv(t, s, r) {
    if ($n(s.enabled, t) !== !1) {
        const n = typeof r == "function" ? r(t) : r;
        return n === "always" || n !== !1 && Jj(t, s)
    }
    return !1
}
function Ew(t, s, r, n) {
    return (t !== s || $n(n.enabled, t) === !1) && (!r.suspense || t.state.status !== "error") && Jj(t, r)
}
function Jj(t, s) {
    return $n(s.enabled, t) !== !1 && t.isStaleByTime(ac(s.staleTime, t))
}
function EL(t, s) {
    return !Cf(t.getCurrentResult(), s)
}

async function Hk(t) {

async function Ie(t, s, r) {

        a;

        }
    } else

        a = {
            credentials: "include",
            ...s
        };

}

function e0() {
    const t = typeof (navigator == null ? void 0 : navigator.userAgent) == "string" ? navigator.userAgent : "",
        s = [];

        n = "Unknown",
        a = !0;
    if (t.indexOf("Chrome") > -1) {
        r = "Chrome";
        const i = t.match(/Chrome\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown",
        parseInt(n.split(".")[0]) < 70 && s.push("Chrome version is outdated. Some features may not work correctly.")

        r = "Firefox";
        const i = t.match(/Firefox\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown"

        r = "Edge";
        const i = t.match(/Edg\/(\d+\.\d+)/);
        n = i ? i[1] : "Unknown"
    }
    return {
        name: r,
        version: n,
        isSupported: a,
        warnings: s
    }
}
function VL(t, s) {
    try {
        if (!t || typeof s.left != "number" || isNaN(s.left)) {
            console.warn("Invalid parameters for safeScrollBy");
            return
        }
        t.scrollBy && typeof t.scrollBy == "function" ? t.scrollBy(s) : t.scrollLeft += s.left
    } catch (r) {
        console.warn("Error scrolling element:", r),
        t && typeof s.left == "number" && !isNaN(s.left) && (t.scrollLeft += s.left)
    }
}
function Gk(t, s, r, n) {
    try {
        t.addEventListener(s, r, n)
    } catch (a) {
        console.warn("Error adding event listener:", a),
        "on" + s in t && (t["on" + s] = r)
    }
}
function Kk(t, s, r, n) {
    try {
        t.removeEventListener(s, r, n)
    } catch (a) {
        console.warn("Error removing event listener:", a),
        "on" + s in t && (t["on" + s] = null)
    }
}
function Yk(t, s, r) {
    try {
        window.history && window.history.pushState ? window.history.pushState(t, s, r) : window.location.href = r
    } catch (n) {
        console.warn("Error with history.pushState:", n),
        window.location.href = r
    }
}
function Zk(t) {
    try {
        window.dispatchEvent(t)
    } catch (s) {
        console.warn("Error dispatching event:", s)
    }
}

function WL(t, {select: s=!1}={}) {

function GL(t) {

        r = _w(s, t),

function e4(t) {

        });

        s.push(r.currentNode);
    return s
}
function _w(t, s) {

function KL(t, {upTo: s}) {

}

var mz = {
    ArrowLeft: "prev",
    ArrowUp: "prev",
    ArrowRight: "next",
    ArrowDown: "next",
    PageUp: "first",
    Home: "first",
    PageDown: "last",
    End: "last"
};
function hz(t, s) {
    return s !== "rtl" ? t : t === "ArrowLeft" ? "ArrowRight" : t === "ArrowRight" ? "ArrowLeft" : t
}
function fz(t, s, r) {
    const n = hz(t.key, r);
    if (!(s === "vertical" && ["ArrowLeft", "ArrowRight"].includes(n)) && !(s === "horizontal" && ["ArrowUp", "ArrowDown"].includes(n)))
        return mz[n]
}
function $4(t, s=!1) {
    const r = document.activeElement;
    for (const n of t)
        if (n === r || (n.focus({
            preventScroll: s
        }), document.activeElement !== r))
            return
}
function pz(t, s) {
    return t.map((r, n) => t[(s + n) % t.length])
}

function cP(t) {
    return t ? "open" : "closed"
}
function Tf(t) {
    return t === "indeterminate"
}
function g0(t) {
    return Tf(t) ? "indeterminate" : t ? "checked" : "unchecked"
}
function zz(t) {
    const s = document.activeElement;
    for (const r of t)
        if (r === s || (r.focus(), document.activeElement !== s))
            return
}
function $z(t, s) {
    return t.map((r, n) => t[(s + n) % t.length])
}
function Vz(t, s, r) {
    const a = s.length > 1 && Array.from(s).every(d => d === s[0]) ? s[0] : s,
        i = r ? t.indexOf(r) : -1;
    let o = $z(t, Math.max(i, 0));
    a.length === 1 && (o = o.filter(d => d !== r));
    const c = o.find(d => d.toLowerCase().startsWith(a.toLowerCase()));
    return c !== r ? c : void 0
}
function Uz(t, s) {
    const {x: r, y: n} = t;
    let a = !1;
    for (let i = 0, o = s.length - 1; i < s.length; o = i++) {
        const l = s[i].x,
            c = s[i].y,
            d = s[o].x,
            u = s[o].y;
        c > n != u > n && r < (d - l) * (n - c) / (u - c) + l && (a = !a)
    }
    return a
}
function qz(t, s) {
    if (!s)
        return !1;
    const r = {
        x: t.clientX,
        y: t.clientY
    };
    return Uz(r, s)
}
function Cu(t) {
    return s => s.pointerType === "mouse" ? t(s) : void 0
}

function zw(t, s) {
    return t ? s ? (t.src !== s && (t.src = s), t.complete && t.naturalWidth > 0 ? "loaded" : "loading") : "error" : "idle"
}
function A8(t, {referrerPolicy: s, crossOrigin: r}) {
    const n = I8(),
        a = h.useRef(null),
        i = n ? (a.current || (a.current = new window.Image), a.current) : null,
        [o, l] = h.useState(() => zw(i, t));
    return js(() => {
        l(zw(i, t))
    }, [i, t]), js(() => {
        const c = m => () => {
            l(m)
        };
        if (!i)
            return;
        const d = c("loaded"),
            u = c("error");
        return i.addEventListener("load", d), i.addEventListener("error", u), s && (i.referrerPolicy = s), typeof r == "string" && (i.crossOrigin = r), () => {
            i.removeEventListener("load", d),
            i.removeEventListener("error", u)
        }
    }, [i, r, s]), o
}

function y$(t) {

function N0(t, s) {

        n = Object.keys(s);

            c = s[o];

    })

function Jw(t) {

function w0(t) {
    return typeof t == "number"

function ty(t) {
    return typeof t == "string"

    return Object.prototype.toString.call(t) === "[object Object]"

function Tu() {
    let t = [];
    function s(a, i, o, l={
        passive: !0
    }) {

            c = () => d.removeListener(o)
        }

    }

        t = t.filter(a => a())

}
function S$(t, s, r, n) {

        i = 1e3 / 60;

        l = 0
    }

    }
}
function E$(t, s) {

    }

    }

function cl(t=0, s=0) {
    const r = as(t - s);
    function n(d) {
        return d < t
    }
    function a(d) {
        return d > s
    }
    function i(d) {
        return n(d) || a(d)
    }
    function o(d) {
        return i(d) ? n(d) ? t : s : d
    }
    function l(d) {
        return r ? d - r * Math.ceil((d - s) / r) : d
    }

        length: r,
        max: s,
        min: t,
        constrain: o,
        reachedAny: i,
        reachedMax: a,
        reachedMin: n,
        removeOffset: l
    }
}
function d_(t, s, r) {

    }

        set: c,
        add: d,

    };
    return m
}
function k$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l, c, d, u, m, f, y, g, x, j, v, p) {

        k.clear(),
        P.clear()
    }
    function E() {
        const le = B ? r : s;
        P.add(le, "touchmove", T, C).add(le, "touchend", te).add(le, "mousemove", T, C).add(le, "mouseup", te)
    }
    function K(le) {
        const me = le.nodeName || "";
        return w.includes(me)
    }
    function re() {
        return (g ? L : W)[B ? "mouse" : "touch"]
    }
    function ye(le, me) {
        const ve = m.add(C0(le) * -1),
            lt = u.byDistance(le, !g).distance;
        return g || as(le) < D ? lt : j && me ? lt * .5 : u.byIndex(ve.get(), 0).distance
    }
    function Se(le) {
        const me = sy(le, n);
        B = me,
        R = g && me && !le.buttons && z,
        z = Qd(a.get(), o.get()) >= 2,
        !(me && le.button !== 0) && (K(le.target) || (A = !0, i.pointerDown(le), d.useFriction(0).useDuration(0), a.set(o), E(), H = i.readPoint(le), F = i.readPoint(le, b), f.emit("pointerDown")))
    }
    function T(le) {
        if (!sy(le, n) && le.touches.length >= 2)
            return te(le);
        const ve = i.readPoint(le),
            lt = i.readPoint(le, b),
            dt = Qd(ve, H),
            U = Qd(lt, F);
        if (!S && !B && (!le.cancelable || (S = dt > U, !S)))
            return te(le);
        const De = i.pointerMove(le);
        dt > x && (R = !0),
        d.useFriction(.3).useDuration(.75),
        l.start(),
        a.add(N(De)),
        le.preventDefault()
    }
    function te(le) {
        const ve = u.byDistance(0, !1).index !== m.get(),
            lt = i.pointerUp(le) * re(),
            dt = ye(N(lt), ve),
            U = N$(lt, dt),
            De = I - 10 * U,
            mt = v + U / 50;
        S = !1,
        A = !1,
        P.clear(),
        d.useDuration(De).useFriction(mt),
        c.distance(dt, !g),
        B = !1,
        f.emit("pointerUp")
    }
    function G(le) {
        R && (le.stopPropagation(), le.preventDefault(), R = !1)
    }
    function se() {
        return A
    }
    return {
        init: oe,
        destroy: O,
        pointerDown: se
    }
}
function P$(t, s) {
    let n,
        a;
    function i(m) {
        return m.timeStamp
    }
    function o(m, f) {
        const g = `client${(f || t.scroll) === "x" ? "X" : "Y"}`;
        return (sy(m, s) ? m : m.touches[0])[g]
    }
    function l(m) {
        return n = m, a = m, o(m)
    }
    function c(m) {
        const f = o(m) - o(a),
            y = i(m) - i(n) > 170;
        return a = m, y && (n = m), f
    }
    function d(m) {
        if (!n || !a)
            return 0;
        const f = o(a) - o(n),
            y = i(m) - i(n),
            g = i(m) - i(a) > 170,
            x = f / y;
        return y && !g && as(x) > .1 ? x : 0
    }
    return {
        pointerDown: l,
        pointerMove: c,
        pointerUp: d,
        readPoint: o
    }
}
function _$() {
    function t(r) {
        const {offsetTop: n, offsetLeft: a, offsetWidth: i, offsetHeight: o} = r;
        return {
            top: n,
            right: a + i,
            bottom: n + o,
            left: a,
            width: i,
            height: o
        }
    }
    return {
        measure: t
    }
}
function T$(t) {
    function s(n) {
        return t * (n / 100)
    }
    return {
        measure: s
    }
}
function A$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o) {
    const l = [t].concat(n);
    let c,
        d,
        u = [],
        m = !1;
    function f(j) {
        return a.measureSize(o.measure(j))
    }
    function y(j) {
        if (!i)
            return;
        d = f(t),
        u = n.map(f);
        function v(p) {
            for (const b of p) {
                if (m)
                    return;
                const N = b.target === t,
                    w = n.indexOf(b.target),
                    C = N ? d : u[w],
                    k = f(N ? t : n[w]);
                if (as(k - C) >= .5) {
                    j.reInit(),
                    s.emit("resize");
                    break
                }
            }
        }
        c = new ResizeObserver(p => {
            (Bp(i) || i(j, p)) && v(p)
        }),
        r.requestAnimationFrame(() => {
            l.forEach(p => c.observe(p))
        })
    }
    function g() {
        m = !0,
        c && c.disconnect()
    }
    return {
        init: y,
        destroy: g
    }
}
function M$(t, s, r, n, a, i) {
    let o = 0,
        l = 0,
        c = a,
        d = i,
        u = t.get(),
        m = 0;
    function f() {
        const C = n.get() - t.get(),
            k = !c;
        let P = 0;
        return k ? (o = 0, r.set(n), t.set(n), P = C) : (r.set(t), o += C / c, o *= d, u += o, t.add(o), P = u - m), l = C0(P), m = u, w
    }
    function y() {
        const C = n.get() - s.get();
        return as(C) < .001
    }
    function g() {
        return c
    }
    function x() {
        return l
    }
    function j() {
        return o
    }
    function v() {
        return b(a)
    }
    function p() {
        return N(i)
    }
    function b(C) {
        return c = C, w
    }
    function N(C) {
        return d = C, w
    }
    const w = {
        direction: x,
        duration: g,
        velocity: j,
        seek: f,
        settled: y,
        useBaseFriction: p,
        useBaseDuration: v,
        useFriction: N,
        useDuration: b
    };
    return w
}
function I$(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const i = a.measure(10),
        o = a.measure(50),
        l = cl(.1, .99);
    let c = !1;
    function d() {
        return !(c || !t.reachedAny(r.get()) || !t.reachedAny(s.get()))
    }
    function u(y) {
        if (!d())
            return;
        const g = t.reachedMin(s.get()) ? "min" : "max",
            x = as(t[g] - s.get()),
            j = r.get() - s.get(),
            v = l.constrain(x / o);
        r.subtract(j * v),
        !y && as(j) < i && (r.set(t.constrain(r.get())), n.useDuration(25).useBaseFriction())
    }
    function m(y) {
        c = !y
    }
    return {
        shouldConstrain: d,
        constrain: u,
        toggleActive: m
    }
}
function R$(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const i = cl(-s + t, 0),
        o = m(),
        l = u(),
        c = f();
    function d(g, x) {
        return Qd(g, x) <= 1
    }
    function u() {
        const g = o[0],
            x = Yn(o),
            j = o.lastIndexOf(g),
            v = o.indexOf(x) + 1;
        return cl(j, v)
    }
    function m() {
        return r.map((g, x) => {
            const {min: j, max: v} = i,
                p = i.constrain(g),
                b = !x,
                N = S0(r, x);
            return b ? v : N || d(j, p) ? j : d(v, p) ? v : p
        }).map(g => parseFloat(g.toFixed(3)))
    }
    function f() {
        if (s <= t + a)
            return [i.max];
        if (n === "keepSnaps")
            return o;
        const {min: g, max: x} = l;
        return o.slice(g, x)
    }
    return {
        snapsContained: c,
        scrollContainLimit: l
    }
}
function D$(t, s, r) {
    const n = s[0],
        a = r ? n - t : Yn(s);
    return {
        limit: cl(a, n)
    }
}
function O$(t, s, r, n) {
    const i = s.min + .1,
        o = s.max + .1,
        {reachedMin: l, reachedMax: c} = cl(i, o);
    function d(f) {
        return f === 1 ? c(r.get()) : f === -1 ? l(r.get()) : !1
    }
    function u(f) {
        if (!d(f))
            return;
        const y = t * (f * -1);
        n.forEach(g => g.add(y))
    }
    return {
        loop: u
    }
}
function L$(t) {
    const {max: s, length: r} = t;
    function n(i) {
        const o = i - s;
        return r ? o / -r : 0
    }
    return {
        get: n
    }
}
function F$(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const {startEdge: i, endEdge: o} = t,
        {groupSlides: l} = a,
        c = m().map(s.measure),
        d = f(),
        u = y();
    function m() {
        return l(n).map(x => Yn(x)[o] - x[0][i]).map(as)
    }
    function f() {
        return n.map(x => r[i] - x[i]).map(x => -as(x))
    }
    function y() {
        return l(d).map(x => x[0]).map((x, j) => x + c[j])
    }
    return {
        snaps: d,
        snapsAligned: u
    }
}
function z$(t, s, r, n, a, i) {
    const {groupSlides: o} = a,
        {min: l, max: c} = n,
        d = u();
    function u() {
        const f = o(i),
            y = !t || s === "keepSnaps";
        return r.length === 1 ? [i] : y ? f : f.slice(l, c).map((g, x, j) => {
            const v = !x,
                p = S0(j, x);
            if (v) {
                const b = Yn(j[0]) + 1;
                return t1(b)
            }
            if (p) {
                const b = jm(i) - Yn(j)[0] + 1;
                return t1(b, Yn(j)[0])
            }
            return g
        })
    }
    return {
        slideRegistry: d
    }
}
function $$(t, s, r, n, a) {
    const {reachedAny: i, removeOffset: o, constrain: l} = n;
    function c(g) {
        return g.concat().sort((x, j) => as(x) - as(j))[0]
    }
    function d(g) {
        const x = t ? o(g) : l(g),
            j = s.map((p, b) => ({
                diff: u(p - x, 0),
                index: b
            })).sort((p, b) => as(p.diff) - as(b.diff)),
            {index: v} = j[0];
        return {
            index: v,
            distance: x
        }
    }
    function u(g, x) {
        const j = [g, g + r, g - r];
        if (!t)
            return g;
        if (!x)
            return c(j);
        const v = j.filter(p => C0(p) === x);
        return v.length ? c(v) : Yn(j) - r
    }
    function m(g, x) {
        const j = s[g] - a.get(),
            v = u(j, x);
        return {
            index: g,
            distance: v
        }
    }
    function f(g, x) {
        const j = a.get() + g,
            {index: v, distance: p} = d(j),
            b = !t && i(j);
        if (!x || b)
            return {
                index: v,
                distance: g
            };
        const N = s[v] - p,
            w = g + u(N, 0);
        return {
            index: v,
            distance: w
        }
    }
    return {
        byDistance: f,
        byIndex: m,
        shortcut: u
    }
}
function V$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o) {
    function l(m) {
        const f = m.distance,
            y = m.index !== s.get();
        i.add(f),
        f && (n.duration() ? t.start() : (t.update(), t.render(1), t.update())),
        y && (r.set(s.get()), s.set(m.index), o.emit("select"))
    }
    function c(m, f) {
        const y = a.byDistance(m, f);
        l(y)
    }
    function d(m, f) {
        const y = s.clone().set(m),
            g = a.byIndex(y.get(), f);
        l(g)
    }
    return {
        distance: c,
        index: d
    }
}
function U$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l) {
    const c = {
        passive: !0,
        capture: !0
    };
    let d = 0;
    function u(y) {
        if (!l)
            return;
        function g(x) {
            if (new Date().getTime() - d > 10)
                return;
            o.emit("slideFocusStart"),
            t.scrollLeft = 0;
            const p = r.findIndex(b => b.includes(x));
            w0(p) && (a.useDuration(0), n.index(p, 0), o.emit("slideFocus"))
        }
        i.add(document, "keydown", m, !1),
        s.forEach((x, j) => {
            i.add(x, "focus", v => {
                (Bp(l) || l(y, v)) && g(j)
            }, c)
        })
    }
    function m(y) {
        y.code === "Tab" && (d = new Date().getTime())
    }
    return {
        init: u
    }
}
function Od(t) {
    let s = t;
    function r() {
        return s
    }
    function n(c) {
        s = o(c)
    }
    function a(c) {
        s += o(c)
    }
    function i(c) {
        s -= o(c)
    }
    function o(c) {
        return w0(c) ? c : c.get()
    }
    return {
        get: r,
        set: n,
        add: a,
        subtract: i
    }
}
function u_(t, s) {
    const r = t.scroll === "x" ? o : l,
        n = s.style;
    let a = null,
        i = !1;
    function o(f) {
        return `translate3d(${f}px,0px,0px)`
    }
    function l(f) {
        return `translate3d(0px,${f}px,0px)`
    }
    function c(f) {
        if (i)
            return;
        const y = w$(t.direction(f));
        y !== a && (n.transform = r(y), a = y)
    }
    function d(f) {
        i = !f
    }
    function u() {
        i || (n.transform = "", s.getAttribute("style") || s.removeAttribute("style"))
    }
    return {
        clear: u,
        to: c,
        toggleActive: d
    }
}
function q$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l, c) {
    const u = Pu(a),
        m = Pu(a).reverse(),
        f = v().concat(p());
    function y(k, P) {
        return k.reduce((D, W) => D - a[W], P)
    }
    function g(k, P) {
        return k.reduce((D, W) => y(D, P) > 0 ? D.concat([W]) : D, [])
    }
    function x(k) {
        return i.map((P, D) => ({
            start: P - n[D] + .5 + k,
            end: P + s - .5 + k
        }))
    }
    function j(k, P, D) {
        const W = x(P);
        return k.map(L => {
            const I = D ? 0 : -r,
                z = D ? r : 0,
                H = D ? "end" : "start",
                F = W[L][H];
            return {
                index: L,
                loopPoint: F,
                slideLocation: Od(-1),
                translate: u_(t, c[L]),
                target: () => l.get() > F ? I : z
            }
        })
    }
    function v() {
        const k = o[0],
            P = g(m, k);
        return j(P, r, !1)
    }
    function p() {
        const k = s - o[0] - 1,
            P = g(u, k);
        return j(P, -r, !0)
    }
    function b() {
        return f.every(({index: k}) => {
            const P = u.filter(D => D !== k);
            return y(P, s) <= .1
        })
    }
    function N() {
        f.forEach(k => {
            const {target: P, translate: D, slideLocation: W} = k,
                L = P();
            L !== W.get() && (D.to(L), W.set(L))
        })
    }
    function w() {
        f.forEach(k => k.translate.clear())
    }
    return {
        canLoop: b,
        clear: w,
        loop: N,
        loopPoints: f
    }
}
function B$(t, s, r) {
    let n,
        a = !1;
    function i(c) {
        if (!r)
            return;
        function d(u) {
            for (const m of u)
                if (m.type === "childList") {
                    c.reInit(),
                    s.emit("slidesChanged");
                    break
                }
        }
        n = new MutationObserver(u => {
            a || (Bp(r) || r(c, u)) && d(u)
        }),
        n.observe(t, {
            childList: !0
        })
    }
    function o() {
        n && n.disconnect(),
        a = !0
    }
    return {
        init: i,
        destroy: o
    }
}
function H$(t, s, r, n) {
    const a = {};
    let i = null,
        o = null,
        l,
        c = !1;
    function d() {
        l = new IntersectionObserver(g => {
            c || (g.forEach(x => {
                const j = s.indexOf(x.target);
                a[j] = x
            }), i = null, o = null, r.emit("slidesInView"))
        }, {
            root: t.parentElement,
            threshold: n
        }),
        s.forEach(g => l.observe(g))
    }
    function u() {
        l && l.disconnect(),
        c = !0
    }
    function m(g) {
        return _u(a).reduce((x, j) => {
            const v = parseInt(j),
                {isIntersecting: p} = a[v];
            return (g && p || !g && !p) && x.push(v), x
        }, [])
    }
    function f(g=!0) {
        if (g && i)
            return i;
        if (!g && o)
            return o;
        const x = m(g);
        return g && (i = x), g || (o = x), x
    }
    return {
        init: d,
        destroy: u,
        get: f
    }
}
function W$(t, s, r, n, a, i) {
    const {measureSize: o, startEdge: l, endEdge: c} = t,
        d = r[0] && a,
        u = g(),
        m = x(),
        f = r.map(o),
        y = j();
    function g() {
        if (!d)
            return 0;
        const p = r[0];
        return as(s[l] - p[l])
    }
    function x() {
        if (!d)
            return 0;
        const p = i.getComputedStyle(Yn(n));
        return parseFloat(p.getPropertyValue(`margin-${c}`))
    }
    function j() {
        return r.map((p, b, N) => {
            const w = !b,
                C = S0(N, b);
            return w ? f[b] + u : C ? f[b] + m : N[b + 1][l] - p[l]
        }).map(as)
    }
    return {
        slideSizes: f,
        slideSizesWithGaps: y,
        startGap: u,
        endGap: m
    }
}
function G$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o, l, c) {
    const {startEdge: d, endEdge: u, direction: m} = t,
        f = w0(r);
    function y(v, p) {
        return Pu(v).filter(b => b % p === 0).map(b => v.slice(b, b + p))
    }
    function g(v) {
        return v.length ? Pu(v).reduce((p, b, N) => {
            const w = Yn(p) || 0,
                C = w === 0,
                k = b === jm(v),
                P = a[d] - i[w][d],
                D = a[d] - i[b][u],
                W = !n && C ? m(o) : 0,
                L = !n && k ? m(l) : 0,
                I = as(D - L - (P + W));
            return N && I > s + c && p.push(b), k && p.push(v.length), p
        }, []).map((p, b, N) => {
            const w = Math.max(N[b - 1] || 0);
            return v.slice(w, p)
        }) : []
    }
    function x(v) {
        return f ? y(v, r) : g(v)
    }
    return {
        groupSlides: x
    }
}
function K$(t, s, r, n, a, i, o) {
    const {align: l, axis: c, direction: d, startIndex: u, loop: m, duration: f, dragFree: y, dragThreshold: g, inViewThreshold: x, slidesToScroll: j, skipSnaps: v, containScroll: p, watchResize: b, watchSlides: N, watchDrag: w, watchFocus: C} = i,
        k = 2,
        P = _$(),
        D = P.measure(s),
        W = r.map(P.measure),
        L = E$(c, d),
        I = L.measureSize(D),
        z = T$(I),
        H = C$(l, I),
        F = !m && !!p,
        A = m || !!p,
        {slideSizes: S, slideSizesWithGaps: R, startGap: B, endGap: oe} = W$(L, D, W, r, A, a),
        O = G$(L, I, j, m, D, W, B, oe, k),
        {snaps: E, snapsAligned: K} = F$(L, H, D, W, O),
        re = -Yn(E) + Yn(R),
        {snapsContained: ye, scrollContainLimit: Se} = R$(I, re, K, p, k),
        T = F ? ye : K,
        {limit: te} = D$(re, T, m),
        G = d_(jm(T), u, m),
        se = G.clone(),
        de = Pu(r),
        le = ({dragHandler: Pt, scrollBody: $t, scrollBounds: Qr, options: {loop: xe}}) => {
            xe || Qr.constrain(Pt.pointerDown()),
            $t.seek()
        },
        me = ({scrollBody: Pt, translate: $t, location: Qr, offsetLocation: xe, previousLocation: ht, scrollLooper: Ot, slideLooper: Mn, dragHandler: Eo, animation: El, eventHandler: ko, scrollBounds: kl, options: {loop: Rm}}, Si) => {
            const Dm = Pt.settled(),
                fx = !kl.shouldConstrain(),
                us = Rm ? Dm : Dm && fx,
                Da = us && !Eo.pointerDown();
            Da && El.stop();
            const px = Qr.get() * Si + ht.get() * (1 - Si);
            xe.set(px),
            Rm && (Ot.loop(Pt.direction()), Mn.loop()),
            $t.to(xe.get()),
            Da && ko.emit("settle"),
            us || ko.emit("scroll")
        },
        ve = S$(n, a, () => le(Be), Pt => me(Be, Pt)),
        lt = .68,
        dt = T[G.get()],
        U = Od(dt),
        De = Od(dt),
        mt = Od(dt),
        zt = Od(dt),
        Mt = M$(U, mt, De, zt, f, lt),
        _ = $$(m, T, re, te, zt),
        Q = V$(ve, G, se, Mt, _, zt, o),
        ie = L$(te),
        we = Tu(),
        be = H$(s, r, o, x),
        {slideRegistry: J} = z$(F, p, T, Se, O, de),
        je = U$(t, r, J, Q, Mt, we, o, C),
        Be = {
            ownerDocument: n,
            ownerWindow: a,
            eventHandler: o,
            containerRect: D,
            slideRects: W,
            animation: ve,
            axis: L,
            dragHandler: k$(L, t, n, a, zt, P$(L, a), U, ve, Q, Mt, _, G, o, z, y, g, v, lt, w),
            eventStore: we,
            percentOfView: z,
            index: G,
            indexPrevious: se,
            limit: te,
            location: U,
            offsetLocation: mt,
            previousLocation: De,
            options: i,
            resizeHandler: A$(s, o, a, r, L, b, P),
            scrollBody: Mt,
            scrollBounds: I$(te, mt, zt, Mt, z),
            scrollLooper: O$(re, te, mt, [U, mt, De, zt]),
            scrollProgress: ie,
            scrollSnapList: T.map(ie.get),
            scrollSnaps: T,
            scrollTarget: _,
            scrollTo: Q,
            slideLooper: q$(L, I, re, S, R, E, T, mt, r),
            slideFocus: je,
            slidesHandler: B$(s, o, N),
            slidesInView: be,
            slideIndexes: de,
            slideRegistry: J,
            slidesToScroll: O,
            target: zt,
            translate: u_(L, s)
        };
    return Be
}
function Y$() {
    let t = {},
        s;
    function r(d) {
        s = d
    }
    function n(d) {
        return t[d] || []
    }
    function a(d) {
        return n(d).forEach(u => u(s, d)), c
    }
    function i(d, u) {
        return t[d] = n(d).concat([u]), c
    }
    function o(d, u) {
        return t[d] = n(d).filter(m => m !== u), c
    }
    function l() {
        t = {}
    }
    const c = {
        init: r,
        emit: a,
        off: o,
        on: i,
        clear: l
    };
    return c
}
const Z$ = {
    align: "center",
    axis: "x",
    container: null,
    slides: null,
    containScroll: "trimSnaps",
    direction: "ltr",
    slidesToScroll: 1,
    inViewThreshold: 0,
    breakpoints: {},
    dragFree: !1,
    dragThreshold: 10,
    loop: !1,
    skipSnaps: !1,
    duration: 25,
    startIndex: 0,
    active: !0,
    watchDrag: !0,
    watchResize: !0,
    watchSlides: !0,
    watchFocus: !0
};
function Q$(t) {
    function s(i, o) {
        return c_(i, o || {})
    }
    function r(i) {
        const o = i.breakpoints || {},
            l = _u(o).filter(c => t.matchMedia(c).matches).map(c => o[c]).reduce((c, d) => s(c, d), {});
        return s(i, l)
    }
    function n(i) {
        return i.map(o => _u(o.breakpoints || {})).reduce((o, l) => o.concat(l), []).map(t.matchMedia)
    }
    return {
        mergeOptions: s,
        optionsAtMedia: r,
        optionsMediaQueries: n
    }
}
function X$(t) {
    let s = [];
    function r(i, o) {
        return s = o.filter(({options: l}) => t.optionsAtMedia(l).active !== !1), s.forEach(l => l.init(i, t)), o.reduce((l, c) => Object.assign(l, {
            [c.name]: c
        }), {})
    }
    function n() {
        s = s.filter(i => i.destroy())
    }
    return {
        init: r,
        destroy: n
    }
}
function If(t, s, r) {
    const n = t.ownerDocument,
        a = n.defaultView,
        i = Q$(a),
        o = X$(i),
        l = Tu(),
        c = Y$(),
        {mergeOptions: d, optionsAtMedia: u, optionsMediaQueries: m} = i,
        {on: f, off: y, emit: g} = c,
        x = L;
    let j = !1,
        v,
        p = d(Z$, If.globalOptions),
        b = d(p),
        N = [],
        w,
        C,
        k;
    function P() {
        const {container: de, slides: le} = b;
        C = (ty(de) ? t.querySelector(de) : de) || t.children[0];
        const ve = ty(le) ? C.querySelectorAll(le) : le;
        k = [].slice.call(ve || C.children)
    }
    function D(de) {
        const le = K$(t, C, k, n, a, de, c);
        if (de.loop && !le.slideLooper.canLoop()) {
            const me = Object.assign({}, de, {
                loop: !1
            });
            return D(me)
        }
        return le
    }
    function W(de, le) {
        j || (p = d(p, de), b = u(p), N = le || N, P(), v = D(b), m([p, ...N.map(({options: me}) => me)]).forEach(me => l.add(me, "change", L)), b.active && (v.translate.to(v.location.get()), v.animation.init(), v.slidesInView.init(), v.slideFocus.init(se), v.eventHandler.init(se), v.resizeHandler.init(se), v.slidesHandler.init(se), v.options.loop && v.slideLooper.loop(), C.offsetParent && k.length && v.dragHandler.init(se), w = o.init(se, N)))
    }
    function L(de, le) {
        const me = O();
        I(),
        W(d({
            startIndex: me
        }, de), le),
        c.emit("reInit")
    }
    function I() {
        v.dragHandler.destroy(),
        v.eventStore.clear(),
        v.translate.clear(),
        v.slideLooper.clear(),
        v.resizeHandler.destroy(),
        v.slidesHandler.destroy(),
        v.slidesInView.destroy(),
        v.animation.destroy(),
        o.destroy(),
        l.clear()
    }
    function z() {
        j || (j = !0, l.clear(), I(), c.emit("destroy"), c.clear())
    }
    function H(de, le, me) {
        !b.active || j || (v.scrollBody.useBaseFriction().useDuration(le === !0 ? 0 : b.duration), v.scrollTo.index(de, me || 0))
    }
    function F(de) {
        const le = v.index.add(1).get();
        H(le, de, -1)
    }
    function A(de) {
        const le = v.index.add(-1).get();
        H(le, de, 1)
    }
    function S() {
        return v.index.add(1).get() !== O()
    }
    function R() {
        return v.index.add(-1).get() !== O()
    }
    function B() {
        return v.scrollSnapList
    }
    function oe() {
        return v.scrollProgress.get(v.offsetLocation.get())
    }
    function O() {
        return v.index.get()
    }
    function E() {
        return v.indexPrevious.get()
    }
    function K() {
        return v.slidesInView.get()
    }
    function re() {
        return v.slidesInView.get(!1)
    }
    function ye() {
        return w
    }
    function Se() {
        return v
    }
    function T() {
        return t
    }
    function te() {
        return C
    }
    function G() {
        return k
    }
    const se = {
        canScrollNext: S,
        canScrollPrev: R,
        containerNode: te,
        internalEngine: Se,
        destroy: z,
        off: y,
        on: f,
        emit: g,
        plugins: ye,
        previousScrollSnap: E,
        reInit: x,
        rootNode: T,
        scrollNext: F,
        scrollPrev: A,
        scrollProgress: oe,
        scrollSnapList: B,
        scrollTo: H,
        selectedScrollSnap: O,
        slideNodes: G,
        slidesInView: K,
        slidesNotInView: re
    };
    return W(s, r), setTimeout(() => c.emit("init"), 0), se
}
If.globalOptions = void 0;
function E0(t={}, s=[]) {
    const r = h.useRef(t),
        n = h.useRef(s),
        [a, i] = h.useState(),
        [o, l] = h.useState(),
        c = h.useCallback(() => {
            a && a.reInit(r.current, n.current)
        }, [a]);
    return h.useEffect(() => {
        N0(r.current, t) || (r.current = t, c())
    }, [t, c]), h.useEffect(() => {
        b$(n.current, s) || (n.current = s, c())
    }, [s, c]), h.useEffect(() => {
        if (j$() && o) {
            If.globalOptions = E0.globalOptions;
            const d = If(o, r.current, n.current);
            return i(d), () => d.destroy()
        } else
            i(void 0)
    }, [o, i]), [l, a]
}
E0.globalOptions = void 0;
const m_ = h.createContext(null);
function Hp() {
    const t = h.useContext(m_);
    if (!t)
        throw new Error("useCarousel must be used within a <Carousel />");
    return t
}
const Rc = h.forwardRef(({orientation: t="horizontal", opts: s, setApi: r, plugins: n, className: a, children: i, ...o}, l) => {
    const [c, d] = E0({
            ...s,
            axis: t === "horizontal" ? "x" : "y"
        }, n),
        [u, m] = h.useState(!1),
        [f, y] = h.useState(!1),
        g = h.useCallback(p => {
            p && (m(p.canScrollPrev()), y(p.canScrollNext()))
        }, []),
        x = h.useCallback(() => {
            d == null || d.scrollPrev()
        }, [d]),
        j = h.useCallback(() => {
            d == null || d.scrollNext()
        }, [d]),
        v = h.useCallback(p => {
            p.key === "ArrowLeft" ? (p.preventDefault(), x()) : p.key === "ArrowRight" && (p.preventDefault(), j())
        }, [x, j]);
    return h.useEffect(() => {
        !d || !r || r(d)
    }, [d, r]), h.useEffect(() => {
        if (d)
            return g(d), d.on("reInit", g), d.on("select", g), () => {
                d == null || d.off("select", g)
            }
    }, [d, g]), e.jsx(m_.Provider, {
        value: {
            carouselRef: c,
            api: d,
            opts: s,
            orientation: t || ((s == null ? void 0 : s.axis) === "y" ? "vertical" : "horizontal"),
            scrollPrev: x,
            scrollNext: j,
            canScrollPrev: u,
            canScrollNext: f
        },
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            ref: l,
            onKeyDownCapture: v,
            className: ue("relative", a),
            role: "region",
            "aria-roledescription": "carousel",
            ...o,
            children: i
        })
    })
});

const Wp = {
        getVehicles: async t => {
            const s = new URLSearchParams;
            t != null && t.limit && s.append("limit", t.limit.toString()),
            t != null && t.offset && s.append("offset", t.offset.toString()),
            t != null && t.marca && s.append("marca", t.marca),
            t != null && t.modelo && s.append("modelo", t.modelo),
            t != null && t.anyo && s.append("anyo", t.anyo.toString()),
            t != null && t.search && s.append("search", t.search),
            t != null && t.withPartCounts && s.append("withPartCounts", "true"),
            t != null && t.activePartCounts && s.append("activePartCounts", "true"),
            t != null && t.idLocal && s.append("idLocal", t.idLocal.toString());
            const r = `/api/vehicles?${s.toString()}`;
            return await (await Ie("GET", r)).json()
        },
        getVehicleById: async (t, s) => {
            const r = (s == null ? void 0 : s.soloActivas) !== !1,
                n = `/api/vehicles/${t}?soloActivas=${r}`;
            return await (await Ie("GET", n)).json()
        },
        searchVehicles: async t => await (await Ie("GET", `/api/vehicles/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(t)}`)).json(),
        getAll: async t => Wp.getVehicles(t),
        updateVehicle: async (t, s) => await (await Ie("PUT", `/api/vehicles/${t}`, s)).json(),
        deleteVehicle: async t => await (await Ie("DELETE", `/api/vehicles/${t}`)).json(),
        deleteAllVehicles: async () => await (await Ie("DELETE", "/api/vehicles/all/delete")).json()
    },
    k0 = {
        getParts: async t => {
            const s = new URLSearchParams;
            t != null && t.limit && s.append("limit", t.limit.toString()),
            t != null && t.offset && s.append("offset", t.offset.toString()),
            t != null && t.vehicleId && s.append("vehicleId", t.vehicleId.toString()),
            t != null && t.familia && s.append("familia", t.familia),
            (t == null ? void 0 : t.activo) !== void 0 && s.append("activo", t.activo.toString());

            return await (await Ie("GET", r)).json()
        },
        getPartById: async (t, s) => {
            let r = `/api/parts/${t}`;
            const n = new URLSearchParams;
            return s != null && s.isAdmin && n.append("isAdmin", "true"), s != null && s.filterBrand && n.append("filterBrand", s.filterBrand), n.toString() && (r += `?${n.toString()}`), await (await Ie("GET", r)).json()
        },
        searchParts: async t => await (await Ie("GET", `/api/parts/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(t)}`)).json(),
        getAll: async t => k0.getParts(t),
        searchPartsAdvanced: async (t, s) => {
            const r = new URLSearchParams;
            r.append("q", t),
            s != null && s.limit && r.append("limit", s.limit.toString()),
            s != null && s.offset && r.append("offset", s.offset.toString()),
            (s == null ? void 0 : s.activo) !== void 0 && r.append("activo", s.activo.toString());

            return await (await Ie("GET", n)).json()
        },

        deletePart: async t => await (await Ie("DELETE", `/api/parts/${t}`)).json(),
        deleteAllParts: async () => await (await Ie("DELETE", "/api/parts/all/delete")).json(),
        getBrandsAndModels: async (t={}) => {
            try {
                const s = new URLSearchParams;
                t.marca && t.marca !== "all-brands" && s.append("marca", t.marca),
                t.modelo && t.modelo !== "all-models" && s.append("modelo", t.modelo);
                const r = `/api/parts/brands-models?${s}`,
                    n = await fetch(r, {
                        method: "GET",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        }
                    });
                if (!n.ok) {
                    const i = await n.text();
                    throw new Error(`Failed to fetch brands and models: ${n.status} ${i}`)
                }
                return await n.json()
            } catch (s) {
                throw s
            }
        }
    },
    Fc = {
        async getConfig() {
            const t = await fetch("/api/config");
            if (!t.ok)
                throw new Error(`Error ${t.status}: ${t.statusText}`);
            return t.json()
        },
        async updateConfig(t) {
            try {
                const s = await fetch("/api/config", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(t)
                    }),
                    r = await s.json();
                if (!s.ok)
                    throw new Error(r.error || r.details || `Error HTTP ${s.status}`);
                if (!r.success)
                    throw new Error(r.error || "La operación no fue exitosa");
                return r
            } catch (s) {
                throw s.name === "TypeError" && s.message.includes("fetch") ? new Error("Error de conexión con el servidor") : s
            }
        },
        async getChatbotConfig() {
            const t = await fetch("/api/config/chatbot");
            if (!t.ok)
                throw new Error(`Error ${t.status}: ${t.statusText}`);
            return t.json()
        },
        async updateChatbotCode(t) {
            try {
                const s = await fetch("/api/config/chatbot", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            chatbotCode: t
                        })
                    }),
                    r = await s.json();
                if (!s.ok)
                    throw new Error(r.error || r.details || `Error HTTP ${s.status}`);
                return r
            } catch (s) {
                throw s.name === "TypeError" && s.message.includes("fetch") ? new Error("Error de conexión con el servidor") : s
            }
        }
    },
    ss = {
        getHistory: async t => {
            const s = t ? `/api/import/history?limit=${t}` : "/api/import/history";

                return await t.json()
            } catch (t) {
                throw t
            }
        },
        async getImportStatus(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/import/${t}`, {
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok)
                throw new Error("Error al obtener estado de importación");
            return s.json()
        },

                },

            });

            return t.json()
        },
        async controlImport(t, s) {

                method: "POST",
                credentials: "include"

        },

                method: "PUT",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include",
                body: JSON.stringify(s)
            });
            if (!r.ok)
                throw new Error("Error al actualizar programación");
            return r.json()
        },
        async pauseImportOperation(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/metasync-optimized/import/${t}/pause`, {
                method: "POST",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok)
                throw new Error("Error al pausar importación");
            return s.json()
        },
        async resumeImportOperation(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/metasync-optimized/import/${t}/resume`, {
                method: "POST",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok)
                throw new Error("Error al reanudar importación");
            return s.json()
        },
        async cancelImportOperation(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/metasync-optimized/import/${t}/cancel`, {
                method: "POST",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok)
                throw new Error("Error al cancelar importación");
            return s.json()
        },
        async deleteImportFromHistory(t) {
            const s = await fetch(`/api/import/${t}`, {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!s.ok) {
                const n = await s.json().catch(() => ({
                    message: "Error desconocido"
                }));
                throw new Error(n.message || "Error al eliminar importación del historial")
            }
            const r = await s.text();
            if (!r || r.trim() === "")
                return {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Importación eliminada correctamente"
                };
            try {
                return JSON.parse(r)
            } catch (n) {
                return console.error("Error parsing JSON response:", n, "Response text:", r), {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Importación eliminada correctamente"
                }
            }
        },
        async deleteAllImportHistory() {
            const t = await fetch("/api/import/clear-all", {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!t.ok) {
                const r = await t.json().catch(() => ({
                    message: "Error desconocido"
                }));
                throw new Error(r.message || "Error al eliminar todo el historial de importaciones")
            }
            const s = await t.text();
            if (!s || s.trim() === "")
                return {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Historial eliminado correctamente"
                };
            try {
                return JSON.parse(s)
            } catch (r) {
                return console.error("Error parsing JSON response:", r, "Response text:", s), {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Historial eliminado correctamente"
                }
            }
        },
        async clearImportStatistics() {
            const t = await fetch("/api/import/history/stats", {
                method: "DELETE",
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                credentials: "include"
            });
            if (!t.ok) {
                const r = await t.json().catch(() => ({
                    message: "Error desconocido"
                }));
                throw new Error(r.message || "Error al limpiar estadísticas de importación")
            }
            const s = await t.text();
            if (!s || s.trim() === "")
                return {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Estadísticas limpiadas correctamente"
                };
            try {
                return JSON.parse(s)
            } catch (r) {
                return console.error("Error parsing JSON response:", r, "Response text:", s), {
                    success: !0,
                    message: "Estadísticas limpiadas correctamente"
                }
            }
        }
    },
    Xd = {
        runDiagnostic: async () => await (await Ie("GET", "/api/diagnostic")).json(),
        testApiEndpoint: async t => await (await Ie("POST", "/api/raw/test-metasync", t)).json(),
        checkCounts: async () => {
            var n,
                a,
                i,
                o,
                l,
                c;
            const t = await Xd.testApiEndpoint({
                    method: "ConteoVehiculosEmpresa",
                    fecha: "01/01/2000 00:00:00",
                    idempresa: 1476
                }),
                s = await Xd.testApiEndpoint({
                    method: "ConteoPiezasEmpresa",
                    fecha: "01/01/2000 00:00:00",
                    idempresa: 1476
                }),
                r = await Xd.testApiEndpoint({
                    method: "RecuperarCambiosCanalEmpresa",
                    fecha: "01/01/2000 00:00:00",
                    lastid: "0",
                    offset: "1000",
                    idempresa: 1476
                });
            return {
                vehicleCount: t.success && ((n = t.data) == null ? void 0 : n.total) || 0,
                partCount: s.success && ((a = s.data) == null ? void 0 : a.total) || 0,
                vehiclesRetrieved: r.success && ((o = (i = r.data) == null ? void 0 : i.vehiculos) == null ? void 0 : o.length) || 0,
                partsRetrieved: r.success && ((c = (l = r.data) == null ? void 0 : l.piezas) == null ? void 0 : c.length) || 0,
                timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
            }
        }
    };

    return Math.min(r, Math.max(s, t))
}

    ay = "SelectViewport",
    C_ = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {

            children: [e.jsx("style", {
                dangerouslySetInnerHTML: {
                    __html: "[data-radix-select-viewport]{scrollbar-width:none;-ms-overflow-style:none;-webkit-overflow-scrolling:touch;}[data-radix-select-viewport]::-webkit-scrollbar{display:none}"

            }), e.jsx(Gp.Slot, {
                scope: r,

                        const u = d.currentTarget,

                            const y = Math.abs(c.current - u.scrollTop);

                                    j = parseFloat(m.style.height),
                                    v = Math.max(x, j);

                                    const p = v + y,
                                        b = Math.min(g, p),
                                        N = p - b;

                    })

            })]

function z_(t) {

        }, []);
    return h.useEffect(() => () => window.clearTimeout(n.current), []), [r, a, i]

function $_(t, s, r) {
    const a = s.length > 1 && Array.from(s).every(d => d === s[0]) ? s[0] : s,
        i = r ? t.indexOf(r) : -1;
    let o = vV(t, Math.max(i, 0));
    a.length === 1 && (o = o.filter(d => d !== r));
    const c = o.find(d => d.textValue.toLowerCase().startsWith(a.toLowerCase()));
    return c !== r ? c : void 0
}
function vV(t, s) {
    return t.map((r, n) => t[(s + n) % t.length])
}

const PV = () => {
        const [, t] = ut(),
            [s, r] = h.useState("all-brands"),
            [n, a] = h.useState("all-models"),
            [i, o] = h.useState("all-families"),
            [l, c] = h.useState(""),
            {data: d, error: u, isLoading: m} = _e({
                queryKey: ["parts-brands-models"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        return await k0.getBrandsAndModels()
                    } catch (x) {
                        throw x
                    }
                },
                staleTime: 10 * 60 * 1e3,
                retry: 3
            }),
            f = h.useMemo(() => d != null && d.brands ? d.brands.sort() : [], [d]);
        _e({
            queryKey: ["parts-brands-models", s, n],
            queryFn: () => fetch(`/api/parts/brands-models?marca=${s || "all-brands"}&modelo=${n || "all-models"}`).then(x => x.json()),
            staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1e3
        });
        const {data: y} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/parts/families", s, n],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        const x = new URLSearchParams;
                        s && s !== "all-brands" && x.append("marca", s),
                        n && n !== "all-models" && x.append("modelo", n);
                        const j = `/api/optimized/parts/families?${x.toString()}`,
                            v = await fetch(j);
                        if (!v.ok)
                            throw new Error(`Error ${v.status}: ${v.statusText}`);
                        const p = await v.json();
                        if (Array.isArray(p) && p.length > 0 && typeof p[0] == "object" && p[0].name)
                            return p.map(C => C.name).sort();
                        if (Array.isArray(p) && p.length > 0 && typeof p[0] == "string")
                            return p.sort();
                        const b = new URLSearchParams;
                        b.append("limit", "2000"),
                        b.append("activo", "true"),
                        s && s !== "all-brands" && b.append("marca", s),
                        n && n !== "all-models" && b.append("modelo", n);
                        const w = await (await fetch(`/api/parts?${b.toString()}`)).json();
                        return Array.from(new Set(w.data.map(C => C.descripcionFamilia).filter(Boolean))).sort()
                    } catch {
                        return []
                    }
                },
                staleTime: 3e4
            }),
            g = x => {
                x.preventDefault();
                const j = new URLSearchParams;
                l.trim() && j.append("search", l.trim()),
                s && s !== "all-brands" && s !== "" && j.append("marca", s),
                n && n !== "all-models" && n !== "" && j.append("modelo", n),
                i && i !== "all-families" && i !== "" && j.append("familia", i);
                const v = `/piezas?${j.toString()}`;
                t(v)
            };
        return e.jsx("section", {
            className: "relative",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "min-h-[28rem] sm:min-h-[32rem] bg-center bg-cover py-8 sm:py-12 md:py-20 hero-background",
                style: {
                    backgroundImage: "url('https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503376780353-7e6692767b70?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1920&h=700')",
                    backgroundPosition: "center center"
                },
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-r from-primary/95 via-primary/85 to-primary/70 sm:from-primary/90 sm:to-primary/50 md:from-primary/80 md:to-transparent"
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "relative z-10 flex min-h-[28rem] sm:min-h-[32rem] items-center",
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "container mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6",
                        children: e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "max-w-xl lg:max-w-2xl",
                            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                                className: "text-xl sm:text-2xl md:text-3xl lg:text-4xl font-montserrat font-bold text-white mb-3 sm:mb-4 leading-tight text-center sm:text-left",
                                children: "Encuentra las piezas que necesitas"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm sm:text-base md:text-lg text-white mb-6 md:mb-8 leading-relaxed text-center sm:text-left",
                                children: "Miles de piezas originales de vehículos con garantía y al mejor precio"
                            }), e.jsx($, {
                                className: "shadow-lg bg-white/95 backdrop-blur-sm",

                                    className: "p-3 sm:p-4 md:p-6",

                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {

function Z_(t) {
    return t ? t.toLowerCase().trim().replace(/[áàäâã]/g, "a").replace(/[éèëê]/g, "e").replace(/[íìïî]/g, "i").replace(/[óòöôõ]/g, "o").replace(/[úùüû]/g, "u").replace(/[ñ]/g, "n").replace(/[ç]/g, "c").replace(/[^a-z0-9\s-]/g, "").replace(/\s+/g, "-").replace(/-+/g, "-").replace(/^-|-$/g, "") : ""
}
function cy(t) {
    return `/piezas/${Z_(`${t.descripcionArticulo} ${t.vehicleMarca} ${t.vehicleModelo}`)}-${t.id}`
}
function Au(t) {
    const s = t.anyo ? `-${t.anyo}` : "";
    return `/vehiculos/${Z_(`${t.marca} ${t.modelo}${s}`)}-${t.id}`
}
function Q_(t) {
    const s = t.match(/-(\d+)$/);
    return s ? parseInt(s[1]) : null
}

        })
    };
function DV({category: t}) {
    const [s, r] = h.useState("grid"),
        {data: n, isLoading: a, error: i} = _e({
            queryKey: ["category-parts", t],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const l = new URLSearchParams;
                l.set("familia", t),
                l.set("activo", "true"),
                l.set("limit", "8"),
                l.set("offset", "0"),
                l.set("getTotalCount", "true"),
                l.set("orden", "newest");
                const c = `/api/search-parts?${l.toString()}`,
                    d = await fetch(c);
                if (!d.ok)
                    throw new Error(`Error ${d.status}: ${d.statusText}`);
                const u = await d.json(),
                    m = (u == null ? void 0 : u.data) || [];
                return m.length > 0, m
            },
            staleTime: 24e5,
            gcTime: 72e5,
            refetchOnWindowFocus: !1,
            retry: 1
        }),
        o = n || [];
    return e.jsx(e.Fragment, {
        children: a ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6",
            children: [...Array(8)].map((l, c) => e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-white rounded-lg shadow-md p-4 animate-pulse",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-40 bg-gray-200 rounded mb-4"
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-3",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-3/4"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-3 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-1/2"
                    })]
                })]
            }, c))
        }) : i ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "text-center py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-red-50 border border-red-200 rounded-lg p-6",
                children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                    className: "text-lg font-medium text-red-900 mb-2",
                    children: "Error al cargar piezas"
                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                    className: "text-red-700",
                    children: ["No se pudieron cargar las piezas de ", t]
                })]
            })
        }) : o.length > 0 ? s === "grid" ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6",
            children: o.map(l => e.jsx(ul, {
                part: l
            }, l.id || l.refLocal))
        }) : e.jsx("div", {
            className: "space-y-4",
            children: o.map(l => e.jsx(ul, {
                part: l
            }, l.id || l.refLocal))
        }) : e.jsx("div", {
            className: "text-center py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-gray-50 border border-gray-200 rounded-lg p-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("h3", {
                    className: "text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2",
                    children: ["No hay piezas disponibles en ", t]
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600 mb-4",
                    children: "Esta categoría no tiene piezas disponibles en este momento."
                })]
            })
        })
    })
}

            retry: 1
        }),

                } catch (u) {
