ji.create = t => new ji({
    typeName: nt.ZodNever,
    ...pt(t)
});
class Bf extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        if (this._getType(s) !== Le.undefined) {
            const n = this._getOrReturnCtx(s);
            return Me(n, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.void,
                received: n.parsedType
            }), it
        }
        return Pr(s.data)
    }
}
Bf.create = t => new Bf({
    typeName: nt.ZodVoid,
    ...pt(t)
});
class Zn extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {ctx: r, status: n} = this._processInputParams(s),
            a = this._def;
        if (r.parsedType !== Le.array)
            return Me(r, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.array,
                received: r.parsedType
            }), it;
        if (a.exactLength !== null) {
            const o = r.data.length > a.exactLength.value,
                l = r.data.length < a.exactLength.value;
            (o || l) && (Me(r, {
                code: o ? Ce.too_big : Ce.too_small,
                minimum: l ? a.exactLength.value : void 0,
                maximum: o ? a.exactLength.value : void 0,
                type: "array",
                inclusive: !0,
                exact: !0,
                message: a.exactLength.message
            }), n.dirty())
        }
        if (a.minLength !== null && r.data.length < a.minLength.value && (Me(r, {
            code: Ce.too_small,
            minimum: a.minLength.value,
            type: "array",
            inclusive: !0,
            exact: !1,
            message: a.minLength.message
        }), n.dirty()), a.maxLength !== null && r.data.length > a.maxLength.value && (Me(r, {
            code: Ce.too_big,
            maximum: a.maxLength.value,
            type: "array",
            inclusive: !0,
            exact: !1,
            message: a.maxLength.message
        }), n.dirty()), r.common.async)
            return Promise.all([...r.data].map((o, l) => a.type._parseAsync(new Ta(r, o, r.path, l)))).then(o => hr.mergeArray(n, o));
        const i = [...r.data].map((o, l) => a.type._parseSync(new Ta(r, o, r.path, l)));
        return hr.mergeArray(n, i)
    }
    get element()
    {
        return this._def.type
    }
    min(s, r)
    {
        return new Zn({
            ...this._def,
            minLength: {
                value: s,
                message: Ke.toString(r)
            }
        })
    }
    max(s, r)
    {
        return new Zn({
            ...this._def,
            maxLength: {
                value: s,
                message: Ke.toString(r)
            }
        })
    }
    length(s, r)
    {
        return new Zn({
            ...this._def,
            exactLength: {
                value: s,
                message: Ke.toString(r)
            }
        })
    }
    nonempty(s)
    {
        return this.min(1, s)
    }
}
Zn.create = (t, s) => new Zn({
    type: t,
    minLength: null,
    maxLength: null,
    exactLength: null,
    typeName: nt.ZodArray,
    ...pt(s)
});
function Dl(t) {
    if (t instanceof rs) {
        const s = {};
        for (const r in t.shape) {
            const n = t.shape[r];
            s[r] = Sa.create(Dl(n))
        }
        return new rs({
            ...t._def,
            shape: () => s
        })
    } else
        return t instanceof Zn ? new Zn({
            ...t._def,
            type: Dl(t.element)
        }) : t instanceof Sa ? Sa.create(Dl(t.unwrap())) : t instanceof vo ? vo.create(Dl(t.unwrap())) : t instanceof Aa ? Aa.create(t.items.map(s => Dl(s))) : t
}
class rs extends bt {
    constructor()
    {
        super(...arguments),
        this._cached = null,
        this.nonstrict = this.passthrough,
        this.augment = this.extend
    }
    _getCached()
    {
        if (this._cached !== null)
            return this._cached;
        const s = this._def.shape(),
            r = kt.objectKeys(s);
        return this._cached = {
            shape: s,
            keys: r
        }
    }
    _parse(s)
    {
        if (this._getType(s) !== Le.object) {
            const d = this._getOrReturnCtx(s);
            return Me(d, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.object,
                received: d.parsedType
            }), it
        }
        const {status: n, ctx: a} = this._processInputParams(s),
            {shape: i, keys: o} = this._getCached(),
            l = [];
        if (!(this._def.catchall instanceof ji && this._def.unknownKeys === "strip"))
            for (const d in a.data)
                o.includes(d) || l.push(d);
        const c = [];
        for (const d of o) {
            const u = i[d],
                m = a.data[d];
            c.push({
                key: {
                    status: "valid",
                    value: d
                },
                value: u._parse(new Ta(a, m, a.path, d)),
                alwaysSet: d in a.data
            })
        }
        if (this._def.catchall instanceof ji) {
            const d = this._def.unknownKeys;
            if (d === "passthrough")
                for (const u of l)
                    c.push({
                        key: {
                            status: "valid",
                            value: u
                        },
                        value: {
                            status: "valid",
                            value: a.data[u]
                        }
                    });
            else if (d === "strict")
                l.length > 0 && (Me(a, {
                    code: Ce.unrecognized_keys,
                    keys: l
                }), n.dirty());
            else if (d !== "strip")
                throw new Error("Internal ZodObject error: invalid unknownKeys value.")
        } else {
            const d = this._def.catchall;
            for (const u of l) {
                const m = a.data[u];
                c.push({
                    key: {
                        status: "valid",
                        value: u
                    },
                    value: d._parse(new Ta(a, m, a.path, u)),
                    alwaysSet: u in a.data
                })
            }
        }
        return a.common.async ? Promise.resolve().then(async () => {
            const d = [];
            for (const u of c) {
                const m = await u.key,
                    f = await u.value;
                d.push({
                    key: m,
                    value: f,
                    alwaysSet: u.alwaysSet
                })
            }
            return d
        }).then(d => hr.mergeObjectSync(n, d)) : hr.mergeObjectSync(n, c)
    }
    get shape()
    {
        return this._def.shape()
    }
    strict(s)
    {
        return Ke.errToObj, new rs({
            ...this._def,
            unknownKeys: "strict",
            ...s !== void 0 ? {
                errorMap: (r, n) => {
                    var a,
                        i,
                        o,
                        l;
                    const c = (o = (i = (a = this._def).errorMap) === null || i === void 0 ? void 0 : i.call(a, r, n).message) !== null && o !== void 0 ? o : n.defaultError;
                    return r.code === "unrecognized_keys" ? {
                        message: (l = Ke.errToObj(s).message) !== null && l !== void 0 ? l : c
                    } : {
                        message: c
                    }
                }
            } : {}
        })
    }
    strip()
    {
        return new rs({
            ...this._def,
            unknownKeys: "strip"
        })
    }
    passthrough()
    {
        return new rs({
            ...this._def,
            unknownKeys: "passthrough"
        })
    }
    extend(s)
    {
        return new rs({
            ...this._def,
            shape: () => ({
                ...this._def.shape(),
                ...s
            })
        })
    }
    merge(s)
    {
        return new rs({
            unknownKeys: s._def.unknownKeys,
            catchall: s._def.catchall,
            shape: () => ({
                ...this._def.shape(),
                ...s._def.shape()
            }),
            typeName: nt.ZodObject
        })
    }
    setKey(s, r)
    {
        return this.augment({
            [s]: r
        })
    }
    catchall(s)
    {
        return new rs({
            ...this._def,
            catchall: s
        })
    }
    pick(s)
    {
        const r = {};
        return kt.objectKeys(s).forEach(n => {
            s[n] && this.shape[n] && (r[n] = this.shape[n])
        }), new rs({
            ...this._def,
            shape: () => r
        })
    }
    omit(s)
    {
        const r = {};
        return kt.objectKeys(this.shape).forEach(n => {
            s[n] || (r[n] = this.shape[n])
        }), new rs({
            ...this._def,
            shape: () => r
        })
    }
    deepPartial()
    {
        return Dl(this)
    }
    partial(s)
    {
        const r = {};
        return kt.objectKeys(this.shape).forEach(n => {
            const a = this.shape[n];
            s && !s[n] ? r[n] = a : r[n] = a.optional()
        }), new rs({
            ...this._def,
            shape: () => r
        })
    }
    required(s)
    {
        const r = {};
        return kt.objectKeys(this.shape).forEach(n => {
            if (s && !s[n])
                r[n] = this.shape[n];
            else {
                let i = this.shape[n];
                for (; i instanceof Sa;)
                    i = i._def.innerType;
                r[n] = i
            }
        }), new rs({
            ...this._def,
            shape: () => r
        })
    }
    keyof()
    {
        return BT(kt.objectKeys(this.shape))
    }
}
rs.create = (t, s) => new rs({
    shape: () => t,
    unknownKeys: "strip",
    catchall: ji.create(),
    typeName: nt.ZodObject,
    ...pt(s)
});
rs.strictCreate = (t, s) => new rs({
    shape: () => t,
    unknownKeys: "strict",
    catchall: ji.create(),
    typeName: nt.ZodObject,
    ...pt(s)
});
rs.lazycreate = (t, s) => new rs({
    shape: t,
    unknownKeys: "strip",
    catchall: ji.create(),
    typeName: nt.ZodObject,
    ...pt(s)
});
class zu extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {ctx: r} = this._processInputParams(s),
            n = this._def.options;
        function a(i) {
            for (const l of i)
                if (l.result.status === "valid")
                    return l.result;
            for (const l of i)
                if (l.result.status === "dirty")
                    return r.common.issues.push(...l.ctx.common.issues), l.result;
            const o = i.map(l => new hn(l.ctx.common.issues));
            return Me(r, {
                code: Ce.invalid_union,
                unionErrors: o
            }), it
        }
        if (r.common.async)
            return Promise.all(n.map(async i => {
                const o = {
                    ...r,
                    common: {
                        ...r.common,
                        issues: []
                    },
                    parent: null
                };
                return {
                    result: await i._parseAsync({
                        data: r.data,
                        path: r.path,
                        parent: o
                    }),
                    ctx: o
                }
            })).then(a);
        {
            let i;
            const o = [];
            for (const c of n) {
                const d = {
                        ...r,
                        common: {
                            ...r.common,
                            issues: []
                        },
                        parent: null
                    },
                    u = c._parseSync({
                        data: r.data,
                        path: r.path,
                        parent: d
                    });
                if (u.status === "valid")
                    return u;
                u.status === "dirty" && !i && (i = {
                    result: u,
                    ctx: d
                }),
                d.common.issues.length && o.push(d.common.issues)
            }
            if (i)
                return r.common.issues.push(...i.ctx.common.issues), i.result;
            const l = o.map(c => new hn(c));
            return Me(r, {
                code: Ce.invalid_union,
                unionErrors: l
            }), it
        }
    }
    get options()
    {
        return this._def.options
    }
}
zu.create = (t, s) => new zu({
    options: t,
    typeName: nt.ZodUnion,
    ...pt(s)
});
const Ba = t => t instanceof Uu ? Ba(t.schema) : t instanceof ta ? Ba(t.innerType()) : t instanceof qu ? [t.value] : t instanceof go ? t.options : t instanceof Bu ? kt.objectValues(t.enum) : t instanceof Hu ? Ba(t._def.innerType) : t instanceof Lu ? [void 0] : t instanceof Fu ? [null] : t instanceof Sa ? [void 0, ...Ba(t.unwrap())] : t instanceof vo ? [null, ...Ba(t.unwrap())] : t instanceof B0 || t instanceof Gu ? Ba(t.unwrap()) : t instanceof Wu ? Ba(t._def.innerType) : [];
class ex extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {ctx: r} = this._processInputParams(s);
        if (r.parsedType !== Le.object)
            return Me(r, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.object,
                received: r.parsedType
            }), it;
        const n = this.discriminator,
            a = r.data[n],
            i = this.optionsMap.get(a);
        return i ? r.common.async ? i._parseAsync({
            data: r.data,
            path: r.path,
            parent: r
        }) : i._parseSync({
            data: r.data,
            path: r.path,
            parent: r
        }) : (Me(r, {
            code: Ce.invalid_union_discriminator,
            options: Array.from(this.optionsMap.keys()),
            path: [n]
        }), it)
    }
    get discriminator()
    {
        return this._def.discriminator
    }
    get options()
    {
        return this._def.options
    }
    get optionsMap()
    {
        return this._def.optionsMap
    }
    static create(s, r, n)
    {
        const a = new Map;
        for (const i of r) {
            const o = Ba(i.shape[s]);
            if (!o.length)
                throw new Error(`A discriminator value for key \`${s}\` could not be extracted from all schema options`);
            for (const l of o) {
                if (a.has(l))
                    throw new Error(`Discriminator property ${String(s)} has duplicate value ${String(l)}`);
                a.set(l, i)
            }
        }
        return new ex({
            typeName: nt.ZodDiscriminatedUnion,
            discriminator: s,
            options: r,
            optionsMap: a,
            ...pt(n)
        })
    }
}
function py(t, s) {
    const r = Ka(t),
        n = Ka(s);
    if (t === s)
        return {
            valid: !0,
            data: t
        };
    if (r === Le.object && n === Le.object) {
        const a = kt.objectKeys(s),
            i = kt.objectKeys(t).filter(l => a.indexOf(l) !== -1),
            o = {
                ...t,
                ...s
            };
        for (const l of i) {
            const c = py(t[l], s[l]);
            if (!c.valid)
                return {
                    valid: !1
                };
            o[l] = c.data
        }
        return {
            valid: !0,
            data: o
        }
    } else if (r === Le.array && n === Le.array) {
        if (t.length !== s.length)
            return {
                valid: !1
            };
        const a = [];
        for (let i = 0; i < t.length; i++) {
            const o = t[i],
                l = s[i],
                c = py(o, l);
            if (!c.valid)
                return {
                    valid: !1
                };
            a.push(c.data)
        }
        return {
            valid: !0,
            data: a
        }
    } else
        return r === Le.date && n === Le.date && +t == +s ? {
            valid: !0,
            data: t
        } : {
            valid: !1
        }
}
class $u extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {status: r, ctx: n} = this._processInputParams(s),
            a = (i, o) => {
                if (hy(i) || hy(o))
                    return it;
                const l = py(i.value, o.value);
                return l.valid ? ((fy(i) || fy(o)) && r.dirty(), {
                    status: r.value,
                    value: l.data
                }) : (Me(n, {
                    code: Ce.invalid_intersection_types
                }), it)
            };
        return n.common.async ? Promise.all([this._def.left._parseAsync({
            data: n.data,
            path: n.path,
            parent: n
        }), this._def.right._parseAsync({
            data: n.data,
            path: n.path,
            parent: n
        })]).then(([i, o]) => a(i, o)) : a(this._def.left._parseSync({
            data: n.data,
            path: n.path,
            parent: n
        }), this._def.right._parseSync({
            data: n.data,
            path: n.path,
            parent: n
        }))
    }
}
$u.create = (t, s, r) => new $u({
    left: t,
    right: s,
    typeName: nt.ZodIntersection,
    ...pt(r)
});
class Aa extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {status: r, ctx: n} = this._processInputParams(s);
        if (n.parsedType !== Le.array)
            return Me(n, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.array,
                received: n.parsedType
            }), it;
        if (n.data.length < this._def.items.length)
            return Me(n, {
                code: Ce.too_small,
                minimum: this._def.items.length,
                inclusive: !0,
                exact: !1,
                type: "array"
            }), it;
        !this._def.rest && n.data.length > this._def.items.length && (Me(n, {
            code: Ce.too_big,
            maximum: this._def.items.length,
            inclusive: !0,
            exact: !1,
            type: "array"
        }), r.dirty());
        const i = [...n.data].map((o, l) => {
            const c = this._def.items[l] || this._def.rest;
            return c ? c._parse(new Ta(n, o, n.path, l)) : null
        }).filter(o => !!o);
        return n.common.async ? Promise.all(i).then(o => hr.mergeArray(r, o)) : hr.mergeArray(r, i)
    }
    get items()
    {
        return this._def.items
    }
    rest(s)
    {
        return new Aa({
            ...this._def,
            rest: s
        })
    }
}
Aa.create = (t, s) => {
    if (!Array.isArray(t))
        throw new Error("You must pass an array of schemas to z.tuple([ ... ])");
    return new Aa({
        items: t,
        typeName: nt.ZodTuple,
        rest: null,
        ...pt(s)
    })
};
class Vu extends bt {
    get keySchema()
    {
        return this._def.keyType
    }
    get valueSchema()
    {
        return this._def.valueType
    }
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {status: r, ctx: n} = this._processInputParams(s);
        if (n.parsedType !== Le.object)
            return Me(n, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.object,
                received: n.parsedType
            }), it;
        const a = [],
            i = this._def.keyType,
            o = this._def.valueType;
        for (const l in n.data)
            a.push({
                key: i._parse(new Ta(n, l, n.path, l)),
                value: o._parse(new Ta(n, n.data[l], n.path, l)),
                alwaysSet: l in n.data
            });
        return n.common.async ? hr.mergeObjectAsync(r, a) : hr.mergeObjectSync(r, a)
    }
    get element()
    {
        return this._def.valueType
    }
    static create(s, r, n)
    {
        return r instanceof bt ? new Vu({
            keyType: s,
            valueType: r,
            typeName: nt.ZodRecord,
            ...pt(n)
        }) : new Vu({
            keyType: Bn.create(),
            valueType: s,
            typeName: nt.ZodRecord,
            ...pt(r)
        })
    }
}
class Hf extends bt {
    get keySchema()
    {
        return this._def.keyType
    }
    get valueSchema()
    {
        return this._def.valueType
    }
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {status: r, ctx: n} = this._processInputParams(s);
        if (n.parsedType !== Le.map)
            return Me(n, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.map,
                received: n.parsedType
            }), it;
        const a = this._def.keyType,
            i = this._def.valueType,
            o = [...n.data.entries()].map(([l, c], d) => ({
                key: a._parse(new Ta(n, l, n.path, [d, "key"])),
                value: i._parse(new Ta(n, c, n.path, [d, "value"]))
            }));
        if (n.common.async) {
            const l = new Map;
            return Promise.resolve().then(async () => {
                for (const c of o) {
                    const d = await c.key,
                        u = await c.value;
                    if (d.status === "aborted" || u.status === "aborted")
                        return it;
                    (d.status === "dirty" || u.status === "dirty") && r.dirty(),
                    l.set(d.value, u.value)
                }
                return {
                    status: r.value,
                    value: l
                }
            })
        } else {
            const l = new Map;
            for (const c of o) {
                const d = c.key,
                    u = c.value;
                if (d.status === "aborted" || u.status === "aborted")
                    return it;
                (d.status === "dirty" || u.status === "dirty") && r.dirty(),
                l.set(d.value, u.value)
            }
            return {
                status: r.value,
                value: l
            }
        }
    }
}
Hf.create = (t, s, r) => new Hf({
    valueType: s,
    keyType: t,
    typeName: nt.ZodMap,
    ...pt(r)
});
class fl extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {status: r, ctx: n} = this._processInputParams(s);
        if (n.parsedType !== Le.set)
            return Me(n, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.set,
                received: n.parsedType
            }), it;
        const a = this._def;
        a.minSize !== null && n.data.size < a.minSize.value && (Me(n, {
            code: Ce.too_small,
            minimum: a.minSize.value,
            type: "set",
            inclusive: !0,
            exact: !1,
            message: a.minSize.message
        }), r.dirty()),
        a.maxSize !== null && n.data.size > a.maxSize.value && (Me(n, {
            code: Ce.too_big,
            maximum: a.maxSize.value,
            type: "set",
            inclusive: !0,
            exact: !1,
            message: a.maxSize.message
        }), r.dirty());
        const i = this._def.valueType;
        function o(c) {
            const d = new Set;
            for (const u of c) {
                if (u.status === "aborted")
                    return it;
                u.status === "dirty" && r.dirty(),
                d.add(u.value)
            }
            return {
                status: r.value,
                value: d
            }
        }
        const l = [...n.data.values()].map((c, d) => i._parse(new Ta(n, c, n.path, d)));
        return n.common.async ? Promise.all(l).then(c => o(c)) : o(l)
    }
    min(s, r)
    {
        return new fl({
            ...this._def,
            minSize: {
                value: s,
                message: Ke.toString(r)
            }
        })
    }
    max(s, r)
    {
        return new fl({
            ...this._def,
            maxSize: {
                value: s,
                message: Ke.toString(r)
            }
        })
    }
    size(s, r)
    {
        return this.min(s, r).max(s, r)
    }
    nonempty(s)
    {
        return this.min(1, s)
    }
}
fl.create = (t, s) => new fl({
    valueType: t,
    minSize: null,
    maxSize: null,
    typeName: nt.ZodSet,
    ...pt(s)
});
class oc extends bt {
    constructor()
    {
        super(...arguments),
        this.validate = this.implement
    }
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {ctx: r} = this._processInputParams(s);
        if (r.parsedType !== Le.function)
            return Me(r, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.function,
                received: r.parsedType
            }), it;
        function n(l, c) {
            return Vf({
                data: l,
                path: r.path,
                errorMaps: [r.common.contextualErrorMap, r.schemaErrorMap, $f(), zc].filter(d => !!d),
                issueData: {
                    code: Ce.invalid_arguments,
                    argumentsError: c
                }
            })
        }
        function a(l, c) {
            return Vf({
                data: l,
                path: r.path,
                errorMaps: [r.common.contextualErrorMap, r.schemaErrorMap, $f(), zc].filter(d => !!d),
                issueData: {
                    code: Ce.invalid_return_type,
                    returnTypeError: c
                }
            })
        }
        const i = {
                errorMap: r.common.contextualErrorMap
            },
            o = r.data;
        if (this._def.returns instanceof Vc) {
            const l = this;
            return Pr(async function(...c) {
                const d = new hn([]),
                    u = await l._def.args.parseAsync(c, i).catch(y => {
                        throw d.addIssue(n(c, y)), d
                    }),
                    m = await Reflect.apply(o, this, u);
                return await l._def.returns._def.type.parseAsync(m, i).catch(y => {
                    throw d.addIssue(a(m, y)), d
                })
            })
        } else {
            const l = this;
            return Pr(function(...c) {
                const d = l._def.args.safeParse(c, i);
                if (!d.success)
                    throw new hn([n(c, d.error)]);
                const u = Reflect.apply(o, this, d.data),
                    m = l._def.returns.safeParse(u, i);
                if (!m.success)
                    throw new hn([a(u, m.error)]);
                return m.data
            })
        }
    }
    parameters()
    {
        return this._def.args
    }
    returnType()
    {
        return this._def.returns
    }
    args(...s)
    {
        return new oc({
            ...this._def,
            args: Aa.create(s).rest(Zo.create())
        })
    }
    returns(s)
    {
        return new oc({
            ...this._def,
            returns: s
        })
    }
    implement(s)
    {
        return this.parse(s)
    }
    strictImplement(s)
    {
        return this.parse(s)
    }
    static create(s, r, n)
    {
        return new oc({
            args: s || Aa.create([]).rest(Zo.create()),
            returns: r || Zo.create(),
            typeName: nt.ZodFunction,
            ...pt(n)
        })
    }
}
class Uu extends bt {
    get schema()
    {
        return this._def.getter()
    }
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {ctx: r} = this._processInputParams(s);
        return this._def.getter()._parse({
            data: r.data,
            path: r.path,
            parent: r
        })
    }
}
Uu.create = (t, s) => new Uu({
    getter: t,
    typeName: nt.ZodLazy,
    ...pt(s)
});
class qu extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        if (s.data !== this._def.value) {
            const r = this._getOrReturnCtx(s);
            return Me(r, {
                received: r.data,
                code: Ce.invalid_literal,
                expected: this._def.value
            }), it
        }
        return {
            status: "valid",
            value: s.data
        }
    }
    get value()
    {
        return this._def.value
    }
}
qu.create = (t, s) => new qu({
    value: t,
    typeName: nt.ZodLiteral,
    ...pt(s)
});
function BT(t, s) {
    return new go({
        values: t,
        typeName: nt.ZodEnum,
        ...pt(s)
    })
}
class go extends bt {
    constructor()
    {
        super(...arguments),
        Fd.set(this, void 0)
    }
    _parse(s)
    {
        if (typeof s.data != "string") {
            const r = this._getOrReturnCtx(s),
                n = this._def.values;
            return Me(r, {
                expected: kt.joinValues(n),
                received: r.parsedType,
                code: Ce.invalid_type
            }), it
        }
        if (Uf(this, Fd) || $T(this, Fd, new Set(this._def.values)), !Uf(this, Fd).has(s.data)) {
            const r = this._getOrReturnCtx(s),
                n = this._def.values;
            return Me(r, {
                received: r.data,
                code: Ce.invalid_enum_value,
                options: n
            }), it
        }
        return Pr(s.data)
    }
    get options()
    {
        return this._def.values
    }
    get enum()
    {
        const s = {};
        for (const r of this._def.values)
            s[r] = r;
        return s
    }
    get Values()
    {
        const s = {};
        for (const r of this._def.values)
            s[r] = r;
        return s
    }
    get Enum()
    {
        const s = {};
        for (const r of this._def.values)
            s[r] = r;
        return s
    }
    extract(s, r=this._def)
    {
        return go.create(s, {
            ...this._def,
            ...r
        })
    }
    exclude(s, r=this._def)
    {
        return go.create(this.options.filter(n => !s.includes(n)), {
            ...this._def,
            ...r
        })
    }
}
Fd = new WeakMap;
go.create = BT;
class Bu extends bt {
    constructor()
    {
        super(...arguments),
        zd.set(this, void 0)
    }
    _parse(s)
    {
        const r = kt.getValidEnumValues(this._def.values),
            n = this._getOrReturnCtx(s);
        if (n.parsedType !== Le.string && n.parsedType !== Le.number) {
            const a = kt.objectValues(r);
            return Me(n, {
                expected: kt.joinValues(a),
                received: n.parsedType,
                code: Ce.invalid_type
            }), it
        }
        if (Uf(this, zd) || $T(this, zd, new Set(kt.getValidEnumValues(this._def.values))), !Uf(this, zd).has(s.data)) {
            const a = kt.objectValues(r);
            return Me(n, {
                received: n.data,
                code: Ce.invalid_enum_value,
                options: a
            }), it
        }
        return Pr(s.data)
    }
    get enum()
    {
        return this._def.values
    }
}
zd = new WeakMap;
Bu.create = (t, s) => new Bu({
    values: t,
    typeName: nt.ZodNativeEnum,
    ...pt(s)
});
class Vc extends bt {
    unwrap()
    {
        return this._def.type
    }
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {ctx: r} = this._processInputParams(s);
        if (r.parsedType !== Le.promise && r.common.async === !1)
            return Me(r, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.promise,
                received: r.parsedType
            }), it;
        const n = r.parsedType === Le.promise ? r.data : Promise.resolve(r.data);
        return Pr(n.then(a => this._def.type.parseAsync(a, {
            path: r.path,
            errorMap: r.common.contextualErrorMap
        })))
    }
}
Vc.create = (t, s) => new Vc({
    type: t,
    typeName: nt.ZodPromise,
    ...pt(s)
});
class ta extends bt {
    innerType()
    {
        return this._def.schema
    }
    sourceType()
    {
        return this._def.schema._def.typeName === nt.ZodEffects ? this._def.schema.sourceType() : this._def.schema
    }
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {status: r, ctx: n} = this._processInputParams(s),
            a = this._def.effect || null,
            i = {
                addIssue: o => {
                    Me(n, o),
                    o.fatal ? r.abort() : r.dirty()
                },
                get path() {
                    return n.path
                }
            };
        if (i.addIssue = i.addIssue.bind(i), a.type === "preprocess") {
            const o = a.transform(n.data, i);
            if (n.common.async)
                return Promise.resolve(o).then(async l => {
                    if (r.value === "aborted")
                        return it;
                    const c = await this._def.schema._parseAsync({
                        data: l,
                        path: n.path,
                        parent: n
                    });
                    return c.status === "aborted" ? it : c.status === "dirty" || r.value === "dirty" ? Kl(c.value) : c
                });
            {
                if (r.value === "aborted")
                    return it;
                const l = this._def.schema._parseSync({
                    data: o,
                    path: n.path,
                    parent: n
                });
                return l.status === "aborted" ? it : l.status === "dirty" || r.value === "dirty" ? Kl(l.value) : l
            }
        }
        if (a.type === "refinement") {
            const o = l => {
                const c = a.refinement(l, i);
                if (n.common.async)
                    return Promise.resolve(c);
                if (c instanceof Promise)
                    throw new Error("Async refinement encountered during synchronous parse operation. Use .parseAsync instead.");
                return l
            };
            if (n.common.async === !1) {
                const l = this._def.schema._parseSync({
                    data: n.data,
                    path: n.path,
                    parent: n
                });
                return l.status === "aborted" ? it : (l.status === "dirty" && r.dirty(), o(l.value), {
                    status: r.value,
                    value: l.value
                })
            } else
                return this._def.schema._parseAsync({
                    data: n.data,
                    path: n.path,
                    parent: n
                }).then(l => l.status === "aborted" ? it : (l.status === "dirty" && r.dirty(), o(l.value).then(() => ({
                    status: r.value,
                    value: l.value
                }))))
        }
        if (a.type === "transform")
            if (n.common.async === !1) {
                const o = this._def.schema._parseSync({
                    data: n.data,
                    path: n.path,
                    parent: n
                });
                if (!ml(o))
                    return o;
                const l = a.transform(o.value, i);
                if (l instanceof Promise)
                    throw new Error("Asynchronous transform encountered during synchronous parse operation. Use .parseAsync instead.");
                return {
                    status: r.value,
                    value: l
                }
            } else
                return this._def.schema._parseAsync({
                    data: n.data,
                    path: n.path,
                    parent: n
                }).then(o => ml(o) ? Promise.resolve(a.transform(o.value, i)).then(l => ({
                    status: r.value,
                    value: l
                })) : o);
        kt.assertNever(a)
    }
}
ta.create = (t, s, r) => new ta({
    schema: t,
    typeName: nt.ZodEffects,
    effect: s,
    ...pt(r)
});
ta.createWithPreprocess = (t, s, r) => new ta({
    schema: s,
    effect: {
        type: "preprocess",
        transform: t
    },
    typeName: nt.ZodEffects,
    ...pt(r)
});
class Sa extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        return this._getType(s) === Le.undefined ? Pr(void 0) : this._def.innerType._parse(s)
    }
    unwrap()
    {
        return this._def.innerType
    }
}

class Hu extends bt {

            data: n,

        })
    }

    }

class Wu extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {ctx: r} = this._processInputParams(s),
            n = {
                ...r,
                common: {
                    ...r.common,
                    issues: []
                }
            },
            a = this._def.innerType._parse({
                data: n.data,
                path: n.path,
                parent: {
                    ...n
                }
            });
        return Du(a) ? a.then(i => ({
            status: "valid",
            value: i.status === "valid" ? i.value : this._def.catchValue({
                get error() {
                    return new hn(n.common.issues)
                },
                input: n.data
            })
        })) : {
            status: "valid",
            value: a.status === "valid" ? a.value : this._def.catchValue({
                get error() {
                    return new hn(n.common.issues)
                },
                input: n.data
            })
        }
    }
    removeCatch()
    {
        return this._def.innerType
    }
}
Wu.create = (t, s) => new Wu({
    innerType: t,
    typeName: nt.ZodCatch,
    catchValue: typeof s.catch == "function" ? s.catch : () => s.catch,
    ...pt(s)
});
class Wf extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {

            const n = this._getOrReturnCtx(s);
            return Me(n, {
                code: Ce.invalid_type,
                expected: Le.nan,
                received: n.parsedType
            }), it
        }
        return {
            status: "valid",
            value: s.data
        }
    }
}

class km extends bt {
    _parse(s)
    {
        const {status: r, ctx: n} = this._processInputParams(s);
        if (n.common.async)
            return (async () => {
                const i = await this._def.in._parseAsync({
                    data: n.data,
                    path: n.path,
                    parent: n
                });
                return i.status === "aborted" ? it : i.status === "dirty" ? (r.dirty(), Kl(i.value)) : this._def.out._parseAsync({
                    data: i.value,
                    path: n.path,
                    parent: n
                })
            })();
        {
            const a = this._def.in._parseSync({
                data: n.data,
                path: n.path,
                parent: n
            });
            return a.status === "aborted" ? it : a.status === "dirty" ? (r.dirty(), {
                status: "dirty",
                value: a.value
            }) : this._def.out._parseSync({
                data: a.value,
                path: n.path,
                parent: n
            })
        }
    }
    static create(s, r)
    {
        return new km({
            in: s,
            out: r,
            typeName: nt.ZodPipeline
        })
    }
}
class Gu extends bt {

            n = a => (ml(a) && (a.value = Object.freeze(a.value)), a);
        return Du(r) ? r.then(a => n(a)) : n(r)
    }
    unwrap()
    {
        return this._def.innerType
    }
}

    } : r

                    u;
                if (!c) {
                    const m = j1(s, n),
                        f = (u = (d = m.fatal) !== null && d !== void 0 ? d : r) !== null && u !== void 0 ? u : !0;
                    a.addIssue({
                        code: "custom",
                        ...m,
                        fatal: f
                    })
                }
            });
        if (!l) {

                d = (o = (i = c.fatal) !== null && i !== void 0 ? i : r) !== null && o !== void 0 ? o : !0;
            a.addIssue({
                code: "custom",
                ...c,
                fatal: d
            })
        }
    }) : $c.create()
}

function W7({value: t=[], onChange: s, maxImages: r=5, maxSizeBytes: n=5 * 1024 * 1024, acceptedTypes: a=["image/jpeg", "image/jpg", "image/png", "image/webp"], className: i, disabled: o=!1}) {
    const [l, c] = h.useState(!1),
        [d, u] = h.useState(t),
        m = h.useRef(null),
        f = async x => {
            const j = Array.from(x.target.files || []);
            if (j.length !== 0) {
                if (d.length + j.length > r) {
                    alert(`Solo se pueden subir un máximo de ${r} imágenes`);
                    return
                }
                c(!0);
                try {
                    const v = [],
                        p = [];
                    for (const w of j) {
                        if (!a.includes(w.type)) {
                            alert(`Tipo de archivo no válido: ${w.type}. Solo se permiten: ${a.join(", ")}`);
                            continue
                        }
                        if (w.size > n) {
                            alert(`El archivo ${w.name} es demasiado grande. Máximo: ${n / (1024 * 1024)}MB`);
                            continue
                        }
                        const C = URL.createObjectURL(w);
                        p.push(C);
                        const k = new FormData;
                        k.append("image", w);
                        const P = await fetch("/api/upload-image", {
                            method: "POST",
                            body: k
                        });
                        if (P.ok) {
                            const D = await P.json();
                            v.push(D.imageUrl)
                        } else
                            console.error("Error uploading image:", w.name),
                            URL.revokeObjectURL(C)
                    }
                    const b = [...t, ...v],
                        N = [...d, ...p];
                    s(b),
                    u(N)
                } catch (v) {
                    console.error("Error uploading images:", v)
                } finally {
                    c(!1),
                    m.current && (m.current.value = "")
                }
            }
        },
        y = x => {
            const j = t.filter((b, N) => N !== x),
                v = d.filter((b, N) => N !== x),
                p = d[x];
            p && p.startsWith("blob:") && URL.revokeObjectURL(p),
            s(j),
            u(v)
        },
        g = () => {
            var x;
            (x = m.current) == null || x.click()
        };
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: ue("space-y-4", i),
        children: [e.jsx($, {
            className: "border-dashed",
            children: e.jsx(V, {
                className: "p-6",

                        className: "mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-muted-foreground/50 mb-4"

                        type: "button",

    Y7 = Ae.object({
        name: Ae.string().min(2, {
            message: "El nombre debe tener al menos 2 caracteres"
        }),
        email: Ae.string().email({
            message: "Ingrese un correo electrónico válido"
        }),
        phone: Ae.string().min(9, {
            message: "Ingrese un número de teléfono válido"
        }),
        subject: Ae.string().min(3, {
            message: "El asunto debe tener al menos 3 caracteres"
        }),
        message: Ae.string().min(10, {
            message: "El mensaje debe tener al menos 10 caracteres"
        })
    }),
    Z7 = () => {
        h.useEffect(() => {
            f$()
        }, []);
        const {toast: t} = tt(),
            {data: s, isLoading: r} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/cms/pages/contacto"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const i = await fetch("/api/cms/pages/contacto");
                    if (!i.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar página de contacto");
                    return i.json()
                }
            }),
            n = mn({
                resolver: Sn(Y7),
                defaultValues: {
                    name: "",
                    email: "",
                    phone: "",
                    subject: "",
                    message: ""
                }
            }),
            a = async i => {
                try {
                    console.log("📤 [Contact Form] Enviando datos:", i);
                    const o = await fetch("/api/contact", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(i)
                    });
                    if (console.log("📤 [Contact Form] Respuesta del servidor:", o.status, o.statusText), o.ok) {
                        const l = await o.json();
                        console.log("✅ [Contact Form] Respuesta exitosa:", l),
                        t({
                            title: "Mensaje enviado",
                            description: "Hemos recibido su mensaje. Nos pondremos en contacto con usted lo antes posible.",
                            variant: "default"
                        }),
                        n.reset()
                    } else {
                        const l = await o.json().catch(() => ({}));
                        throw console.error("❌ [Contact Form] Error del servidor:", l), new Error(l.error || "Error al enviar mensaje")
                    }
                } catch (o) {
                    console.error("❌ [Contact Form] Error completo:", o),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: o instanceof Error ? o.message : "No se pudo enviar el mensaje. Inténtelo de nuevo.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            };
        return r ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-[1400px] mx-auto px-6 py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "animate-pulse space-y-4",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-8 bg-gray-200 rounded w-1/3"
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-2/3"
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-3",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-4 bg-gray-200 rounded w-5/6"
                    })]
                })]
            })
        }) : e.jsx("div", {
            className: "max-w-[1400px] mx-auto px-6 py-8",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-2",
                    children: e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "p-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "mb-6 text-center",
                                children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                                    className: "text-2xl font-montserrat font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-2",
                                    children: (s == null ? void 0 : s.title) || "Contacto"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600 mb-4",
                                    children: (s == null ? void 0 : s.metaDescription) || "¿Tiene alguna pregunta? ¡Estamos aquí para ayudarle!"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx("h2", {
                                className: "text-xl font-montserrat font-semibold mb-6",
                                children: "Envíenos un mensaje"
                            }), e.jsx(_n, {
                                ...n,
                                children: e.jsxs("form", {
                                    onSubmit: n.handleSubmit(a),
                                    className: "space-y-6",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                                        children: [e.jsx(Je, {
                                            control: n.control,
                                            name: "name",
                                            render: ({field: i}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(et, {

                                                }), e.jsx(Qe, {

                                            })

                                                children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                                    children: "Correo electrónico"
                                                }), e.jsx(Qe, {
                                                    children: e.jsx(ee, {
                                                        placeholder: "ejemplo@correo.com",

                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(st, {})]
                                            })

                                                }), e.jsx(st, {})]

                                            })
                                        })]

                                        control: n.control,

                                        render: ({field: i}) => e.jsxs(Ze, {
                                            children: [e.jsx(et, {
                                                children: "Mensaje"
                                            }), e.jsx(Qe, {

                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(M, {
                                        type: "submit",

function nU(t, s) {
    return `${Math.round(t / s * 100)}%`
}
function tA(t, s) {
    return t == null ? "indeterminate" : t === s ? "complete" : "loading"

function Gf(t) {
    return typeof t == "number"
}

    return Gf(t) && !isNaN(t) && t > 0

    return Gf(t) && !isNaN(t) && t <= s && t >= 0

function ct(t) {
    const s = Object.prototype.toString.call(t);
    return t instanceof Date || typeof t == "object" && s === "[object Date]" ? new t.constructor(+t) : typeof t == "number" || s === "[object Number]" || typeof t == "string" || s === "[object String]" ? new Date(t) : new Date(NaN)
}
function Zr(t, s) {
    return t instanceof Date ? new t.constructor(s) : new Date(s)
}
function br(t, s) {
    const r = ct(t);
    return isNaN(s) ? Zr(t, NaN) : (s && r.setDate(r.getDate() + s), r)
}
function sa(t, s) {
    const r = ct(t);
    if (isNaN(s))
        return Zr(t, NaN);
    if (!s)
        return r;
    const n = r.getDate(),
        a = Zr(t, r.getTime());
    a.setMonth(r.getMonth() + s + 1, 0);
    const i = a.getDate();
    return n >= i ? a : (r.setFullYear(a.getFullYear(), a.getMonth(), n), r)
}
const Y0 = 6048e5,
    lU = 864e5,
    mh = 43200,
    C1 = 1440;
let cU = {};
function ad() {
    return cU
}
function Ma(t, s) {
    var l,
        c,
        d,
        u;
    const r = ad(),
        n = (s == null ? void 0 : s.weekStartsOn) ?? ((c = (l = s == null ? void 0 : s.locale) == null ? void 0 : l.options) == null ? void 0 : c.weekStartsOn) ?? r.weekStartsOn ?? ((u = (d = r.locale) == null ? void 0 : d.options) == null ? void 0 : u.weekStartsOn) ?? 0,
        a = ct(t),
        i = a.getDay(),
        o = (i < n ? 7 : 0) + i - n;
    return a.setDate(a.getDate() - o), a.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0), a
}
function pl(t) {
    return Ma(t, {
        weekStartsOn: 1
    })
}
function rA(t) {
    const s = ct(t),
        r = s.getFullYear(),
        n = Zr(t, 0);
    n.setFullYear(r + 1, 0, 4),
    n.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
    const a = pl(n),
        i = Zr(t, 0);
    i.setFullYear(r, 0, 4),
    i.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
    const o = pl(i);
    return s.getTime() >= a.getTime() ? r + 1 : s.getTime() >= o.getTime() ? r : r - 1
}
function Uc(t) {
    const s = ct(t);
    return s.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0), s
}
function qc(t) {
    const s = ct(t),
        r = new Date(Date.UTC(s.getFullYear(), s.getMonth(), s.getDate(), s.getHours(), s.getMinutes(), s.getSeconds(), s.getMilliseconds()));
    return r.setUTCFullYear(s.getFullYear()), +t - +r
}
function ya(t, s) {
    const r = Uc(t),
        n = Uc(s),
        a = +r - qc(r),
        i = +n - qc(n);
    return Math.round((a - i) / lU)
}
function dU(t) {
    const s = rA(t),
        r = Zr(t, 0);
    return r.setFullYear(s, 0, 4), r.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0), pl(r)
}
function xy(t, s) {
    const r = s * 7;
    return br(t, r)
}
function uU(t, s) {
    return sa(t, s * 12)
}
function mU(t) {
    let s;
    return t.forEach(function(r) {
        const n = ct(r);
        (s === void 0 || s < n || isNaN(Number(n))) && (s = n)
    }), s || new Date(NaN)
}
function hU(t) {
    let s;
    return t.forEach(r => {
        const n = ct(r);
        (!s || s > n || isNaN(+n)) && (s = n)
    }), s || new Date(NaN)
}
function Fh(t, s) {
    const r = ct(t),
        n = ct(s),
        a = r.getTime() - n.getTime();
    return a < 0 ? -1 : a > 0 ? 1 : a
}
function fU(t) {
    return Zr(t, Date.now())
}
function $r(t, s) {
    const r = Uc(t),
        n = Uc(s);
    return +r == +n
}
function Z0(t) {
    return t instanceof Date || typeof t == "object" && Object.prototype.toString.call(t) === "[object Date]"
}
function pU(t) {
    if (!Z0(t) && typeof t != "number")
        return !1;
    const s = ct(t);
    return !isNaN(Number(s))
}
function Bc(t, s) {
    const r = ct(t),
        n = ct(s),
        a = r.getFullYear() - n.getFullYear(),
        i = r.getMonth() - n.getMonth();
    return a * 12 + i
}
function xU(t, s, r) {
    const n = Ma(t, r),
        a = Ma(s, r),
        i = +n - qc(n),
        o = +a - qc(a);
    return Math.round((i - o) / Y0)
}
function gU(t) {
    return s => {
        const n = (t ? Math[t] : Math.trunc)(s);
        return n === 0 ? 0 : n
    }
}
function vU(t, s) {
    return +ct(t) - +ct(s)
}
function yU(t) {
    const s = ct(t);
    return s.setHours(23, 59, 59, 999), s
}
function sx(t) {
    const s = ct(t),
        r = s.getMonth();
    return s.setFullYear(s.getFullYear(), r + 1, 0), s.setHours(23, 59, 59, 999), s
}
function jU(t) {
    const s = ct(t);
    return +yU(s) == +sx(s)
}
function bU(t, s) {
    const r = ct(t),
        n = ct(s),
        a = Fh(r, n),
        i = Math.abs(Bc(r, n));
    let o;
    if (i < 1)
        o = 0;
    else {
        r.getMonth() === 1 && r.getDate() > 27 && r.setDate(30),
        r.setMonth(r.getMonth() - a * i);
        let l = Fh(r, n) === -a;
        jU(ct(t)) && i === 1 && Fh(t, n) === 1 && (l = !1),
        o = a * (i - Number(l))
    }
    return o === 0 ? 0 : o
}
function NU(t, s, r) {
    const n = vU(t, s) / 1e3;
    return gU(r == null ? void 0 : r.roundingMethod)(n)
}

    return s.setDate(1), s.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0), s

function Q0(t, s) {
    var l,
        c,
        d,
        u;

        n = (s == null ? void 0 : s.weekStartsOn) ?? ((c = (l = s == null ? void 0 : s.locale) == null ? void 0 : l.options) == null ? void 0 : c.weekStartsOn) ?? r.weekStartsOn ?? ((u = (d = r.locale) == null ? void 0 : d.options) == null ? void 0 : u.weekStartsOn) ?? 0,
        a = ct(t),
        i = a.getDay(),
        o = (i < n ? -7 : 0) + 6 - (i - n);
    return a.setDate(a.getDate() + o), a.setHours(23, 59, 59, 999), a

function lc(t) {

        const r = s.width ? String(s.width) : t.defaultWidth;
        return t.formats[r] || t.formats[t.defaultWidth]
    }

function xa(t) {
    return (s, r) => {
        const n = r != null && r.context ? String(r.context) : "standalone";
        let a;
        if (n === "formatting" && t.formattingValues) {
            const o = t.defaultFormattingWidth || t.defaultWidth,
                l = r != null && r.width ? String(r.width) : o;
            a = t.formattingValues[l] || t.formattingValues[o]
        } else {
            const o = t.defaultWidth,
                l = r != null && r.width ? String(r.width) : t.defaultWidth;
            a = t.values[l] || t.values[o]
        }
        const i = t.argumentCallback ? t.argumentCallback(s) : s;
        return a[i]
    }
}

function ga(t) {
    return (s, r={}) => {
        const n = r.width,
            a = n && t.matchPatterns[n] || t.matchPatterns[t.defaultMatchWidth],
            i = s.match(a);
        if (!i)
            return null;
        const o = i[0],
            l = n && t.parsePatterns[n] || t.parsePatterns[t.defaultParseWidth],
            c = Array.isArray(l) ? $U(l, m => m.test(o)) : zU(l, m => m.test(o));
        let d;
        d = t.valueCallback ? t.valueCallback(c) : c,
        d = r.valueCallback ? r.valueCallback(d) : d;
        const u = s.slice(o.length);
        return {
            value: d,
            rest: u
        }
    }
}
function zU(t, s) {
    for (const r in t)
        if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(t, r) && s(t[r]))
            return r
}
function $U(t, s) {
    for (let r = 0; r < t.length; r++)
        if (s(t[r]))
            return r
}
function iA(t) {
    return (s, r={}) => {
        const n = s.match(t.matchPattern);
        if (!n)
            return null;
        const a = n[0],
            i = s.match(t.parsePattern);
        if (!i)
            return null;
        let o = t.valueCallback ? t.valueCallback(i[0]) : i[0];
        o = r.valueCallback ? r.valueCallback(o) : o;
        const l = s.slice(a.length);
        return {
            value: o,
            rest: l
        }
    }
}
const VU = /^(\d+)(th|st|nd|rd)?/i,
    UU = /\d+/i,

        wide: /^(before christ|before common era|anno domini|common era)/i

    BU = {
        any: [/^b/i, /^(a|c)/i]
    },

        abbreviated: /^q[1234]/i,
        wide: /^[1234](th|st|nd|rd)? quarter/i

    const s = ct(t);
    return ya(s, nA(s)) + 1
}
function oA(t) {
    const s = ct(t),
        r = +pl(s) - +dU(s);
    return Math.round(r / Y0) + 1

function lA(t, s) {
    var u,
        m,
        f,
        y;
    const r = ct(t),
        n = r.getFullYear(),
        a = ad(),
        i = (s == null ? void 0 : s.firstWeekContainsDate) ?? ((m = (u = s == null ? void 0 : s.locale) == null ? void 0 : u.options) == null ? void 0 : m.firstWeekContainsDate) ?? a.firstWeekContainsDate ??         c = Zr(t, 0);
    c.setFullYear(n, 0, i),
    c.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0);
    const d = Ma(c, s);
    return r.getTime() >= l.getTime() ? n + 1 : r.getTime() >= d.getTime() ? n : n - 1
}
function tq(t, s) {
    var l,
        c,
        d,
        u;
    const r = ad(),
        n = (s == null ? void 0 : s.firstWeekContainsDate) ?? ((c = (l = s == null ? void 0 : s.locale) == null ? void 0 : l.options) == null ? void 0 : c.firstWeekContainsDate) ?? r.firstWeekContainsDate ?? ((u = (d = r.locale) == null ? void 0 : d.options) == null ? void 0 : u.firstWeekContainsDate) ?? 1,
        a = lA(t, s),
        i = Zr(t, 0);
    return i.setFullYear(a, 0, n), i.setHours(0, 0, 0, 0), Ma(i, s)

function cA(t, s) {
    const r = ct(t),
        n = +Ma(r, s) - +tq(r, s);
    return Math.round(n / Y0) + 1
}
function Lt(t, s) {
    const r = t < 0 ? "-" : "",
        n = Math.abs(t).toString().padStart(s, "0");
    return r + n
}
const Ti = {
        y(t, s) {
            const r = t.getFullYear(),
                n = r > 0 ? r : 1 - r;
            return Lt(s === "yy" ? n % 100 : n, s.length)
        },
        M(t, s) {
            const r = t.getMonth();
            return s === "M" ? String(r + 1) : Lt(r + 1, 2)
        },
        d(t, s) {
            return Lt(t.getDate(), s.length)
        },
        a(t, s) {
            const r = t.getHours() / 12 >= 1 ? "pm" : "am";
            switch (s) {
            case "a":
            case "aa":
                return r.toUpperCase();
            case "aaa":
                return r;
            case "aaaaa":
                return r[0];
            case "aaaa":
            default:
                return r === "am" ? "a.m." : "p.m."
            }
        },
        h(t, s) {
            return Lt(t.getHours() % 12 || 12, s.length)
        },
        H(t, s) {
            return Lt(t.getHours(), s.length)
        },
        m(t, s) {
            return Lt(t.getMinutes(), s.length)
        },
        s(t, s) {
            return Lt(t.getSeconds(), s.length)
        },
        S(t, s) {
            const r = s.length,
                n = t.getMilliseconds(),
                a = Math.trunc(n * Math.pow(10, r - 3));
            return Lt(a, s.length)
        }
    },
    Rl = {
        am: "am",
        pm: "pm",
        midnight: "midnight",
        noon: "noon",
        morning: "morning",
        afternoon: "afternoon",
        evening: "evening",
        night: "night"
    },
    S1 = {
        G: function(t, s, r) {
            const n = t.getFullYear() > 0 ? 1 : 0;
            switch (s) {
            case "G":
            case "GG":
            case "GGG":
                return r.era(n, {
                    width: "abbreviated"
                });
            case "GGGGG":

                    width: "narrow"
                });
            case "GGGG":
            default:
                return r.era(n, {
                    width: "wide"
                })
            }
        },
        y: function(t, s, r) {
            if (s === "yo") {
                const n = t.getFullYear(),
                    a = n > 0 ? n : 1 - n;
                return r.ordinalNumber(a, {
                    unit: "year"
                })
            }
            return Ti.y(t, s)
        },
        Y: function(t, s, r, n) {
