                                        children: "Estado:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        children: f.status || "N/A"
                                    })]
                                }), f.success && f.responseData && f.responseData.summary && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Datos:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-xs font-semibold text-green-700",
                                        children: f.responseData.summary
                                    })]
                                }), f.success && f.responseData && f.responseData.itemCount && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "mt-2 p-2 bg-green-50 rounded-md border border-green-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-green-700 font-medium mb-1",
                                        children: "Detalle de datos:"
                                    }), e.jsxs("ul", {
                                        className: "list-disc list-inside text-xs text-green-700",
                                        children: [f.responseData.itemCount.piezas > 0 && e.jsxs("li", {
                                            children: ["Piezas: ", f.responseData.itemCount.piezas]
                                        }), f.responseData.itemCount.vehiculos > 0 && e.jsxs("li", {
                                            children: ["Vehículos: ", f.responseData.itemCount.vehiculos]
                                        }), f.responseData.pagination && e.jsxs("li", {
                                            children: ["Último ID: ", f.responseData.pagination.lastId]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-1",
                                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: "Mensaje:"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-xs",
                                        children: f.message
                                    })]
                                }), !f.success && e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "mt-3 p-3 bg-red-50 rounded-md border border-red-200",
                                    children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-red-700 font-medium",
                                        children: "Sugerencia de solución:"
                                    }), e.jsxs("ul", {
                                        className: "list-disc list-inside text-xs text-red-700 mt-1",
                                        children: [f.status === 404 && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Verificar que la URL del endpoint es correcta"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Comprobar que el API key tiene acceso a este endpoint"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "La respuesta 404 indica que el recurso no fue encontrado"
                                            })]
                                        }), f.status === 401 && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "El API key proporcionado no es válido o ha expirado"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Verificar las credenciales en la configuración"
                                            })]
                                        }), f.status === 403 && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "El API key no tiene permisos suficientes"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Contactar con el proveedor de la API"
                                            })]
                                        }), !f.status && e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                            children: [e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Verificar la conexión a internet"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "El servidor de la API podría estar caído"
                                            }), e.jsx("li", {
                                                children: "Contactar con el proveedor de la API"
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }, y))
                })]
            })]
        }), e.jsx(V, {
            className: "pt-5",
            children: t && e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "bg-blue-50 border border-blue-200 rounded-md p-4 mb-5",
                children: [e.jsxs("h3", {
                    className: "text-sm font-medium flex items-center gap-2 mb-3",
                    children: [e.jsx(Gn, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-500"
                    }), "Validación de conteos y recuperación de datos", e.jsx(ge, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        className: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-700 border-blue-200 ml-2",
                        children: new Date(t.timestamp).toLocaleTimeString()
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(Gs, {
                    children: [e.jsx(Ks, {
                        children: e.jsxs(vt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(pe, {
                                children: "Métrica"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Conteo API"
                            }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Recuperados"
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(Ys, {
                        children: [e.jsxs(vt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Vehículos"
                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.vehicleCount
                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.vehiclesRetrieved > 0 ? e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-green-600",
                                    children: t.vehiclesRetrieved
                                }) : e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-red-600",
                                    children: "0"
                                })
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(vt, {
                            children: [e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Piezas"
                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.partCount
                            }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: t.partsRetrieved > 0 ? e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-green-600",
                                    children: t.partsRetrieved
                                }) : e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "text-red-600",
                                    children: "0"
                                })
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), t.vehiclesInPartsResponse > 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mt-3 text-xs text-blue-700 bg-blue-100 p-2 rounded",
                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                        className: "font-medium",
                        children: "Nota:"
                    }), " Se encontraron ", t.vehiclesInPartsResponse, " vehículos asociados en la respuesta de piezas."]
                }), t.vehicleCount > 0 && t.vehiclesRetrieved === 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "mt-3 text-xs text-amber-700 bg-amber-100 p-2 rounded",
                    children: [e.jsx("span", {
                        className: "font-medium",
                        children: "Sugerencia:"
                    }), " Los conteos muestran vehículos disponibles pero no se pudieron recuperar directamente. Intente recuperar vehículos a través de la API de piezas, donde aparecen como elementos asociados."]
                })]
            })
        }), e.jsxs(_a, {
            className: "flex gap-2",
            children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                variant: "outline",
                onClick: d,
                className: "w-full",
                children: [e.jsx(iw, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                }), "Actualizar diagnóstico"]
            }), e.jsxs(M, {
                variant: "secondary",
                onClick: u,
                className: "w-full",
                disabled: r,
                children: [r ? e.jsx(ow, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                }) : e.jsx(DE, {
                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                }), "Verificar conteos"]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
function jW(t, s) {
    return h.useReducer((r, n) => s[r][n] ?? r, t)
}
var db = "ScrollArea",
    [tM, vQ] = ws(db),
    [bW, An] = tM(db),
    sM = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeScrollArea: r, type: n="hover", dir: a, scrollHideDelay: i=600, ...o} = t,
            [l, c] = h.useState(null),
            [d, u] = h.useState(null),
            [m, f] = h.useState(null),
            [y, g] = h.useState(null),
            [x, j] = h.useState(null),
            [v, p] = h.useState(0),
            [b, N] = h.useState(0),
            [w, C] = h.useState(!1),
            [k, P] = h.useState(!1),
            D = ot(s, L => c(L)),
            W = wl(a);
        return e.jsx(bW, {
            scope: r,
            type: n,
            dir: W,
            scrollHideDelay: i,
            scrollArea: l,
            viewport: d,
            onViewportChange: u,
            content: m,
            onContentChange: f,
            scrollbarX: y,
            onScrollbarXChange: g,
            scrollbarXEnabled: w,
            onScrollbarXEnabledChange: C,
            scrollbarY: x,
            onScrollbarYChange: j,
            scrollbarYEnabled: k,
            onScrollbarYEnabledChange: P,
            onCornerWidthChange: p,
            onCornerHeightChange: N,
            children: e.jsx(Re.div, {
                dir: W,
                ...o,
                ref: D,
                style: {
                    position: "relative",
                    "--radix-scroll-area-corner-width": v + "px",
                    "--radix-scroll-area-corner-height": b + "px",
                    ...t.style
                }
            })
        })
    });
sM.displayName = db;
var rM = "ScrollAreaViewport",
    nM = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeScrollArea: r, children: n, nonce: a, ...i} = t,
            o = An(rM, r),
            l = h.useRef(null),
            c = ot(s, l, o.onViewportChange);
        return e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {

                },
                nonce: a
            }), e.jsx(Re.div, {
                "data-radix-scroll-area-viewport": "",
                ...i,
                ref: c,
                style: {
                    overflowX: o.scrollbarXEnabled ? "scroll" : "hidden",
                    overflowY: o.scrollbarYEnabled ? "scroll" : "hidden",
                    ...t.style
                },
                children: e.jsx("div", {
                    ref: o.onContentChange,

                        minWidth: "100%",
                        display: "table"
                    },

                })

nM.displayName = rM;
var Ra = "ScrollAreaScrollbar",
    ub = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = An(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            {onScrollbarXEnabledChange: i, onScrollbarYEnabledChange: o} = a,
            l = t.orientation === "horizontal";
        return h.useEffect(() => (l ? i(!0) : o(!0), () => {
            l ? i(!1) : o(!1)
        }), [l, i, o]), a.type === "hover" ? e.jsx(NW, {
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            forceMount: r
        }) : a.type === "scroll" ? e.jsx(wW, {
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            forceMount: r
        }) : a.type === "auto" ? e.jsx(aM, {
            ...n,
            ref: s,
            forceMount: r
        }) : a.type === "always" ? e.jsx(mb, {
            ...n,
            ref: s
        }) : null
    });
ub.displayName = Ra;
var NW = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = An(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            [i, o] = h.useState(!1);
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            const l = a.scrollArea;
            let c = 0;
            if (l) {
                const d = () => {
                        window.clearTimeout(c),
                        o(!0)
                    },
                    u = () => {
                        c = window.setTimeout(() => o(!1), a.scrollHideDelay)
                    };
                return l.addEventListener("pointerenter", d), l.addEventListener("pointerleave", u), () => {
                    window.clearTimeout(c),
                    l.removeEventListener("pointerenter", d),
                    l.removeEventListener("pointerleave", u)
                }
            }
        }, [a.scrollArea, a.scrollHideDelay]), e.jsx(Ts, {
            present: r || i,
            children: e.jsx(aM, {
                "data-state": i ? "visible" : "hidden",
                ...n,
                ref: s
            })
        })
    }),
    wW = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {forceMount: r, ...n} = t,
            a = An(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            i = t.orientation === "horizontal",
            o = ax(() => c("SCROLL_END"), 100),
            [l, c] = jW("hidden", {
                hidden: {
                    SCROLL: "scrolling"
                },
                scrolling: {
                    SCROLL_END: "idle",
                    POINTER_ENTER: "interacting"
                },
                interacting: {
                    SCROLL: "interacting",
                    POINTER_LEAVE: "idle"
                },
                idle: {
                    HIDE: "hidden",
                    SCROLL: "scrolling",
                    POINTER_ENTER: "interacting"
                }
            });
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            if (l === "idle") {
                const d = window.setTimeout(() => c("HIDE"), a.scrollHideDelay);
                return () => window.clearTimeout(d)
            }
        }, [l, a.scrollHideDelay, c]), h.useEffect(() => {
            const d = a.viewport,
                u = i ? "scrollLeft" : "scrollTop";
            if (d) {
                let m = d[u];
                const f = () => {
                    const y = d[u];
                    m !== y && (c("SCROLL"), o()),
                    m = y
                };
                return d.addEventListener("scroll", f), () => d.removeEventListener("scroll", f)
            }
        }, [a.viewport, i, c, o]), e.jsx(Ts, {
            present: r || l !== "hidden",
            children: e.jsx(mb, {
                "data-state": l === "hidden" ? "hidden" : "visible",
                ...n,
                ref: s,
                onPointerEnter: Ne(t.onPointerEnter, () => c("POINTER_ENTER")),
                onPointerLeave: Ne(t.onPointerLeave, () => c("POINTER_LEAVE"))
            })
        })
    }),
    aM = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const r = An(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            {forceMount: n, ...a} = t,
            [i, o] = h.useState(!1),
            l = t.orientation === "horizontal",
            c = ax(() => {
                if (r.viewport) {
                    const d = r.viewport.offsetWidth < r.viewport.scrollWidth,
                        u = r.viewport.offsetHeight < r.viewport.scrollHeight;
                    o(l ? d : u)
                }
            }, 10);
        return Wc(r.viewport, c), Wc(r.content, c), e.jsx(Ts, {
            present: n || i,
            children: e.jsx(mb, {
                "data-state": i ? "visible" : "hidden",
                ...a,
                ref: s
            })
        })
    }),
    mb = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {orientation: r="vertical", ...n} = t,
            a = An(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            i = h.useRef(null),
            o = h.useRef(0),
            [l, c] = h.useState({
                content: 0,
                viewport: 0,
                scrollbar: {
                    size: 0,
                    paddingStart: 0,
                    paddingEnd: 0
                }
            }),
            d = dM(l.viewport, l.content),
            u = {
                ...n,
                sizes: l,
                onSizesChange: c,
                hasThumb: d > 0 && d < 1,
                onThumbChange: f => i.current = f,
                onThumbPointerUp: () => o.current = 0,
                onThumbPointerDown: f => o.current = f
            };
        function m(f, y) {
            return _W(f, o.current, l, y)
        }
        return r === "horizontal" ? e.jsx(CW, {
            ...u,
            ref: s,
            onThumbPositionChange: () => {
                if (a.viewport && i.current) {
                    const f = a.viewport.scrollLeft,
                        y = F1(f, l, a.dir);
                    i.current.style.transform = `translate3d(${y}px, 0, 0)`
                }
            },
            onWheelScroll: f => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollLeft = f)
            },
            onDragScroll: f => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollLeft = m(f, a.dir))
            }
        }) : r === "vertical" ? e.jsx(SW, {
            ...u,
            ref: s,
            onThumbPositionChange: () => {
                if (a.viewport && i.current) {
                    const f = a.viewport.scrollTop,
                        y = F1(f, l);
                    i.current.style.transform = `translate3d(0, ${y}px, 0)`
                }
            },
            onWheelScroll: f => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollTop = f)
            },
            onDragScroll: f => {
                a.viewport && (a.viewport.scrollTop = m(f))
            }
        }) : null
    }),
    CW = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {sizes: r, onSizesChange: n, ...a} = t,
            i = An(Ra, t.__scopeScrollArea),
            [o, l] = h.useState(),
            c = h.useRef(null),
            d = ot(s, c, i.onScrollbarXChange);
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            c.current && l(getComputedStyle(c.current))
        }, [c]), e.jsx(oM, {
            "data-orientation": "horizontal",
            ...a,
            ref: d,
            sizes: r,
            style: {
                bottom: 0,
                left: i.dir === "rtl" ? "var(--radix-scroll-area-corner-width)" : 0,
                right: i.dir === "ltr" ? "var(--radix-scroll-area-corner-width)" : 0,
                "--radix-scroll-area-thumb-width": nx(r) + "px",
                ...t.style
            },
            onThumbPointerDown: u => t.onThumbPointerDown(u.x),
            onDragScroll: u => t.onDragScroll(u.x),
            onWheelScroll: (u, m) => {
                if (i.viewport) {
                    const f = i.viewport.scrollLeft + u.deltaX;
                    t.onWheelScroll(f),
                    mM(f, m) && u.preventDefault()
                }
            },

function Qf(t) {
    return t ? parseInt(t, 10) : 0
}
function dM(t, s) {
    const r = t / s;
    return isNaN(r) ? 0 : r
}
function nx(t) {
    const s = dM(t.viewport, t.content),
        r = t.scrollbar.paddingStart + t.scrollbar.paddingEnd,
        n = (t.scrollbar.size - r) * s;
    return Math.max(n, 18)
}
function _W(t, s, r, n="ltr") {
    const a = nx(r),
        i = a / 2,
        o = s || i,
        l = a - o,
        c = r.scrollbar.paddingStart + o,
        d = r.scrollbar.size - r.scrollbar.paddingEnd - l,
        u = r.content - r.viewport,
        m = n === "ltr" ? [0, u] : [u * -1, 0];
    return uM([c, d], m)(t)
}
function F1(t, s, r="ltr") {
    const n = nx(s),
        a = s.scrollbar.paddingStart + s.scrollbar.paddingEnd,
        i = s.scrollbar.size - a,
        o = s.content - s.viewport,
        l = i - n,
        c = r === "ltr" ? [0, o] : [o * -1, 0],
        d = ry(t, c);
    return uM([0, o], [0, l])(d)
}
function uM(t, s) {
    return r => {
        if (t[0] === t[1] || s[0] === s[1])
            return s[0];
        const n = (s[1] - s[0]) / (t[1] - t[0]);
        return s[0] + n * (r - t[0])
    }
}
function mM(t, s) {
    return t > 0 && t < s
}
var TW = (t, s=() => {}) => {
    let r = {
            left: t.scrollLeft,
            top: t.scrollTop
        },
        n = 0;
    return function a() {
        const i = {
                left: t.scrollLeft,
                top: t.scrollTop
            },
            o = r.left !== i.left,
            l = r.top !== i.top;
        (o || l) && s(),
        r = i,
        n = window.requestAnimationFrame(a)
    }(), () => window.cancelAnimationFrame(n)
};
function ax(t, s) {
    const r = Qt(t),
        n = h.useRef(0);
    return h.useEffect(() => () => window.clearTimeout(n.current), []), h.useCallback(() => {
        window.clearTimeout(n.current),
        n.current = window.setTimeout(r, s)
    }, [r, s])
}
function Wc(t, s) {
    const r = Qt(s);
    js(() => {
        let n = 0;
        if (t) {
            const a = new ResizeObserver(() => {
                cancelAnimationFrame(n),
                n = window.requestAnimationFrame(r)
            });
            return a.observe(t), () => {
                window.cancelAnimationFrame(n),
                a.unobserve(t)
            }
        }
    }, [t, r])
}

                    const x = await fetch("/api/maintenance/config", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(g)
                    });
                    if (!x.ok) {
                        const v = await x.text();
                        throw console.error("❌ MAINTENANCE: Error del servidor:", v), new Error(v || "Error al actualizar la configuración de mantenimiento")
                    }
                    const j = await x.json();
                    return console.log("✅ MAINTENANCE: Respuesta del servidor:", j), j
                },
                onSuccess: g => {
                    console.log("✅ MAINTENANCE: Configuración actualizada exitosamente"),
                    s.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/maintenance/config"]
                    }),
                    t({
                        title: r ? "Modo mantenimiento activado" : "Modo mantenimiento desactivado",
                        description: "La configuración se ha actualizado correctamente",
                        variant: "default"
                    })
                },
                onError: g => {
                    console.error("❌ MAINTENANCE: Error actualizando configuración:", g),
                    c && (n(c.maintenanceMode || !1), i(c.maintenanceMessage || ""), l(c.estimatedTime || "")),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Ha ocurrido un error al actualizar la configuración",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            f = g => {
                console.log(`🔧 MAINTENANCE TOGGLE: ${g ? "activando" : "desactivando"} modo mantenimiento`),
                n(g),
                u({
                    maintenanceMode: g,
                    maintenanceMessage: a,
                    estimatedTime: o
                })
            },
            y = g => {

                u({

    zW = () => {
        var g,
            x;
        const [t, s] = h.useState("");
        h.useState(null);
        const {toast: r} = tt(),
            n = fr(),
            {data: a, isLoading: i} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const j = await fetch("/api/backup/list", {
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!j.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error obteniendo backups");
                    return j.json()
                }
            }),
            o = rt({
                mutationFn: async j => {
                    const v = await fetch("/api/backup/create", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify({
                            name: j || void 0
                        })
                    });
                    if (!v.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error creando backup de base de datos");
                    return v.json()
                },
                onSuccess: j => {
                    n.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: j.message
                    }),
                    s("")
                },
                onError: j => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: j.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            l = rt({
                mutationFn: async j => {
                    const v = await fetch(`/api/backup/restore/database/${j}`, {
                        method: "POST",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!v.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error restaurando backup de base de datos");
                    return v.json()
                },
                onSuccess: j => {
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: j.message
                    })
                },
                onError: j => {
                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: j.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            c = rt({
                mutationFn: async j => {
                    const v = await fetch(`/api/backup/${j}`, {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!v.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error eliminando backup");
                    return v.json()
                },
                onSuccess: j => {
                    n.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/backup/list"]
                    }),
                    r({
                        title: "Éxito",
                        description: j.message
                    })
                },

                    r({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: j.message,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            d = j => {
                const v = `¿Estás seguro de que quieres restaurar la base de datos desde el backup "${j.name}"? Esta acción sobrescribirá los datos actuales.`;

            },
            u = j => {

            },

    Ng = () => {
        var $t,
            Qr;
        const [, t] = ut(),
            {toast: s} = tt(),
            {user: r} = As(),
            [n, a] = h.useState(""),
            [i, o] = h.useState(1),
            [l, c] = h.useState(VW),
            [d, u] = h.useState(null),
            [m, f] = h.useState(!1),
            [y, g] = h.useState(!1),
            [x, j] = h.useState("fechaActualizacion"),
            [v, p] = h.useState("desc"),
            [b, N] = h.useState(""),
            [w, C] = h.useState(""),
            [k, P] = h.useState(""),
            [D, W] = h.useState(!1),
            [L, I] = h.useState(!1),
            [z, H] = h.useState(null),
            [F, A] = h.useState(!1),
            [S, R] = h.useState(null),
            [B, oe] = h.useState(0);
        pf("/admin/vehicles/edit/:id"),
        pf("/admin/vehicles/new"),
        r && !r.isAdmin && t("/");
        const {data: O, isLoading: E, refetch: K} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles", i, n, b, w, k, x, v, l],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        const xe = new URLSearchParams;
                        xe.append("limit", l.toString()),
                        xe.append("offset", ((i - 1) * l).toString()),
                        xe.append("getTotalCount", "true"),
                        n && xe.append("search", n),
                        b && xe.append("marca", b),
                        w && xe.append("combustible", w),
                        k && xe.append("anyo", k),
                        x && xe.append("orden", `${x}_${v}`);
                        const ht = await fetch(`/api/optimized/vehicles?${xe.toString()}`);
                        if (!ht.ok)
                            throw new Error("Error al cargar vehículos");
                        return await ht.json()
                    } catch (xe) {
                        throw console.error("Error en la consulta de vehículos:", xe), xe
                    }
                },
                enabled: !D && !L,
                staleTime: 12e4,
                refetchOnWindowFocus: !1
            }),
            re = (O == null ? void 0 : O.data) || [],
            ye = (($t = O == null ? void 0 : O.pagination) == null ? void 0 : $t.total) || 0,
            Se = Math.ceil(ye / l);
        console.log("🚗 AdminVehicles Data:", {
            vehiclesCount: re.length,
            totalItems: ye,
            itemsPerPage: l,
            totalPages: Se,
            currentPage: i,
            pagination: O == null ? void 0 : O.pagination,
            fullResponse: O
        }),
        O != null && O.pagination && (console.log("📊 Pagination details:", {
            total: O.pagination.total,
            limit: O.pagination.limit,
            offset: O.pagination.offset,
            page: O.pagination.page,
            totalPages: O.pagination.totalPages,
            hasMore: O.pagination.hasMore
        }), O.pagination.total < 1e3 && console.warn("⚠️ Conteo sospechosamente bajo en AdminVehicles:", O.pagination.total));
        const T = rt({
                mutationFn: async xe => {
                    const ht = await fetch("/api/vehicles", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(xe)
                    });
                    if (!ht.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al crear vehículo");
                    return ht.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Vehículo creado",
                        description: "El vehículo ha sido creado correctamente"
                    }),
                    rn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    I(!1),
                    H(null),
                    t("/admin/vehicles")
                },
                onError: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al crear vehículo",
                        description: "No se pudo crear el vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            te = rt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: xe, data: ht}) => {
                    const Ot = await fetch(`/api/vehicles/${xe}`, {
                        method: "PUT",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(ht)
                    });
                    if (!Ot.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar vehículo");
                    return Ot.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Vehículo actualizado",
                        description: "El vehículo ha sido actualizado correctamente"
                    }),
                    rn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    W(!1),
                    H(null),
                    t("/admin/vehicles")
                },
                onError: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al actualizar vehículo",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar el vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            G = rt({
                mutationFn: async xe => {
                    const ht = await fetch(`/api/vehicles/${xe}`, {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!ht.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar vehículo");
                    return ht.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Vehículo eliminado",
                        description: "El vehículo ha sido eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    rn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    K()
                },
                onError: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar vehículo",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            se = rt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const xe = await fetch("/api/vehicles/delete-all", {
                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!xe.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar todos los vehículos");
                    return xe.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Todos los vehículos eliminados",
                        description: "Se han eliminado todos los vehículos correctamente"
                    }),
                    rn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    K()
                },
                onError: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al eliminar todos los vehículos",
                        description: "No se pudieron eliminar todos los vehículos. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            de = rt({
                mutationFn: async xe => {
                    const ht = await fetch(`/api/vehicles/${xe}/toggle`, {
                        method: "PATCH",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!ht.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cambiar estado del vehículo");
                    return ht.json()
                },
                onSuccess: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Estado cambiado",
                        description: xe.message || "El estado del vehículo ha sido cambiado correctamente"
                    }),
                    rn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/optimized/vehicles"]
                    }),
                    K()
                },
                onError: xe => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al cambiar estado",
                        description: "No se pudo cambiar el estado del vehículo. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            le = xe => {
                L ? T.mutate(xe) : z && z.id && te.mutate({
                    id: z.id,
                    data: xe
                })
            },
            me = () => {
                W(!1),
                I(!1),
                H(null),
                t("/admin/vehicles")
            },
            ve = () => {
                I(!0),
                H(null),
                t("/admin/vehicles/new")
            },
            lt = xe => {
                W(!0),
                H(xe),
                t(`/admin/vehicles/edit/${xe.id}`)
            },
            dt = xe => {
                u(xe),
                f(!0)
            },
            U = () => {
                d && G.mutate(d),
                f(!1),
                u(null)
            },
            De = () => {
                g(!0)
            },
            mt = () => {
                se.mutate(),
                g(!1)
            },
            zt = xe => {
                de.mutate(xe)
            },
            Mt = xe => {
                R(xe),
                oe(0),
                A(!0)
            },
            _ = () => {
                S != null && S.imagenes && S.imagenes.length > 0 && oe(xe => xe === S.imagenes.length - 1 ? 0 : xe + 1)
            },
            Q = () => {
                S != null && S.imagenes && S.imagenes.length > 0 && oe(xe => xe === 0 ? S.imagenes.length - 1 : xe - 1)
            },
            ie = xe => {
                xe.preventDefault(),
                o(1),
                K()
            },
            we = xe => {
                x === xe ? p(v === "asc" ? "desc" : "asc") : (j(xe), p("asc")),
                o(1)
            },
            be = xe => {
                c(xe),
                o(1)
            },
            J = Array.from(new Set(re.map(xe => xe.marca))).sort(),
            je = Array.from(new Set(re.map(xe => xe.combustible).filter(Boolean))).sort(),
            Be = (i - 1) * l + 1,
            Pt = Math.min(i * l, ye);
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {
                activeTab: "admin_vehicles"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsxs("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: [L ? "Nuevo Vehículo" : D ? "Editar Vehículo" : "Gestión de Vehículos", !L && !D && e.jsxs("span", {
                                className: "text-lg font-normal text-primary ml-2",
                                children: ["(", ye > 0 ? ye.toLocaleString() : "0", " total)"]
                            })]

            }),

                queryKey: ["/api/search-parts", i, n, v, b, w, k, y, x],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        let J = `/api/search-parts?limit=${Ed}&offset=${(i - 1) * Ed}&isAdmin=true&getTotalCount=true`;
                        n && (J += `&q=${encodeURIComponent(n)}`),
                        v && (J += `&familia=${encodeURIComponent(v)}`),
                        b !== "all" && (J += `&activo=${b === "active"}`),
                        w !== "all" && (w === "processed" ? J += "&vehicleType=processed" : w === "associated" && (J += "&vehicleType=associated")),
                        k.min && (J += `&precioMin=${k.min}`),
                        k.max && (J += `&precioMax=${k.max}`),
                        y && (J += `&orden=${y}_${x}`),
                        console.log("Admin parts query URL:", J);
                        const je = await fetch(J, {
                            credentials: "include"
                        });
                        if (!je.ok)
                            throw new Error("Error al cargar piezas");
                        const Be = await je.json();
                        return console.log("Admin parts response:", Be), Be
                    } catch (J) {
                        throw console.error("Error en la consulta de piezas:", J), J
                    }
                },
                enabled: !D && !L
            }),
            {data: E} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/optimized/parts/families"],
                queryFn: async () => (await fetch("/api/optimized/parts/families")).json()
            }),
            K = (B == null ? void 0 : B.data) || [],
            re = ((we = B == null ? void 0 : B.pagination) == null ? void 0 : we.total) || 0,
            ye = ((be = B == null ? void 0 : B.pagination) == null ? void 0 : be.filtered) || re,
            Se = Math.ceil(ye / Ed),
            T = E || [],
            te = rt({
                mutationFn: async J => {
                    const je = await fetch("/api/parts", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(J)
                    });
                    if (!je.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al crear pieza");
                    return je.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Pieza creada",
                        description: "La pieza ha sido creada correctamente"
                    }),
                    rn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]
                    }),
                    I(!1),
                    H(null),
                    t("/admin/parts")
                },
                onError: J => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error al crear pieza",
                        description: "No se pudo crear la pieza. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            G = rt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: J, data: je}) => {
                    const Be = await fetch(`/api/parts/${J}`, {
                        method: "PUT",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include",
                        body: JSON.stringify(je)
                    });
                    if (!Be.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar pieza");
                    return Be.json()

                    s({
                        title: "Pieza actualizada",
                        description: "La pieza ha sido actualizada correctamente"
                    }),
                    rn.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/search-parts"]

                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }

                mutationFn: async J => {

                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });

                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar pieza");
                    return je.json()

                    }),

                },

                    s({

                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),

                        method: "DELETE",
                        credentials: "include"
                    });

                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar todas las piezas");
                    return J.json()

                        title: "Todas las piezas eliminadas",

                    })
                }

                mutationFn: async J => {

                        throw new Error("Error al cambiar estado de la pieza");

                },

                    s({

                        description: "No se pudo cambiar el estado de la pieza. Intente nuevamente.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),

                L ? te.mutate(J) : z && z.id && G.mutate({
                    id: z.id,
                    data: J
                })
            },

                W(!1),
                I(!1),
                H(null),
                t("/admin/parts")

                H(null),

                f(!0)

                f(!1)
