                            onClose: () => A(!1)
                        }), e.jsxs(Hr, {
                            children: [e.jsx(M, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => A(!1),
                                children: "Cerrar"
                            }), S && e.jsxs(M, {
                                onClick: () => {
                                    A(!1),
                                    dt(S)
                                },
                                children: [e.jsx(Br, {
                                    className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                }), " Editar"]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(Ps, {
                    open: d,
                    onOpenChange: u,
                    children: e.jsxs(xs, {
                        children: [e.jsxs(gs, {
                            children: [e.jsx(vs, {
                                children: "Confirmar eliminación"
                            }), e.jsx(Sr, {
                                children: "¿Está seguro que desea eliminar esta pieza? Esta acción no se puede deshacer."
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(Hr, {
                            children: [e.jsx(M, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => u(!1),
                                children: "Cancelar"
                            }), e.jsx(M, {
                                variant: "destructive",
                                onClick: mt,
                                children: "Eliminar"
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(Ps, {
                    open: m,
                    onOpenChange: f,
                    children: e.jsxs(xs, {
                        children: [e.jsxs(gs, {
                            children: [e.jsx(vs, {
                                children: "Confirmar eliminación masiva"
                            }), e.jsx(Sr, {
                                children: "¿Está seguro que desea eliminar TODAS las piezas? Esta acción eliminará permanentemente todas las piezas del sistema y no se puede deshacer."
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(Hr, {
                            children: [e.jsx(M, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => f(!1),
                                children: "Cancelar"
                            }), e.jsx(M, {
                                variant: "destructive",
                                onClick: Mt,
                                children: "Eliminar todas las piezas"
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            })]
        })
    },
    HW = () => {
        var O;
        const [, t] = ut(),
            {toast: s} = tt(),
            {logout: r} = As(),
            [n, a] = h.useState(!1),
            [i, o] = h.useState(!1),
            [l, c] = h.useState(!1),
            [d, u] = h.useState(null),
            [m, f] = h.useState(""),
            [y, g] = h.useState(""),
            [x, j] = h.useState(""),
            [v, p] = h.useState("manager"),
            [b, N] = h.useState(""),
            [w, C] = h.useState(""),
            [k, P] = h.useState(""),
            [D, W] = h.useState("manager"),
            L = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/users"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    try {
                        const E = await fetch("/api/users");
                        if (!E.ok) {
                            const ye = await E.json();
                            throw new Error(ye.error || "Error al cargar usuarios")
                        }
                        const K = await E.json();
                        return console.log("Usuarios cargados:", K), K.filter(ye => ye.role === "manager" || ye.role === "admin" || ye.isAdmin) || []
                    } catch (E) {
                        throw console.error("Error en la consulta de usuarios:", E), E
                    }
                }
            }),
            I = rt({
                mutationFn: async E => {
                    const K = await fetch("/api/users", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(E)
                    });
                    if (!K.ok) {
                        const re = await K.json();
                        throw new Error(re.error || "Error al crear usuario")
                    }
                    return K.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Usuario creado",
                        description: "El usuario ha sido creado correctamente"
                    }),
                    a(!1),
                    L.refetch(),
                    f(""),
                    g(""),
                    j(""),
                    p("manager")
                },
                onError: E => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: E.message || "Error al crear usuario",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            z = rt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: E, userData: K}) => {
                    const re = await fetch(`/api/users/${E}`, {
                        method: "PUT",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(K)
                    });
                    if (!re.ok) {
                        const ye = await re.json();
                        throw new Error(ye.error || "Error al actualizar usuario")
                    }
                    return re.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Usuario actualizado",
                        description: `El usuario ${d == null ? void 0 : d.username} ha sido actualizado correctamente`
                    }),
                    o(!1),
                    L.refetch()
                },
                onError: E => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: E.message || "Error al actualizar usuario",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            H = rt({
                mutationFn: async E => {
                    const K = await fetch(`/api/users/${E}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!K.ok) {
                        const re = await K.json();
                        throw new Error(re.error || "Error al eliminar usuario")
                    }
                    return K.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    s({
                        title: "Usuario eliminado",
                        description: `El usuario ${d == null ? void 0 : d.username} ha sido eliminado correctamente`
                    }),
                    c(!1),
                    L.refetch()
                },
                onError: E => {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: E.message || "Error al eliminar usuario",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            F = async () => {
                try {
                    await r(),
                    t("/admin")
                } catch (E) {
                    console.error("Error during logout:", E)
                }
            },
            A = () => {
                if (!m || !x) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Usuario y contraseña son obligatorios",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                if (x.length < 6) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "La contraseña debe tener al menos 6 caracteres",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                I.mutate({
                    username: m,
                    password: x,
                    email: y || void 0,
                    role: v
                })
            },
            S = () => {
                if (!b) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "El nombre de usuario es obligatorio",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                if (k && k.length < 6) {
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "La contraseña debe tener al menos 6 caracteres",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    });
                    return
                }
                const E = {
                    username: b,
                    email: w || void 0,
                    role: D
                };
                k && (E.password = k),
                z.mutate({
                    id: d.id,
                    userData: E
                })
            },
            R = () => {
                H.mutate(d.id)
            },
            B = E => {
                u(E),
                N(E.username || ""),
                C(E.email || ""),
                P(""),
                W(E.role || "manager"),
                o(!0)
            },
            oe = E => {
                u(E),
                c(!0)
            };
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Gestión de Usuarios Administrativos"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: "Administre los usuarios administrativos del sistema (administradores y gestores)"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                            variant: "default",
                            onClick: () => a(!0),
                            children: [e.jsx(on, {
                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Nuevo Usuario Administrativo"]
                        }), e.jsxs(M, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: F,
                            children: [e.jsx(ka, {
                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    children: e.jsx(V, {
                        className: "p-6",
                        children: L.isLoading ? e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-center py-8",
                            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "animate-spin h-8 w-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full mx-auto mb-4"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                children: "Cargando usuarios..."
                            })]
                        }) : e.jsxs(Gs, {
                            children: [e.jsx(Ks, {
                                children: e.jsxs(vt, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "ID"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "Usuario"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "Email"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "Rol"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        children: "Último acceso"
                                    }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                        className: "text-right",
                                        children: "Acciones"
                                    })]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(Ys, {
                                children: !L.data || L.data.length === 0 ? e.jsx(vt, {
                                    children: e.jsx(fe, {
                                        colSpan: 6,
                                        className: "text-center h-32",
                                        children: "No se encontraron usuarios"
                                    })
                                }) : (O = L.data) == null ? void 0 : O.map(E => e.jsxs(vt, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(fe, {
                                        className: "font-medium",
                                        children: E.id
                                    }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                        children: E.username
                                    }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                        children: E.email || "—"
                                    }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                        children: E.isAdmin || E.role === "admin" ? e.jsx(ge, {
                                            className: "bg-primary",
                                            children: "Administrador"
                                        }) : E.role === "manager" ? e.jsx(ge, {
                                            className: "bg-blue-500 text-white",
                                            children: "Gestor"
                                        }) : e.jsx(ge, {
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            children: "Cliente"
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                        children: E.updatedAt ? new Date(E.updatedAt).toLocaleString() : "—"
                                    }), e.jsxs(fe, {
                                        className: "text-right",
                                        children: [e.jsx(M, {
                                            variant: "ghost",
                                            size: "sm",
                                            onClick: () => B(E),
                                            children: e.jsx(L5, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx(M, {
                                            variant: "ghost",
                                            size: "sm",
                                            onClick: () => oe(E),
                                            children: e.jsx(Jt, {
                                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }, E.id))
                            })]
                        })
                    })
                })]
            }), e.jsx(Ps, {
                open: n,
                onOpenChange: a,
                children: e.jsxs(xs, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(gs, {
                        children: [e.jsx(vs, {
                            children: "Añadir nuevo usuario administrativo"
                        }), e.jsx(Sr, {
                            children: "Complete el formulario para crear un nuevo usuario administrativo del sistema."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid gap-4 py-4",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "username",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Usuario"
                            }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                id: "username",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: m,
                                onChange: E => f(E.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "email",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Email"
                            }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                id: "email",
                                type: "email",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: y,
                                onChange: E => g(E.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "password",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Contraseña"
                            }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                id: "password",
                                type: "password",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: x,
                                onChange: E => j(E.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "role",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Rol"
                            }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                value: v,
                                onValueChange: p,
                                children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                    className: "col-span-3",
                                    children: e.jsx(We, {
                                        placeholder: "Seleccionar rol"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(Z, {
                                        value: "manager",
                                        children: "Gestor"
                                    }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                        value: "admin",
                                        children: "Administrador"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Hr, {
                        children: [e.jsx(M, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: () => a(!1),
                            children: "Cancelar"
                        }), e.jsx(M, {
                            onClick: A,
                            children: "Crear usuario"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(Ps, {
                open: i,
                onOpenChange: o,
                children: e.jsxs(xs, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(gs, {
                        children: [e.jsx(vs, {
                            children: "Editar usuario"
                        }), e.jsx(Sr, {
                            children: "Actualice la información del usuario."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid gap-4 py-4",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "edit-username",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Usuario"
                            }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                id: "edit-username",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: b,
                                onChange: E => N(E.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "edit-email",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Email"
                            }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                id: "edit-email",
                                type: "email",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: w,
                                onChange: E => C(E.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "edit-password",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Contraseña"
                            }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                id: "edit-password",
                                type: "password",
                                placeholder: "Nueva contraseña (dejar en blanco si no cambia)",
                                className: "col-span-3",
                                value: k,
                                onChange: E => P(E.target.value)
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-4 items-center gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "edit-role",
                                className: "text-right",
                                children: "Rol"
                            }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                value: D,
                                onValueChange: W,
                                children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                    className: "col-span-3",
                                    children: e.jsx(We, {
                                        placeholder: "Seleccionar rol"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(Z, {
                                        value: "manager",
                                        children: "Gestor"
                                    }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                        value: "admin",
                                        children: "Administrador"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Hr, {
                        children: [e.jsx(M, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: () => o(!1),
                            children: "Cancelar"
                        }), e.jsx(M, {
                            onClick: S,
                            children: "Actualizar usuario"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(Ps, {
                open: l,
                onOpenChange: c,
                children: e.jsxs(xs, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(gs, {
                        children: [e.jsx(vs, {
                            children: "Eliminar usuario"
                        }), e.jsxs(Sr, {
                            children: ["¿Está seguro de que desea eliminar al usuario ", d == null ? void 0 : d.username, "? Esta acción no se puede deshacer."]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Hr, {
                        children: [e.jsx(M, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: () => c(!1),
                            children: "Cancelar"
                        }), e.jsx(M, {
                            variant: "destructive",
                            onClick: R,
                            children: "Eliminar"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    },
    WW = () => {
        const [t, s] = h.useState(""),
            [r, n] = h.useState("all"),
            [a, i] = h.useState(""),
            [o, l] = h.useState(null),
            [c, d] = h.useState(null),
            [u, m] = h.useState(!1),
            [f, y] = h.useState(!1),
            [g, x] = h.useState(!1),
            [j, v] = h.useState(null),
            [p, b] = h.useState({}),
            {toast: N} = tt(),
            w = fr(),
            {data: C, isLoading: k} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/clients"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const E = await fetch("/api/admin/clients");
                    if (!E.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar clientes");
                    return (await E.json()).filter(re => re.role === "customer" && !re.isAdmin)
                }
            }),
            {data: P, isLoading: D} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/guest-orders"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const E = await fetch("/api/admin/guest-orders");
                    if (!E.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar pedidos de invitados");
                    return E.json()
                }
            }),
            W = (C == null ? void 0 : C.filter(E => {
                const K = E.firstName.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()) || E.lastName.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()) || E.email.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()) || E.username.toLowerCase().includes(t.toLowerCase()),
                    re = r === "all" || E.province === r;
                return K && re
            })) || [],
            L = (P == null ? void 0 : P.filter(E => E.guestName.toLowerCase().includes(a.toLowerCase()) || E.guestEmail.toLowerCase().includes(a.toLowerCase()) || E.orderNumber.toLowerCase().includes(a.toLowerCase()))) || [],
            I = [...new Set(C == null ? void 0 : C.map(E => E.province).filter(Boolean))],
            z = E => {
                switch (E) {
                case "admin":
                    return "destructive";
                case "manager":
                    return "secondary";
                case "customer":
                    return "default";
                default:
                    return "outline"
                }
            },
            H = E => {
                switch (E) {
                case "admin":
                    return "Administrador";
                case "manager":
                    return "Gestor";
                case "customer":
                    return "Cliente";
                default:
                    return E
                }
            },
            F = rt({
                mutationFn: async ({id: E, data: K}) => {
                    const re = {
                            firstName: K.firstName,
                            lastName: K.lastName,
                            email: K.email,
                            phone: K.phone,
                            address: K.address,
                            city: K.city,
                            postalCode: K.postalCode,
                            province: K.province,
                            shippingAddress: K.shippingAddress,
                            shippingCity: K.shippingCity,
                            shippingPostalCode: K.shippingPostalCode,
                            shippingProvince: K.shippingProvince,
                            billingAddress: K.billingAddress,
                            billingCity: K.billingCity,
                            billingPostalCode: K.billingPostalCode,
                            billingProvince: K.billingProvince
                        },
                        ye = await fetch(`/api/admin/users/${E}`, {
                            method: "PUT",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(re)
                        });
                    if (!ye.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar cliente");
                    return ye.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    w.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/clients"]
                    }),
                    N({
                        title: "Cliente actualizado",
                        description: "Los datos del cliente se han actualizado correctamente"
                    }),
                    y(!1),
                    d(null),
                    b({})
                },
                onError: E => {
                    N({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar el cliente",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    }),
                    console.error("Error updating client:", E)
                }
            }),
            A = rt({
                mutationFn: async E => {
                    const K = await fetch(`/api/admin/users/${E}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!K.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar cliente");
                    return K.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    w.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/clients"]
                    }),
                    N({
                        title: "Cliente eliminado",
                        description: "El cliente ha sido eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    x(!1),
                    v(null)
                },
                onError: E => {
                    N({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el cliente",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    }),
                    console.error("Error deleting client:", E)
                }
            }),
            S = E => {
                l(E),
                m(!0)
            },
            R = E => {
                d(E),
                b({
                    firstName: E.firstName,
                    lastName: E.lastName,
                    email: E.email,
                    phone: E.phone,
                    address: E.address,
                    city: E.city,
                    postalCode: E.postalCode,
                    province: E.province,
                    shippingAddress: E.shippingAddress || E.address,
                    shippingCity: E.shippingCity || E.city,
                    shippingPostalCode: E.shippingPostalCode || E.postalCode,
                    shippingProvince: E.shippingProvince || E.province,
                    billingAddress: E.billingAddress || E.address,
                    billingCity: E.billingCity || E.city,
                    billingPostalCode: E.billingPostalCode || E.postalCode,
                    billingProvince: E.billingProvince || E.province
                }),
                y(!0)
            },
            B = E => {
                v(E),
                x(!0)
            },
            oe = () => {
                c && F.mutate({
                    id: c.id,
                    data: p
                })
            },

                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Rol"
                                        }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                            variant: z(o.role),
                                            className: "px-3 py-1",
                                            children: H(o.role)
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between py-2 border-b border-gray-100",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Fecha de registro"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-gray-900",
                                            children: new Date(o.createdAt).toLocaleDateString("es-ES")
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between py-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Última actualización"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-gray-900",
                                            children: new Date(o.updatedAt).toLocaleDateString("es-ES")
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "bg-white rounded-lg p-6 border border-gray-200 shadow-sm",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-3 mb-4",
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "w-8 h-8 bg-emerald-500 rounded-lg flex items-center justify-center",
                                        children: e.jsx(At, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 text-white"
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                        className: "text-lg font-semibold text-gray-800",
                                        children: "Estadísticas de Pedidos"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-3",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between py-2 border-b border-gray-100",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Total de pedidos"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                                            children: o.totalOrders || o.orderCount || 0
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between py-2 border-b border-gray-100",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Total gastado"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-xl font-bold text-gray-900",
                                            children: o.totalSpent ? `${Number(o.totalSpent).toFixed(2)}€` : "0.00€"
                                        })]
                                    }), o.lastOrderDate && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between py-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium text-gray-600",
                                            children: "Último pedido"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-gray-900",
                                            children: new Date(o.lastOrderDate).toLocaleDateString("es-ES")
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Hr, {
                        className: "pt-6 border-t border-gray-200",
                        children: [e.jsx(M, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            onClick: () => m(!1),
                            children: "Cerrar"
                        }), e.jsx(M, {
                            onClick: () => {
                                m(!1),
                                o && R(o)
                            },
                            children: "Editar Cliente"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(Ps, {
                open: f,
                onOpenChange: y,
                children: e.jsxs(xs, {
                    className: "max-w-4xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
                    children: [e.jsxs(gs, {
                        children: [e.jsx(vs, {
                            children: "Editar Cliente"
                        }), e.jsx(Sr, {
                            children: "Modifica la información del cliente"
                        })]
                    }), c && e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "editFirstName",
                                    children: "Nombre"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "editFirstName",
                                    value: p.firstName || "",
                                    onChange: E => b(K => ({
                                        ...K,
                                        firstName: E.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Nombre"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "editLastName",
                                    children: "Apellidos"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "editLastName",
                                    value: p.lastName || "",
                                    onChange: E => b(K => ({
                                        ...K,
                                        lastName: E.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Apellidos"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "editEmail",
                                    children: "Email"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "editEmail",
                                    type: "email",
                                    value: p.email || "",
                                    onChange: E => b(K => ({
                                        ...K,
                                        email: E.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Email"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                    children: "Teléfono"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "editPhone",

                                    onChange: E => b(K => ({
                                        ...K,
                                        phone: E.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Teléfono"
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                className: "text-lg font-semibold mb-3",
                                children: "Dirección de Envío"

                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]

                                className: "text-lg font-semibold mb-3",

                        }), e.jsx(M, {
                            onClick: oe,
