                            children: F.isPending ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar Cambios"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsx(Fi, {
                open: g,
                onOpenChange: x,
                children: e.jsxs(Za, {
                    children: [e.jsxs(Qa, {
                        children: [e.jsx(Ja, {
                            children: "¿Eliminar cliente?"
                        }), e.jsxs(ei, {
                            children: ["Esta acción no se puede deshacer. Se eliminará permanentemente el cliente", j && ` "${j.firstName} ${j.lastName}"`, "y todos sus datos asociados."]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(Xa, {
                        children: [e.jsx(si, {
                            children: "Cancelar"
                        }), e.jsx(ti, {
                            onClick: O,
                            className: "bg-red-600 hover:bg-red-700",
                            disabled: A.isPending,
                            children: A.isPending ? "Eliminando..." : "Eliminar"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })
    },
    ja = ({children: t}) => e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
        children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-8",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "mb-6"
            }), e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex-1",
                children: t
            })]
        })]
    });
function GW({order: t, isOpen: s, onClose: r}) {
    const {toast: n} = tt(),
        a = fr(),
        i = h.useRef(null),
        o = h.useRef(null),
        [l, c] = h.useState({
            transportAgency: (t == null ? void 0 : t.transportAgency) || "",
            expeditionNumber: (t == null ? void 0 : t.expeditionNumber) || "",
            adminObservations: (t == null ? void 0 : t.adminObservations) || "",
            documents: (t == null ? void 0 : t.documents) || [],
            invoicePdf: (t == null ? void 0 : t.invoicePdf) || ""
        }),
        [d, u] = h.useState(!1),
        m = rt({
            mutationFn: p => (console.log("🚀 Frontend: Enviando actualización de pedido:", {
                orderId: t.id,
                url: `/api/admin/orders/${t.id}/update-admin-info`,
                data: p
            }), Ie("PATCH", `/api/admin/orders/${t.id}/update-admin-info`, p)),
            onSuccess: p => {
                console.log("✅ Frontend: Actualización exitosa:", p),
                n({
                    title: "Pedido actualizado",
                    description: "La información adicional se ha guardado correctamente."
                }),
                a.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                r()
            },
            onError: p => {
                var b,
                    N,
                    w,
                    C;
                console.error("❌ Frontend: Error al actualizar pedido:", p),
                console.error("❌ Frontend: Error details:", {
                    message: p.message,
                    response: (b = p.response) == null ? void 0 : b.data,
                    status: (N = p.response) == null ? void 0 : N.status
                }),
                n({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: ((C = (w = p.response) == null ? void 0 : w.data) == null ? void 0 : C.error) || p.message || "No se pudo actualizar el pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        f = async (p, b) => {
            console.log("📤 Iniciando upload de archivo:", {
                fileName: p.name,
                fileSize: p.size,
                orderId: t.id,
                type: b
            });
            const N = new FormData;
            N.append("file", p),
            N.append("orderId", t.id.toString()),
            N.append("type", b);
            try {
                const w = await fetch("/api/upload/order-document", {
                    method: "POST",
                    body: N,
                    credentials: "same-origin"
                });
                if (console.log("📡 Response status:", w.status), !w.ok) {
                    const k = await w.json().catch(() => ({}));
                    throw console.error("❌ Upload error:", {
                        status: w.status,
                        error: k
                    }), new Error(k.error || `Error HTTP ${w.status}: No se pudo subir el archivo`)
                }
                const C = await w.json();
                return console.log("✅ Upload exitoso:", C), C.filePath
            } catch (w) {
                throw console.error("❌ Error en uploadFile:", w), new Error(w.message || "Error al subir archivo")
            }
        },
        y = async p => {
            const b = p.target.files;
            if (b) {
                u(!0);
                try {
                    const N = Array.from(b).map(C => f(C, "document")),
                        w = await Promise.all(N);
                    c(C => ({
                        ...C,
                        documents: [...C.documents, ...w]
                    })),
                    n({
                        title: "Documentos subidos",
                        description: `Se han subido ${b.length} documento(s) correctamente.`
                    })
                } catch (N) {
                    console.error("❌ Error en handleDocumentUpload:", N),
                    n({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: N.message || "Error al subir los documentos.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    u(!1),
                    i.current && (i.current.value = "")
                }
            }
        },
        g = async p => {
            var w;
            const b = (w = p.target.files) == null ? void 0 : w[0];
            if (!b)
                return;
            if (!["application/pdf", "image/jpeg", "image/jpg", "image/png"].includes(b.type)) {
                n({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "Solo se permiten archivos PDF e imágenes (JPG, PNG) para la factura.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                });
                return
            }
            u(!0);
            try {
                const C = await f(b, "invoice");
                c(k => ({
                    ...k,
                    invoicePdf: C
                })),
                n({
                    title: "Factura subida",
                    description: "La factura se ha subido correctamente."
                })
            } catch (C) {
                console.error("❌ Error en handleInvoiceUpload:", C),
                n({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: C.message || "Error al subir la factura.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                u(!1),
                o.current && (o.current.value = "")
            }
        },
        x = p => {
            c(b => ({
                ...b,
                documents: b.documents.filter((N, w) => w !== p)
            }))
        },
        j = () => {
            c(p => ({
                ...p,
                invoicePdf: ""
            }))
        },
        v = p => {
            p.preventDefault(),
            m.mutate(l)
        };
    return t ? e.jsx(Ps, {
        open: s,
        onOpenChange: r,
        children: e.jsxs(xs, {
            className: "max-w-2xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
            children: [e.jsx(gs, {
                children: e.jsxs(vs, {
                    children: ["Información Adicional - Pedido ", t.orderNumber]
                })
            }), e.jsxs("form", {
                onSubmit: v,
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "bg-gray-50 p-4 rounded-lg",
                    children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                        className: "font-semibold mb-2",
                        children: "Información del Pedido"
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-4 text-sm",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Cliente:"
                            }), " ", t.customerName]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Email:"
                            }), " ", t.customerEmail]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Total:"
                            }), " ", t.total, "€"]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium",
                                children: "Estado:"
                            }), " ", t.orderStatus]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            htmlFor: "transportAgency",
                            children: "Agencia de Transporte"
                        }), e.jsx(ee, {
                            id: "transportAgency",
                            value: l.transportAgency,
                            onChange: p => c(b => ({
                                ...b,
                                transportAgency: p.target.value
                            })),
                            placeholder: "Nombre de la agencia de transporte"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            htmlFor: "expeditionNumber",
                            children: "Número de Expedición"
                        }), e.jsx(ee, {
                            id: "expeditionNumber",
                            value: l.expeditionNumber,
                            onChange: p => c(b => ({
                                ...b,
                                expeditionNumber: p.target.value
                            })),
                            placeholder: "Número de seguimiento o expedición"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            htmlFor: "adminObservations",
                            children: "Observaciones"
                        }), e.jsx(Ut, {
                            id: "adminObservations",
                            value: l.adminObservations,
                            onChange: p => c(b => ({
                                ...b,
                                adminObservations: p.target.value
                            })),
                            placeholder: "Observaciones adicionales para el cliente...",
                            rows: 4
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            children: "Documentos"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "mt-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                                type: "button",
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => {
                                    var p;
                                    return (p = i.current) == null ? void 0 : p.click()
                                },
                                disabled: d,
                                className: "mb-3",
                                children: [e.jsx(li, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                }), d ? "Subiendo..." : "Subir Documentos"]
                            }), e.jsx("input", {
                                ref: i,
                                type: "file",
                                multiple: !0,
                                accept: ".pdf,.jpg,.jpeg,.png",
                                onChange: y,
                                className: "hidden"
                            }), l.documents.length > 0 && e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: l.documents.map((p, b) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between bg-gray-50 p-2 rounded",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center",
                                        children: [e.jsx(Kn, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-sm",
                                            children: p.split("/").pop()
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx(M, {
                                        type: "button",
                                        variant: "ghost",
                                        size: "sm",
                                        onClick: () => x(b),
                                        children: e.jsx(tr, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                }, b))
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                            children: "Factura (PDF o Imagen)"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "mt-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                                type: "button",
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => {
                                    var p;
                                    return (p = o.current) == null ? void 0 : p.click()
                                },
                                disabled: d,
                                className: "mb-3",
                                children: [e.jsx(li, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                }), d ? "Subiendo..." : "Subir Factura (PDF/Imagen)"]
                            }), e.jsx("input", {
                                ref: o,
                                type: "file",
                                accept: ".pdf,.jpg,.jpeg,.png",
                                onChange: g,
                                className: "hidden"
                            }), l.invoicePdf && e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center justify-between bg-gray-50 p-2 rounded",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Kn, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-sm",
                                        children: l.invoicePdf.split("/").pop()
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsx(M, {
                                    type: "button",
                                    variant: "ghost",
                                    size: "sm",
                                    onClick: j,
                                    children: e.jsx(tr, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4"
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-end space-x-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(M, {
                        type: "button",
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: r,
                        children: "Cancelar"
                    }), e.jsx(M, {
                        type: "submit",
                        disabled: m.isPending || d,
                        children: m.isPending ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar Cambios"
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })
    }) : null
}
const z1 = {
        pagado: {
            label: "Pagado",
            color: "bg-green-100 text-green-800 border-green-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Rt, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            })
        },
        pendiente: {
            label: "Pendiente",
            color: "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 border-yellow-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Bs, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            })
        }
    },
    $1 = {
        pendiente_verificar: {
            label: "Pendiente Verificar",
            color: "bg-orange-100 text-orange-800 border-orange-200",
            icon: e.jsx(bl, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido está pendiente de verificación"
        },
        verificado: {
            label: "Verificado",
            color: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border-blue-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Rt, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido verificado"
        },
        embalado: {
            label: "Embalado",
            color: "bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 border-purple-200",
            icon: e.jsx(At, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido está embalado"
        },
        enviado: {
            label: "Enviado",
            color: "bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-800 border-indigo-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Ws, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido enviado"
        },
        incidencia: {
            label: "Incidencia",
            color: "bg-red-100 text-red-800 border-red-200",
            icon: e.jsx(_s, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Hay una incidencia con el pedido"
        }
    },
    KW = {
        pending: {
            label: "Pendiente",
            color: "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 border-yellow-200",
            icon: e.jsx(bl, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido está pendiente de verificación"
        },
        processing: {
            label: "En Proceso",
            color: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border-blue-200",
            icon: e.jsx(At, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido está siendo procesado"
        },
        shipped: {
            label: "Enviado",
            color: "bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 border-purple-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Ws, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido enviado"
        },
        delivered: {
            label: "Entregado",
            color: "bg-green-100 text-green-800 border-green-200",
            icon: e.jsx(At, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido entregado"
        },
        cancelled: {
            label: "Cancelado",
            color: "bg-red-100 text-red-800 border-red-200",
            icon: e.jsx(_s, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "El pedido ha sido cancelado"
        }
    };
function YW({order: t, isOpen: s, onClose: r}) {
    const [n, a] = h.useState(null),
        [i, o] = h.useState(!1),
        l = async () => {
            if (t != null && t.id) {
                o(!0);
                try {
                    const u = await fetch(`/api/admin/orders/${t.id}`);
                    if (!u.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido");
                    const m = await u.json();
                    a(m)
                } catch (u) {
                    console.error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido:", u)
                } finally {
                    o(!1)
                }
            }
        };
    if (h.useEffect(() => {
        s && l()
    }, [s, t == null ? void 0 : t.id]), h.useEffect(() => {
        s && t && l()
    }, [t == null ? void 0 : t.orderStatus, t == null ? void 0 : t.paymentStatus, t == null ? void 0 : t.updatedAt, t == null ? void 0 : t._refetch]), !t)
        return null;
    const c = z1[n == null ? void 0 : n.paymentStatus] || z1.pendiente,
        d = $1[n == null ? void 0 : n.orderStatus] || KW[n == null ? void 0 : n.status] || $1.pendiente_verificar;
    return e.jsx(Ps, {
        open: s,
        onOpenChange: r,
        children: e.jsxs(xs, {
            className: "max-w-4xl max-h-[90vh] overflow-y-auto",
            children: [e.jsx(gs, {
                children: e.jsxs(vs, {
                    children: ["Detalles del Pedido #", t.orderNumber]
                })
            }), i ? e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex items-center justify-center py-8",
                children: e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "animate-spin h-8 w-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
                })
            }) : n ? e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",
                    children: [e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "pt-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                                children: [e.jsx(bl, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                                }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                    className: "font-semibold",
                                    children: "Fecha del Pedido"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                children: Bt(new Date(n.createdAt), "PPP", {
                                    locale: ks
                                })
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                children: Bt(new Date(n.createdAt), "p", {
                                    locale: ks
                                })
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "pt-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                                children: [e.jsx(At, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                                }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                    className: "font-semibold",
                                    children: "Total del Pedido"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                                children: jt(n.total, !1)
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                children: "IVA incluido"
                            })]
                        })
                    }), e.jsx($, {
                        children: e.jsxs(V, {
                            className: "pt-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                                children: [e.jsx(ps, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                                }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                    className: "font-semibold",
                                    children: "Estados del Pedido"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "mb-3",
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600 mb-1",
                                    children: "Estado del Pago:"
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: `inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm ${c.color}`,
                                    children: [c.icon, e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "ml-2 font-medium",
                                        children: c.label
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-600 mb-1",
                                    children: "Estado del Pedido:"
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: `inline-flex items-center px-3 py-1 rounded-full text-sm ${d.color}`,
                                    children: [d.icon, e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "ml-2 font-medium",
                                        children: d.label
                                    })]
                                }), d.description && e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-sm text-gray-500 mt-2",
                                    children: d.description
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Lr, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                                }), "Información del Cliente"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                        children: "Nombre:"
                                    }), " ", n.customerName]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                        children: "Email:"
                                    }), " ", n.customerEmail]
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                        children: "Teléfono:"
                                    }), " ", n.customerPhone]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(uo, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                                }), "Dirección de Envío"]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                    children: n.shippingAddress
                                }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                    children: [n.shippingCity, ", ", n.shippingPostalCode]
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    children: n.shippingCountry
                                }), n.shippingCost && e.jsxs("p", {
                                    children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                                        children: "Costo de envío:"
                                    }), " ", jt(n.shippingCost, !1)]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                }), (n.transportAgency || n.expeditionNumber || n.adminObservations) && e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(Ws, {
                                className: "h-5 w-5"
                            }), "Información de Transporte"]
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "space-y-3",
                        children: [n.transportAgency && e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                                children: "Agencia de transporte:"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-900",
                                children: n.transportAgency
                            })]
                        }), n.expeditionNumber && e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                                children: "Número de expedición:"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-900 font-mono",
                                children: n.expeditionNumber
                            })]
                        }), n.adminObservations && e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                                children: "Observaciones:"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-gray-900",
                                children: n.adminObservations
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }), n.documents && n.documents.length > 0 || n.invoicePdf ? e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(Kn, {
                                className: "h-5 w-5"
                            }), "Documentos del Pedido"]
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "space-y-4",
                        children: [n.documents && n.documents.length > 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                className: "font-medium text-gray-700 mb-3",
                                children: "Documentos:"
                            }), e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-2",
                                children: n.documents.map((u, m) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center justify-between bg-gray-50 p-3 rounded-lg",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center",
                                        children: [e.jsx(Kn, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "text-sm",
                                            children: u.split("/").pop()
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs(M, {
                                        variant: "outline",
                                        size: "sm",
                                        onClick: () => window.open(u, "_blank"),
                                        children: [e.jsx(Or, {
                                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-1"
                                        }), "Descargar"]
                                    })]
                                }, m))
                            })]
                        }), n.invoicePdf && e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                className: "font-medium text-gray-700 mb-3",
                                children: "Factura:"
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center justify-between bg-blue-50 p-3 rounded-lg",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Kn, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2 text-blue-500"
                                    }), e.jsx("span", {
                                        className: "text-sm font-medium",
                                        children: n.invoicePdf.split("/").pop()
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs(M, {
                                    variant: "outline",
                                    size: "sm",
                                    onClick: () => window.open(n.invoicePdf, "_blank"),
                                    children: [e.jsx(Or, {
                                        className: "w-4 h-4 mr-1"
                                    }), "Descargar"]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                }) : null, e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Artículos del Pedido"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: n.items && n.items.length > 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: [n.items.map((u, m) => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-start justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex-1",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2 mb-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(At, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                                        }), e.jsx("h4", {
                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                            children: u.partName || u.descripcionArticulo
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-1 text-sm text-gray-600",
                                        children: [u.partFamily && e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Familia:"
                                            }), " ", u.partFamily]
                                        }), u.partReference && e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Referencia:"
                                            }), " ", u.partReference]
                                        }), (u.vehicleBrand || u.vehicleModel || u.vehicleMarca || u.vehicleModelo) && e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Vehículo:"
                                            }), (u.vehicleBrand || u.vehicleMarca) && ` ${u.vehicleBrand || u.vehicleMarca}`, (u.vehicleModel || u.vehicleModelo) && ` ${u.vehicleModel || u.vehicleModelo}`, (u.vehicleYear || u.vehicleAnyo) && ` (${u.vehicleYear || u.vehicleAnyo})`]
                                        }), u.vehicleVersion && e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "font-medium",
                                                children: "Versión:"
                                            }), " ", u.vehicleVersion]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "text-right",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                        className: "font-semibold",
                                        children: [jt(u.price, !1), " × ", u.quantity]
                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                                        children: ["Total: ", jt((parseFloat(u.price) || 0) * u.quantity, !1)]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }, m)), e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "mt-6 pt-4 border-t border-gray-200",
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: "Subtotal productos:"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: jt(n.subtotal || 0, !1)
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between text-sm",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: "Gastos de envío:"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: jt(n.shippingCost || 0, !1)
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between font-bold text-lg pt-2 border-t",
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: "Total del pedido:"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: jt(n.total || 0, !1)
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })
                            })]
                        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-center py-8 text-gray-500",
                            children: [e.jsx(At, {
                                className: "h-12 w-12 mx-auto mb-4 opacity-50"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                children: "No se encontraron artículos en este pedido."
                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                }), n.notes && e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Notas del Pedido"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-600",
                            children: n.notes
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            }) : e.jsx("div", {
                className: "text-center py-8",
                children: e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                    children: "No se pudieron cargar los detalles del pedido"
                })
            })]
        })
    })
}
const V1 = () => {
    ut();
    const t = fr(),
        {toast: s} = tt(),
        [r, n] = h.useState(""),
        [a, i] = h.useState("all"),
        [o, l] = h.useState("all"),
        [c, d] = h.useState("all"),
        [u, m] = h.useState(null),
        [f, y] = h.useState(!1),
        [g, x] = h.useState(null),
        [j, v] = h.useState(!1),
        [p, b] = h.useState(new Set),
        [N, w] = h.useState({}),
        [C, k] = h.useState(new Set),
        {data: P, isLoading: D, error: W} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
        }),
        L = h.useMemo(() => !P || !Array.isArray(P) ? [] : P.filter(E => {
            var T,
                te,
                G;
            const K = r === "" || ((T = E.customerEmail) == null ? void 0 : T.toLowerCase().includes(r.toLowerCase())) || ((te = E.customerName) == null ? void 0 : te.toLowerCase().includes(r.toLowerCase())) || E.id.toString().includes(r) || ((G = E.orderNumber) == null ? void 0 : G.toLowerCase().includes(r.toLowerCase())),
                re = a === "all" || E.paymentStatus === a,
                ye = o === "all" || E.orderStatus === o,
                Se = (() => {
                    if (c === "all")
                        return !0;
                    const se = new Date(E.createdAt),
                        de = new Date;
                    switch (c) {
                    case "today":
                        return se.toDateString() === de.toDateString();
                    case "week":
                        const le = new Date(de.getTime() - 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1e3);
                        return se >= le;
                    case "month":
                        const me = new Date(de.getTime() - 30 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1e3);
                        return se >= me;
                    default:
                        return !0
                    }
                })();
            return K && re && ye && Se
        }), [P, r, a, o, c]),
        I = rt({
            mutationFn: async ({orderId: E, paymentStatus: K}) => Ie(`/api/admin/orders/${E}/payment-status`, {
                method: "PATCH",
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    paymentStatus: K
                }),
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                }
            }),
            onSuccess: (E, {orderId: K}) => {
                t.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                g && x(re => re ? {
                    ...re,
                    _refetch: Date.now()
                } : null),
                w(re => {
                    const ye = {
                        ...re
                    };
                    return delete ye[K], ye
                }),
                s({
                    title: "Estado actualizado",
                    description: "El estado del pago ha sido actualizado correctamente."
                })
            },
            onError: E => {
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: E.message || "Error al actualizar el estado del pago.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        z = rt({
            mutationFn: async ({orderId: E, status: K}) => Ie(`/api/admin/orders/${E}/order-status`, {
                method: "PATCH",
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    orderStatus: K
                }),
                headers: {
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                }
            }),
            onSuccess: (E, {orderId: K}) => {
                t.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                g && x(re => re ? {
                    ...re,
                    _refetch: Date.now()
                } : null),
                w(re => {
                    const ye = {
                        ...re
                    };
                    return delete ye[K], ye
                }),
                s({
                    title: "Estado actualizado",
                    description: "El estado del pedido ha sido actualizado correctamente."
                })
            },
            onError: E => {
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: E.message || "Error al actualizar el estado del pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        H = rt({
            mutationFn: async E => Ie(`/api/admin/orders/${E}`, {
                method: "DELETE"
            }),
            onSuccess: () => {
                t.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/orders"]
                }),
                s({
                    title: "Pedido eliminado",
                    description: "El pedido ha sido eliminado correctamente."
                })
            },
            onError: E => {
                s({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: E.message || "Error al eliminar el pedido.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        F = (E, K) => {
            I.mutate({
                orderId: E,
                paymentStatus: K
            })
        },
        A = (E, K) => {
            z.mutate({
                orderId: E,
                status: K
            })
        },
        S = E => {
            x(E),
            v(!0)
        },
        R = () => {
            u && w(E => {
                const K = {
                    ...E
                };
                return delete K[u.id], K
            }),
            y(!1),
            m(null)
        },
        B = async E => {
            const K = new Set(p);
            K.has(E) ? K.delete(E) : (K.add(E), N[E] || await oe(E)),
            b(K)
        },
        oe = async E => {
            const K = new Set(C);
            K.add(E),
            k(K);
            try {
                const re = await fetch(`/api/admin/orders/${E}`);
                if (!re.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido");
                const ye = await re.json();
                w(Se => ({
                    ...Se,
                    [E]: ye
                }))
            } catch (re) {
                console.error("Error al cargar detalles del pedido:", re),
                s({
                    title: "Error",
