            onClose: () => {
                v(!1),
                x(null)
            },
            order: g
        }), f && u && e.jsx(GW, {
            isOpen: f,
            onClose: R,
            order: u
        })]
    })
};
function ZW() {
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        [s, r] = ke.useState([]),
        [n, a] = ke.useState({
            merchantCode: "",
            terminal: "001",
            secretKey: "",
            environment: "test"
        }),
        [i, o] = ke.useState({
            name: "",
            description: "",
            basePrice: "",
            freeShippingThreshold: "",
            weightBasedPricing: !1,
            pricePerKg: "",
            estimatedDays: "1",
            isActive: !0
        });
    ke.useEffect(() => {
        l(),
        c()
    }, []);
    const l = async () => {
            try {
                const m = await Ie("GET", "/api/shipping/methods");
                if (m.ok) {
                    const f = await m.json();
                    r(f)
                }
            } catch (m) {
                console.error("Error loading shipping methods:", m)
            }
        },
        c = async () => {
            try {
                const m = await Ie("GET", "/api/admin/site-config/redsys_config");
                if (m.ok) {
                    const f = await m.json();
                    f.value && a(JSON.parse(f.value))
                }
            } catch (m) {
                console.error("Error loading Redsys config:", m)
            }
        },
        d = async () => {
            try {
                (await Ie("POST", "/api/admin/site-config", {
                    key: "redsys_config",
                    value: JSON.stringify(n),
                    description: "Configuración de Redsys para pagos con tarjeta"
                })).ok && t({
                    title: "Configuración guardada",
                    description: "La configuración de Redsys se ha guardado correctamente"
                })
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        u = async () => {
            try {
                (await Ie("POST", "/api/admin/shipping/methods", {
                    ...i,
                    basePrice: parseFloat(i.basePrice) || 0,
                    freeShippingThreshold: i.freeShippingThreshold ? parseFloat(i.freeShippingThreshold) : null,
                    pricePerKg: parseFloat(i.pricePerKg) || 0,
                    estimatedDays: parseInt(i.estimatedDays) || 1
                })).ok && (t({
                    title: "Método creado",
                    description: "El método de envío se ha creado correctamente"
                }), l(), o({
                    name: "",
                    description: "",
                    basePrice: "",
                    freeShippingThreshold: "",
                    weightBasedPricing: !1,
                    pricePerKg: "",
                    estimatedDays: "1",
                    isActive: !0
                }))
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo crear el método de envío",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        };
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
            className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-8",
            children: "Configuración de Pagos y Envíos"
        }), e.jsxs(ls, {
            defaultValue: "shipping",
            className: "space-y-6",
            children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                children: [e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "shipping",
                    children: "Métodos de Envío"
                }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "payments",
                    children: "Configuración de Pagos"
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                value: "shipping",
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Crear Nuevo Método de Envío"
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "space-y-4",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "name",
                                    children: "Nombre"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "name",
                                    value: i.name,
                                    onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        name: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Envío estándar"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "basePrice",
                                    children: "Precio base (€)"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "basePrice",
                                    type: "number",
                                    step: "0.01",
                                    value: i.basePrice,
                                    onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        basePrice: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "5.95"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "freeThreshold",
                                    children: "Envío gratuito desde (€)"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "freeThreshold",
                                    type: "number",
                                    step: "0.01",
                                    value: i.freeShippingThreshold,
                                    onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        freeShippingThreshold: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "50.00"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "estimatedDays",
                                    children: "Días estimados"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "estimatedDays",
                                    type: "number",
                                    value: i.estimatedDays,
                                    onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        estimatedDays: m.target.value
                                    }))
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "description",
                                children: "Descripción"
                            }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                id: "description",
                                value: i.description,
                                onChange: m => o(f => ({
                                    ...f,
                                    description: m.target.value
                                })),
                                placeholder: "Envío en 24-48 horas laborables"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                id: "isActive",
                                checked: i.isActive,
                                onCheckedChange: m => o(f => ({
                                    ...f,
                                    isActive: m
                                }))
                            }), e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "isActive",
                                children: "Activo"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(M, {
                            onClick: u,
                            children: "Crear Método"
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Métodos de Envío Existentes"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "space-y-4",
                            children: s.map(m => e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "border p-4 rounded-lg",
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex justify-between items-start",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                            className: "font-semibold",
                                            children: m.name
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                                            children: m.description
                                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                            className: "text-sm",
                                            children: ["Precio: ", m.basePrice, "€", m.freeShippingThreshold && e.jsxs("span", {
                                                children: [" (Gratuito desde ", m.freeShippingThreshold, "€)"]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                        children: e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: `px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs ${m.isActive ? "bg-green-100 text-green-800" : "bg-red-100 text-red-800"}`,
                                            children: m.isActive ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })
                            }, m.id))
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            }), e.jsx(ze, {
                value: "payments",
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(ae, {
                            children: "Configuración de Redsys"
                        })
                    }), e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "space-y-4",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "merchantCode",
                                    children: "Código de comercio"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "merchantCode",
                                    value: n.merchantCode,
                                    onChange: m => a(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        merchantCode: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "123456789"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "terminal",
                                    children: "Terminal"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "terminal",
                                    value: n.terminal,
                                    onChange: m => a(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        terminal: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "001"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "md:col-span-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "secretKey",
                                    children: "Clave secreta"
                                }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                    id: "secretKey",
                                    type: "password",
                                    value: n.secretKey,
                                    onChange: m => a(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        secretKey: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    placeholder: "Clave secreta de Redsys"
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                    htmlFor: "environment",
                                    children: "Entorno"
                                }), e.jsxs("select", {
                                    id: "environment",
                                    className: "w-full p-2 border rounded",
                                    value: n.environment,
                                    onChange: m => a(f => ({
                                        ...f,
                                        environment: m.target.value
                                    })),
                                    children: [e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "test",
                                        children: "Pruebas"
                                    }), e.jsx("option", {
                                        value: "production",
                                        children: "Producción"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(M, {
                            onClick: d,
                            children: "Guardar Configuración"
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })]
    })
}
const QW = {
    bank_transfer: b5,
    redsys: ps,
    stripe: ps,
    paypal: ps
};
function XW() {
    var b,
        N,
        w;
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        [s, r] = h.useState([]),
        [n, a] = h.useState(!0),
        [i, o] = h.useState(""),
        [l, c] = h.useState({}),
        [d, u] = h.useState(!1),
        [m, f] = h.useState({});
    h.useEffect(() => {
        y()
    }, []);
    const y = async () => {
            try {
                console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Cargando módulos...");
                const C = await Ie("GET", "/api/admin/payment-modules");
                console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Response object:", C);
                const k = await C.json();
                if (console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Data después de JSON:", k), console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Tipo de data:", typeof k), console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Es array?", Array.isArray(k)), Array.isArray(k)) {
                    console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Módulos válidos:", k.length),
                    console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Primer módulo:", k[0]),
                    r(k);
                    const P = {};
                    k.forEach(D => {
                        P[D.provider] = D.isActive
                    }),
                    f(P),
                    console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Estados de módulos:", P),
                    k.length > 0 && (o(k[0].provider), c(k[0].config || {}))
                } else
                    console.error("La respuesta no es un array:", k),
                    console.error("AdminPaymentMethods: Tipo de respuesta:", typeof k),
                    r([])
            } catch (C) {
                console.error("AdminPaymentMethods: Error cargando módulos:", C),
                r([]),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudieron cargar los módulos de pago",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                a(!1)
            }
        },
        g = C => {
            o(C);
            const k = s.find(P => P.provider === C);
            c((k == null ? void 0 : k.config) || {})
        },
        x = (C, k) => {
            c(P => ({
                ...P,
                [C]: k
            }))
        },
        j = async () => {
            if (i) {
                u(!0);
                try {
                    await Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/payment-modules/${i}`, {
                        config: l
                    }),
                    t({
                        title: "Configuración guardada",
                        description: "La configuración del módulo se ha guardado correctamente"
                    }),
                    await y()
                } catch {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    u(!1)
                }
            }
        },
        v = async (C, k) => {
            try {
                await Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/payment-modules/${C}`, {
                    isActive: k
                }),
                f(P => ({
                    ...P,
                    [C]: k
                })),
                t({
                    title: k ? "Módulo activado" : "Módulo desactivado",
                    description: `El módulo ${C} ha sido ${k ? "activado" : "desactivado"}`
                }),
                await y()
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo cambiar el estado del módulo",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        p = C => {
            var P;
            const k = l[C.name] || "";
            switch (C.type) {
            case "text":
            case "password":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: C.name,
                        className: "text-sm font-medium",
                        children: [C.label, C.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(ee, {
                        id: C.name,
                        type: C.type,
                        value: k,
                        onChange: D => x(C.name, D.target.value),
                        placeholder: C.description,
                        className: "w-full"
                    }), C.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                        children: C.description
                    })]
                }, C.name);
            case "select":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: C.name,
                        className: "text-sm font-medium",
                        children: [C.label, C.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx("select", {
                        id: C.name,
                        value: k,
                        onChange: D => x(C.name, D.target.value),
                        className: "w-full p-2 border rounded-md",
                        children: (P = C.options) == null ? void 0 : P.map(D => e.jsx("option", {
                            value: D.value,
                            children: D.label
                        }, D.value))
                    }), C.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                        children: C.description
                    })]
                }, C.name);
            case "checkbox":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                    children: [e.jsx(St, {
                        id: C.name,
                        checked: k,
                        onCheckedChange: D => x(C.name, D)
                    }), e.jsx(q, {
                        htmlFor: C.name,
                        className: "text-sm",
                        children: C.label
                    }), C.description && e.jsxs("p", {
                        className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground ml-2",
                        children: ["(", C.description, ")"]
                    })]
                }, C.name);
            default:
                return null
            }
        };
    return n ? e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-background",
        children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-6",
            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "animate-pulse space-y-4",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-8 bg-gray-200 rounded w-1/4"
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",
                    children: [1, 2, 3].map(C => e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "h-48 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                    }, C))
                })]
            })
        })]
    }) : (console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: Renderizando con modules:", s, "loading:", n), console.log("AdminPaymentMethods: modules.length:", s.length), e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-background",
        children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-6 space-y-6",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight",
                        children: "Módulos de Pago"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "Gestiona los módulos de pago disponibles en tu tienda"
                    })]
                })
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6",
                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-1",
                    children: e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "space-y-3",
                        children: s && s.length > 0 ? s.map(C => {
                            const k = QW[C.provider] || ps;
                            return e.jsxs($, {
                                className: `cursor-pointer transition-all ${i === C.provider ? "ring-2 ring-primary" : "hover:bg-muted/50"}`,
                                onClick: () => g(C.provider),
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    className: "pb-3",
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                            children: [e.jsx(k, {
                                                className: "h-5 w-5 text-muted-foreground"
                                            }), e.jsx(ae, {
                                                className: "text-sm",
                                                children: C.name
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                            variant: m[C.provider] ? "default" : "secondary",
                                            children: m[C.provider] ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(V, {
                                    className: "pt-0",
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                            checked: m[C.provider],
                                            onCheckedChange: P => v(C.provider, P),
                                            onClick: P => P.stopPropagation()
                                        }), e.jsx(q, {
                                            className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                                            children: m[C.provider] ? "Habilitado" : "Deshabilitado"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            }, C.provider)
                        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "text-center py-8",
                            children: [e.jsx(ps, {
                                className: "mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-muted-foreground"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground mt-2",
                                children: "No hay módulos disponibles"
                            })]
                        })
                    })
                }), e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "lg:col-span-3",
                    children: i && e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(Hs, {
                                    className: "h-5 w-5"
                                }), e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    children: ["Configuración - ", (b = s.find(C => C.provider === i)) == null ? void 0 : b.name]
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            className: "space-y-6",
                            children: ((N = s.find(C => C.provider === i)) == null ? void 0 : N.configFields.length) === 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "text-center py-8",
                                children: [e.jsx(zr, {
                                    className: "mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-muted-foreground mb-4"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Este módulo no requiere configuración adicional"
                                })]
                            }) : e.jsxs(e.Fragment, {
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                    children: (w = s.find(C => C.provider === i)) == null ? void 0 : w.configFields.map(C => p(C))
                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "flex justify-end",
                                    children: e.jsxs(M, {
                                        onClick: j,
                                        disabled: d,
                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(wn, {
                                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                                        }), e.jsx("span", {
                                            children: d ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar Configuración"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            }), s.length === 0 && e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "text-center py-12",
                children: [e.jsx(ps, {
                    className: "mx-auto h-12 w-12 text-muted-foreground"
                }), e.jsx("h3", {
                    className: "mt-2 text-sm font-medium text-gray-900",
                    children: "No hay módulos de pago disponibles"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "mt-1 text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                    children: "Los módulos de pago se cargan automáticamente del sistema."
                })]
            })]
        })]
    }))
}
function JW() {
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        [s, r] = h.useState([]),
        [n, a] = h.useState(!0),
        [i, o] = h.useState(""),
        [l, c] = h.useState({}),
        [d, u] = h.useState(!1),
        [m, f] = h.useState(0);
    h.useEffect(() => {
        y()
    }, []);
    const y = async () => {
            try {
                const C = await (await Ie("GET", "/api/admin/payment-modules")).json();
                console.log("🔧 PAYMENT MODULES: Datos recibidos:", C),
                r([]),
                setTimeout(() => {
                    r(C),
                    C && C.length > 0 && (o(C[0].provider), c(C[0].config || {}))
                }, 50)
            } catch (w) {
                console.error("❌ PAYMENT MODULES: Error cargando módulos:", w),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudieron cargar los módulos de pago",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                a(!1)
            }
        },
        g = w => {
            o(w);
            const C = s.find(k => k.provider === w);
            c((C == null ? void 0 : C.config) || {})
        },
        x = (w, C) => {
            c(k => ({
                ...k,
                [w]: C
            }))
        },
        j = async () => {
            u(!0);
            try {
                const w = s.find(C => C.provider === i);
                if (!w)
                    return;
                await Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/payment-modules/${i}`, {
                    config: l,
                    isActive: w.isActive
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Configuración guardada",
                    description: "Los cambios se han guardado correctamente"
                }),
                await y()
            } catch {
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                u(!1)
            }
        },
        v = async (w, C) => {
            try {
                const k = s.find(D => D.provider === w);
                if (!k)
                    return;
                console.log(`🔧 TOGGLE MODULE: ${w} -> ${C ? "activado" : "desactivado"}`),
                r(D => D.map(W => W.provider === w ? {
                    ...W,
                    isActive: C
                } : W)),
                f(D => D + 1);
                const P = await Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/payment-modules/${w}`, {
                    config: k.config,
                    isActive: C
                });
                console.log(`✅ TOGGLE MODULE: ${w} actualizado en backend`),
                t({
                    title: C ? "Módulo activado" : "Módulo desactivado",
                    description: `El módulo ${k.name} ha sido ${C ? "activado" : "desactivado"}`
                }),
                setTimeout(async () => {
                    console.log("🔄 TOGGLE MODULE: Recargando módulos para verificar sincronización..."),
                    await y(),
                    f(D => D + 1)
                }, 200)
            } catch (k) {
                console.error(`❌ TOGGLE MODULE ERROR: ${w}`, k),
                r(P => P.map(D => D.provider === w ? {
                    ...D,
                    isActive: !C
                } : D)),
                f(P => P + 1),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo cambiar el estado del módulo",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        p = w => {
            switch (w) {
            case "stripe":
                return e.jsx(ps, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5 text-blue-600"
                });
            case "paypal":
                return e.jsx(Y5, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5 text-yellow-600"
                });
            case "redsys":
                return e.jsx(ps, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5 text-red-600"
                });
            case "bank_transfer":
                return e.jsx(gf, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5 text-green-600"
                });
            default:
                return e.jsx(Hs, {
                    className: "w-5 h-5"
                })
            }
        },
        b = w => {
            var k;
            const C = l[w.name] || "";
            switch (w.type) {
            case "select":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: w.name,
                        children: [w.label, w.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(He, {
                        value: C,
                        onValueChange: P => x(w.name, P),
                        children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                            children: e.jsx(We, {
                                placeholder: `Seleccionar ${w.label}`
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(qe, {
                            children: (k = w.options) == null ? void 0 : k.map(P => e.jsx(Z, {
                                value: P.value,
                                children: P.label
                            }, P.value))
                        })]
                    }), w.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                        children: w.description
                    })]
                }, w.name);
            case "checkbox":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(St, {
                            id: w.name,
                            checked: !!C,
                            onCheckedChange: P => x(w.name, P)
                        }), e.jsx(q, {
                            htmlFor: w.name,
                            children: w.label
                        })]
                    }), w.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                        children: w.description
                    })]
                }, w.name);
            case "password":
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: w.name,
                        children: [w.label, w.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(ee, {
                        id: w.name,
                        type: "password",
                        value: C,
                        onChange: P => x(w.name, P.target.value),
                        placeholder: `Ingresa ${w.label}`
                    }), w.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                        children: w.description
                    })]
                }, w.name);
            default:
                return e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "space-y-2",
                    children: [e.jsxs(q, {
                        htmlFor: w.name,
                        children: [w.label, w.required && e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "text-red-500 ml-1",
                            children: "*"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(ee, {
                        id: w.name,
                        type: "text",
                        value: C,
                        onChange: P => x(w.name, P.target.value),
                        placeholder: `Ingresa ${w.label}`
                    }), w.description && e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                        children: w.description
                    })]
                }, w.name)
            }
        };
    if (n)
        return e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-center h-64",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "animate-spin w-8 h-8 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
            })
        });
    const N = s.find(w => w.provider === i);
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto p-6 space-y-6",
        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-between",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                children: "Módulos de Pago"
            }), e.jsxs(ge, {
                variant: "outline",
                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                children: [e.jsx(Hs, {
                    className: "w-4 h-4"
                }), "Configuración de Pagos"]
            })]
        }), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6",
            children: [e.jsxs($, {
                className: "md:col-span-1",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Módulos Disponibles"
                    })
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    className: "space-y-4",
                    children: s.map(w => e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: `p-3 rounded-lg border cursor-pointer transition-colors ${i === w.provider ? "border-primary bg-primary/10" : "border-gray-200 hover:border-gray-300"}`,
                        onClick: () => g(w.provider),
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center justify-between mb-2",
                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [p(w.provider), e.jsx("span", {
                                    className: "font-medium",
                                    children: w.name
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                    checked: w.isActive,
                                    onCheckedChange: C => v(w.provider, C),
                                    onClick: C => C.stopPropagation()
                                }, `${w.provider}-${m}-${w.isActive}`), w.isActive ? e.jsx(Np, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 text-green-600"
                                }) : e.jsx(tr, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 text-gray-400"
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(ge, {
                            variant: w.isActive ? "default" : "secondary",
                            className: "text-xs",
                            children: w.isActive ? "Activo" : "Inactivo"
                        })]
                    }, w.provider))
                })]
            }), e.jsxs($, {
                className: "md:col-span-3",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [N && p(N.provider), "Configuración de ", N == null ? void 0 : N.name]
                    })
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: N ? e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2 p-4 bg-blue-50 rounded-lg",
                            children: [e.jsx(zr, {
                                className: "w-5 h-5 text-blue-600"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-sm text-blue-800",
                                children: "Configura los parámetros del módulo de pago. Los campos marcados con * son obligatorios."
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                            children: N.configFields.map(w => b(w))
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-end gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(M, {
                                variant: "outline",
                                onClick: () => g(i),
                                disabled: d,
                                children: "Descartar Cambios"
                            }), e.jsx(M, {
                                onClick: j,
                                disabled: d,
                                children: d ? "Guardando..." : "Guardar Configuración"
                            })]
                        })]
                    }) : e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-center text-gray-500",
                        children: "Selecciona un módulo para configurar"
                    })
                })]
            })]
        }), e.jsxs($, {
            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                children: e.jsx(ae, {
                    children: "Información Importante"
                })
            }), e.jsx(V, {
                className: "space-y-4",
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-2",
                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                            className: "font-semibold",
                            children: "Redsys"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                            children: "Sistema de pago español para tarjetas de crédito y débito. Requiere código de comercio y clave secreta."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-2",
                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                            className: "font-semibold",
                            children: "PayPal"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                            children: "Sistema de pago internacional. Requiere Client ID y Client Secret desde el panel de PayPal."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-2",
                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                            className: "font-semibold",
                            children: "Stripe"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                            children: "Procesador de pagos con tarjeta. Requiere claves públicas y privadas de Stripe."
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-2",
                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                            className: "font-semibold",
                            children: "Transferencia Bancaria"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-600",
                            children: "Pago offline. Los clientes reciben instrucciones para realizar transferencia manual."
                        })]
                    })]
                })
            })]
        })]
    })
}
const eG = Ae.object({
        name: Ae.string().min(1, "El nombre es requerido"),
        description: Ae.string().optional(),
        base_price: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El precio base debe ser mayor o igual a 0"),
        is_active: Ae.boolean().default(!0),
        free_shipping_threshold: Ae.coerce.number().min(0).optional(),
        weight_based_pricing: Ae.boolean().default(!0),
        price_per_kg: Ae.coerce.number().min(0).optional(),
        max_weight: Ae.coerce.number().min(0).optional(),
        estimated_days: Ae.coerce.number().min(1).optional(),
        instructions: Ae.string().optional()
    }),
    tG = Ae.object({
        shipping_config_id: Ae.number(),
        min_weight: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El peso mínimo debe ser mayor o igual a 0"),
        max_weight: Ae.coerce.number().optional(),
        price: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El precio debe ser mayor o igual a 0")
    }),
    sG = Ae.object({
        name: Ae.string().min(1, "El nombre es requerido"),
        description: Ae.string().optional(),
        sort_order: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El orden debe ser mayor o igual a 0"),
        is_active: Ae.boolean().default(!0)
    });
Ae.object({
    shipping_config_id: Ae.number(),
    shipping_zone_id: Ae.number(),
    min_weight: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El peso mínimo debe ser mayor o igual a 0"),
    max_weight: Ae.coerce.number().optional(),
    price: Ae.coerce.number().min(0, "El precio debe ser mayor o igual a 0")
});
function rG() {
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        s = fr(),
        {logout: r} = As(),
        [, n] = ut(),
        [a, i] = h.useState(null),
        [o, l] = h.useState(!1);
    h.useState(!1),
    h.useState(null),
    h.useState(null);
    const [c, d] = h.useState(null),
        [u, m] = h.useState(!1),
        [f, y] = h.useState(null),
        [g, x] = h.useState(null),
        [j, v] = h.useState(!1),
        {data: p=[], isLoading: b} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/methods"]
        }),
        {data: N=[], isLoading: w} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/zones"]
        }),
        {data: C=[], isLoading: k} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/provinces"]
        }),
        {data: P=[], isLoading: D} = _e({
            queryKey: f ? ["/api/admin/shipping/zone-rates", f.id] : ["/api/admin/shipping/zone-rates"],
            enabled: !!f
        }),
        W = mn({
            resolver: Sn(eG),
            defaultValues: {
                name: "",
                description: "",
                base_price: 0,
                is_active: !0,
                free_shipping_threshold: 0,
                weight_based_pricing: !0,
                price_per_kg: 0,
                max_weight: 0,
                estimated_days: 3,
                instructions: ""
            }
        });
    mn({
        resolver: Sn(tG),
        defaultValues: {
            shipping_config_id: 0,
            min_weight: 0,
            max_weight: 0,
            price: 0
        }
    });
    const L = mn({
            resolver: Sn(sG),
            defaultValues: {
                name: "",
                description: "",
                sort_order: 0,
                is_active: !0
            }
        }),
        I = rt({
            mutationFn: T => Ie("POST", "/api/admin/shipping/methods", T),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/methods"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Método de envío creado exitosamente"
                }),
                l(!1),
                i(null),
                W.reset()
            },
            onError: T => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al crear método",
                    description: T.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        z = rt({
            mutationFn: ({id: T, data: te}) => Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/shipping/methods/${T}`, te),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/methods"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Método de envío actualizado exitosamente"
                }),
                l(!1),
                i(null),
                W.reset()
            },
            onError: T => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al actualizar método",
                    description: T.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        H = rt({
            mutationFn: T => Ie("DELETE", `/api/admin/shipping/methods/${T}`),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/methods"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Método de envío eliminado exitosamente"
                })
            },
            onError: T => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al eliminar método",
                    description: T.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        F = rt({
            mutationFn: T => Ie("POST", "/api/admin/shipping/zones", T),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/zones"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Zona de envío creada exitosamente"
                }),
                m(!1),
                d(null),
                L.reset()
            },
            onError: T => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al crear zona",
                    description: T.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        A = rt({
            mutationFn: ({id: T, data: te}) => Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/shipping/zones/${T}`, te),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/zones"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Zona de envío actualizada exitosamente"
                }),
                m(!1),
                d(null),
                L.reset()
            },
            onError: T => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al actualizar zona",
                    description: T.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        S = rt({
            mutationFn: T => Ie("DELETE", `/api/admin/shipping/zones/${T}`),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/zones"]
                }),
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/provinces"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Zona de envío eliminada exitosamente"
                })
            },
            onError: T => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al eliminar zona",
                    description: T.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        R = rt({
            mutationFn: ({provinceId: T, zoneId: te}) => Ie("PUT", `/api/admin/provinces/${T}/zone`, {
                shipping_zone_id: te
            }),
            onSuccess: () => {
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/provinces"]
                }),
                s.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/shipping/zones"]
                }),
                t({
                    title: "Asignación de provincia actualizada exitosamente"
                })
            },
            onError: T => {
                t({
                    title: "Error al actualizar asignación",
                    description: T.message,
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        }),
        B = T => {
            i(T),
            W.reset({
                name: T.name,
                description: T.description || "",
                base_price: parseFloat(T.base_price),
                is_active: T.is_active,
                free_shipping_threshold: T.free_shipping_threshold ? parseFloat(T.free_shipping_threshold) : 0,
                weight_based_pricing: T.weight_based_pricing,
                price_per_kg: T.price_per_kg ? parseFloat(T.price_per_kg) : 0,
                max_weight: T.max_weight ? parseFloat(T.max_weight) : 0,
                estimated_days: T.estimated_days || 3,
                instructions: T.instructions || ""
            }),
            l(!0)
        },
        oe = T => {
            confirm("¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar este método de envío y todas sus tarifas?") && H.mutate(T)
        },
        O = T => {
            d(T),
            L.reset({
                name: T.name,
                description: T.description || "",
                sort_order: T.sort_order,
                is_active: T.is_active
            }),
            m(!0)
        },
        E = T => {
            confirm("¿Estás seguro de que quieres eliminar esta zona de envío? Se desasignarán todas las provincias.") && S.mutate(T)
        },
        K = T => {
            a ? z.mutate({
                id: a.id,
                data: T
            }) : I.mutate(T)
        },
        re = T => {
            c ? A.mutate({
                id: c.id,
                data: T
            }) : F.mutate(T)
        },
        ye = (T, te) => {
            const G = te === "" ? null : parseInt(te);
            R.mutate({
                provinceId: T,
                zoneId: G
            })
        },
        Se = async () => {
            await r(),
            n("/login")
        };
    return b || w || k ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "p-6",
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "animate-pulse space-y-4",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "h-8 bg-gray-200 rounded w-1/4"
            }), e.jsx("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                children: [1, 2].map(T => e.jsx("div", {
                    className: "h-64 bg-gray-200 rounded"
                }, T))
            })]
        })
    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
        children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-8",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                        children: "Gestión de Envíos"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "Configure métodos de envío, zonas y tarifas"
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(M, {
                    variant: "outline",
                    onClick: Se,
                    children: [e.jsx(ka, {
                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                    }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(ls, {
                defaultValue: "methods",
                className: "w-full",
                children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                    className: "grid w-full grid-cols-4",
                    children: [e.jsx(Ve, {
                        value: "methods",
                        children: "Métodos de Envío"
                    }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                        value: "zones",
                        children: "Zonas de Envío"
                    }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                        value: "provinces",
                        children: "Asignación de Provincias"
                    }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                        value: "zone-rates",
                        children: "Tarifas por Zona"
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                    value: "methods",
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                                className: "text-xl font-semibold",
                                children: "Métodos de Envío"
                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                children: "Configura los métodos de envío disponibles"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs(Ps, {
                            open: o,
                            onOpenChange: l,
                            children: [e.jsx(Pf, {
                                asChild: !0,
                                children: e.jsxs(M, {
                                    onClick: () => {
                                        i(null),
                                        W.reset()
                                    },
                                    children: [e.jsx(on, {
                                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                    }), "Nuevo Método"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(xs, {
                                className: "max-w-2xl max-h-[80vh] overflow-y-auto",
                                children: [e.jsxs(gs, {
                                    children: [e.jsx(vs, {

                    })]

                                            })]
                                        })
                                    })
                                }, T.id))
                            })
                        })]
                    }), f && e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {

                                        children: ["Tarifas de ", f.name]
                                    }), e.jsx(qt, {
                                        children: "Configura precios por zona y rango de peso"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs(M, {
                                    onClick: () => {
                                        x(null),
                                        v(!0)
                                    },
                                    children: [e.jsx(on, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                                    }), "Nueva Tarifa"]
                                })]
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: D ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "text-center py-8",
                                children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                    className: "animate-spin w-6 h-6 border-2 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full mx-auto"
                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                    className: "mt-2 text-muted-foreground",
                                    children: "Cargando tarifas..."
                                })]
                            }) : e.jsxs(Gs, {
                                children: [e.jsx(Ks, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(vt, {
                                        children: [e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Zona"
                                        }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Peso Mínimo (g)"
                                        }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Peso Máximo (g)"
                                        }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Precio (€)"
                                        }), e.jsx(pe, {
                                            children: "Acciones"
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(Ys, {
                                    children: [P.map(T => e.jsxs(vt, {
                                        children: [e.jsx(fe, {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: T.zone_name
                                        }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                            children: parseFloat(T.min_weight).toLocaleString()
                                        }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                            children: T.max_weight ? parseFloat(T.max_weight).toLocaleString() : "Sin límite"
                                        }), e.jsxs(fe, {
                                            children: ["€", parseFloat(T.price).toFixed(2)]
                                        }), e.jsx(fe, {
                                            children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex gap-2",
                                                children: [e.jsx(M, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => {
                                                        x(T),
                                                        v(!0)
                                                    },
                                                    children: e.jsx(Br, {
                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(M, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => {},
                                                    children: e.jsx(Jt, {
                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    })
                                                })]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }, T.id)), P.length === 0 && e.jsx(vt, {
                                        children: e.jsxs(fe, {
                                            colSpan: 5,
                                            className: "text-center py-8 text-muted-foreground",
                                            children: ["No hay tarifas configuradas para este método de envío.", e.jsx("br", {}), 'Haz clic en "Nueva Tarifa" para agregar una.']
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
const nG = () => {
        const {toast: t} = tt(),
            s = fr(),
            [r, n] = h.useState(!1),
            [a, i] = h.useState("config"),
            {data: o, isLoading: l} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/email-config"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const C = await fetch("/api/admin/email-config");
                    if (!C.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar configuración de correos");
                    return C.json()
                }
            }),
            {data: c, isLoading: d, refetch: u} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/admin/email-logs"],
                queryFn: async () => {
                    const C = await fetch("/api/admin/email-logs?limit=50");
                    if (!C.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al cargar logs de correos");
                    return C.json()
                },
                enabled: a === "history"
            }),
            m = rt({
                mutationFn: async C => {
                    const k = await fetch("/api/admin/email-config", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        body: JSON.stringify(C)
                    });
                    if (!k.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al guardar configuración");
                    return k.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Configuración guardada",
                        description: "La configuración de correos se ha guardado correctamente"
                    }),
                    s.invalidateQueries({
                        queryKey: ["/api/admin/email-config"]
                    })
                },
                onError: C => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "Error al guardar la configuración",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            f = rt({
                mutationFn: async () => {
                    const C = await fetch("/api/admin/email-config/test", {
                        method: "POST"
                    });
                    if (!C.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al probar configuración");
                    return C.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {
                    t({
                        title: "Prueba exitosa",
                        description: "El correo de prueba se ha enviado correctamente"
                    }),
                    a === "history" && u()
                },
                onError: C => {
                    t({
                        title: "Error en la prueba",
                        description: "Error al enviar el correo de prueba",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }),
            y = rt({
                mutationFn: async C => {
                    const k = await fetch(`/api/admin/email-logs/${C}`, {
                        method: "DELETE"
                    });
                    if (!k.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al eliminar log");
                    return k.json()
                },
                onSuccess: () => {

                        description: "El log se ha eliminado correctamente"

                    u()

                        method: "DELETE"

                        throw new Error("Error al limpiar historial");
                    return C.json()

                    t({
                        title: "Historial limpiado",
                        description: "Todo el historial de correos se ha eliminado"

                        variant: "destructive"
                    })

            }),
            x = (C, k) => {
                m.mutate({
                    key: C,
                    value: k
                })
            },
            j = async () => {
                n(!0);
                try {
                    await f.mutateAsync()
                } finally {
                    n(!1)
                }
            },
            v = C => {
                const k = o == null ? void 0 : o.find(P => P.key === C);
                return (k == null ? void 0 : k.value) || ""
            },
            p = C => {
                const k = o == null ? void 0 : o.find(P => P.key === C);
                return (k == null ? void 0 : k.isActive) || !1
            },

                        variant: "destructive",

                    });

                    return "Prueba";

                    return C

                necessaryCookies: {

                },
                analyticsCookies: {
                    enabled: !1,
                    description: "Cookies para análisis y métricas del sitio web",
                    cookies: ["_ga", "_gid", "_gat"],
                    googleAnalyticsId: ""
                },
                marketingCookies: {
                    enabled: !1,
                    description: "Cookies para publicidad y marketing dirigido",
                    cookies: ["_fb", "_twitter", "advertising_id"]
                },
                preferencesCookies: {
                    enabled: !1,
                    description: "Cookies para recordar preferencias del usuario",
                    cookies: ["theme", "language", "layout_preferences"]
                }
            }),
            l = async () => {
                a(!0);
                try {
                    await new Promise(m => setTimeout(m, 1e3)),
                    localStorage.setItem("adminCookieConfig", JSON.stringify(i)),
                    t({
                        title: "Configuración guardada",
                        description: "La configuración de cookies se ha guardado correctamente."
                    })
                } catch {
                    t({
                        title: "Error al guardar",
                        description: "No se pudo guardar la configuración de cookies.",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    a(!1)
                }
            },
            c = async () => {
                r(!0);
                try {
                    await new Promise(f => setTimeout(f, 500));
                    const m = localStorage.getItem("adminCookieConfig");
                    m && o(JSON.parse(m))
                } catch {

                        description: "No se pudo cargar la configuración de cookies.",
                        variant: "destructive"

            },

function iG() {
    const [, t] = ut(),
        {user: s, logout: r} = As(),
        n = (s == null ? void 0 : s.isAdmin) || !1,
        a = s !== null,
        {toast: i} = tt(),
        o = async () => {
            try {
                await r(),
                t("/admin")
            } catch (z) {
                console.error("Error during logout:", z)
            }
        },
        [l, c] = h.useState("0"),
        [d, u] = h.useState("1000"),
        [m, f] = h.useState(new Date(2e3, 0, 1)),
        [y, g] = h.useState("recovery"),
        [x, j] = h.useState(null),
        [v, p] = h.useState(!0),
        b = async () => {
            try {
                p(!0);
                const z = await Fc.getConfig();
                j(z),
                console.log("Configuración de API cargada:", z),
                i({
                    title: "Configuración cargada",
                    description: `API Key: ${z.apiKey.substring(0, 8)}... | ID Empresa: ${z.companyId}`,
                    variant: "default"
                })
            } catch (z) {
                console.error("Error al cargar la configuración de la API:", z),
                i({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo cargar la configuración de la API",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                p(!1)
            }
        };
    h.useEffect(() => {
        a && n && b()
    }, [a, n]),
    h.useEffect(() => {
        if (x) {
            const z = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(P));
            z.forEach(H => {
                H.tests.forEach(F => {
                    "apikey" in F.headers && (F.headers.apikey = x.apiKey),
                    "idempresa" in F.headers && (F.headers.idempresa = x.companyId)
                })
            }),
            D(z)
        }
    }, [x]);
    const N = z => {
            try {
                const H = JSON.stringify(z.response, null, 2),
                    F = new Blob([H], {
                        type: "application/json"
                    }),
                    A = URL.createObjectURL(F),
                    S = document.createElement("a");
                S.href = A,
                S.download = `${z.name}_${new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 16).replace(/:/g, "-")}.json`,
                document.body.appendChild(S),
                S.click(),
                document.body.removeChild(S),
                i({
                    title: "Archivo JSON exportado",
                    description: "El archivo se ha descargado correctamente",
                    variant: "default"
                })
            } catch (H) {
                console.error("Error al exportar JSON:", H),
                i({
                    title: "Error al exportar",
                    description: "No se pudo generar el archivo JSON",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        w = z => {
            if (!z || z.length === 0)
                return "";
            const H = z.filter(R => R && typeof R == "object");
            if (H.length === 0)
                return "";
            const F = new Set;
            for (const R of H)
                if (R && typeof R == "object")
                    for (const B of Object.keys(R))
                        F.add(B);
            const A = Array.from(F),
                S = [A.join(",")];
            for (const R of H) {
                const B = [];
                for (const oe of A) {
                    let O = "";
                    if (R.hasOwnProperty(oe)) {
                        const E = R[oe];
                        E == null ? O = "" : typeof E == "object" ? O = `"${JSON.stringify(E).replace(/"/g, '""')}"` : O = `"${String(E).replace(/"/g, '""')}"`
                    }
                    B.push(O)
                }
                S.push(B.join(","))
            }
            return S.join(`
`
            )
        },
        C = z => {
            var H,
                F,
                A,
                S,
                R,
                B;
            try {
                let oe = "",
                    O = `${z.name}_${new Date().toISOString().slice(0, 16).replace(/:/g, "-")}.csv`;
                (F = (H = z.response) == null ? void 0 : H.data) != null && F.piezas && z.response.data.piezas.length > 0 ? (oe = w(z.response.data.piezas), O = `piezas_${O}`) : (S = (A = z.response) == null ? void 0 : A.data) != null && S.vehiculos && z.response.data.vehiculos.length > 0 ? (oe = w(z.response.data.vehiculos), O = `vehiculos_${O}`) : Array.isArray((R = z.response) == null ? void 0 : R.data) ? oe = w(z.response.data) : oe = w([((B = z.response) == null ? void 0 : B.data) || {}]);
                const E = new Blob([oe], {
                        type: "text/csv;charset=utf-8;"
                    }),
                    K = URL.createObjectURL(E),
                    re = document.createElement("a");
                re.href = K,
                re.download = O,
                document.body.appendChild(re),
                re.click(),
                document.body.removeChild(re),
                i({
                    title: "Archivo CSV exportado",
                    description: "El archivo se ha descargado correctamente",
                    variant: "default"
                })
            } catch (oe) {
                console.error("Error al exportar CSV:", oe),
                i({
                    title: "Error al exportar",
                    description: "No se pudo generar el archivo CSV",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        k = m ? Bt(m, "dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss") : "01/01/2000 00:00:00",
        [P, D] = h.useState([{
            id: "recovery",

                }, null, 2),

            }, {

                },

                    RefLocal: 0,
                    Urls: []
                }, null, 2),
                requiresBody: !0,
                loading: !1
            }]
        }, {
            id: "orders",
            name: "Pedidos",
            description: "Operaciones con pedidos",
            tests: [{
                id: "crearPedido",
                name: "CrearPedido",

                },

                    },
