                        Telefono: ""
                    },
                    Lineas: []
                }, null, 2),
                requiresBody: !0,
                loading: !1
            }, {
                id: "actualizarEstado",
                name: "ActualizarEstado",
                endpoint: "/api/raw/test-metasync",
                description: "Actualizar estado de un pedido",
                headers: {
                    method: "ActualizarEstado",
                    apikey: "",
                    idempresa: 1476,
                    codigo: "",
                    estado: ""
                },
                loading: !1
            }, {
                id: "recuperarPedidoOrigen",
                name: "RecuperarPedidoOrigen",
                endpoint: "/api/raw/test-metasync",
                description: "Recuperar un pedido por su código de origen",
                headers: {
                    method: "RecuperarPedidoOrigen",
                    apikey: "",
                    idempresa: 1476,
                    codigo: ""
                },
                loading: !1
            }]
        }]),
        W = async () => {
            try {
                const z = await fetch("/api/config");
                if (!z.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al obtener la configuración de API");
                const H = await z.json();
                D(F => F.map(A => ({
                    ...A,
                    tests: A.tests.map(S => ({
                        ...S,
                        headers: {
                            ...S.headers,
                            apikey: H.apiKey
                        }
                    }))
                })))
            } catch (z) {
                console.error("Error fetching API config:", z),
                i({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudo obtener la configuración de API. Verifique que ha configurado la API y que tiene permisos de administrador.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        L = (z, H, F) => {
            D(A => {
                const S = A.findIndex(oe => oe.id === z);
                if (S === -1)
                    return A;
                const R = A[S].tests.findIndex(oe => oe.id === H);
                if (R === -1)
                    return A;
                const B = [...A];
                return B[S].tests[R].body = F, B
            })
        },
        I = async (z, H) => {
            const F = P.findIndex(S => S.id === z);
            if (F === -1)
                return;
            const A = P[F].tests.findIndex(S => S.id === H);
            if (A !== -1) {
                D(S => {
                    const R = [...S];
                    return R[F].tests[A].loading = !0, R[F].tests[A].error = void 0, R[F].tests[A].success = void 0, R
                });
                try {
                    const {headers: S, body: R, requiresBody: B} = P[F].tests[A];
                    let oe = {};
                    if (B && R)
                        try {
                            oe = {
                                ...S,
                                body: JSON.parse(R)
                            }
                        } catch {
                            i({
                                title: "Error en el formato del body",
                                description: "El formato JSON del body no es válido",
                                variant: "destructive"
                            }),
                            D(re => {
                                const ye = [...re];
                                return ye[F].tests[A].loading = !1, ye[F].tests[A].error = "Error en el formato JSON del body", ye
                            });
                            return
                        }
                    else
                        oe = S;
                    const O = await fetch(P[F].tests[A].endpoint, {
                            method: "POST",
                            headers: {
                                "Content-Type": "application/json"
                            },
                            body: JSON.stringify(oe)
                        }),
                        E = await O.json();
                    D(K => {
                        const re = [...K];
                        return re[F].tests[A].loading = !1, re[F].tests[A].response = E, re[F].tests[A].success = O.ok, O.ok || (re[F].tests[A].error = E.error || "Error desconocido"), re
                    }),
                    O.ok ? i({
                        title: "Test ejecutado correctamente",
                        description: `${P[F].tests[A].name} completado con éxito.`
                    }) : i({
                        title: "Error al ejecutar test",
                        description: E.error || "Error desconocido",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } catch (S) {
                    console.error("Error running test:", S),
                    D(R => {
                        const B = [...R];
                        return B[F].tests[A].loading = !1, B[F].tests[A].error = S instanceof Error ? S.message : "Error desconocido", B[F].tests[A].success = !1, B
                    }),
                    i({
                        title: "Error al ejecutar test",
                        description: S instanceof Error ? S.message : "Error desconocido",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            }
        };
    return ke.useEffect(() => {
        a && n && W()
    }, [a, n]), ke.useEffect(() => {
        D(z => z.map(H => ({
            ...H,
            tests: H.tests.map(F => ({
                ...F,
                headers: {
                    ...F.headers,
                    fecha: k
                }
            }))
        })))
    }, [k]), ke.useEffect(() => {
        D(z => z.map(H => ({
            ...H,
            tests: H.tests.map(F => "lastid" in F.headers && "offset" in F.headers ? {
                ...F,
                headers: {
                    ...F.headers,
                    lastid: l,
                    offset: d
                }
            } : F)
        })))
    }, [l, d]), !a || !n ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen flex-col",
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "container flex flex-col items-center justify-center flex-1 px-4 py-16",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-2xl font-bold mb-4",
                children: "Acceso denegado"
            }), e.jsx("p", {
                children: "Debe iniciar sesión como administrador para acceder a esta página."
            })]
        })
    }) : e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
        children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-8",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                        children: "Tester de API Metasync"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-muted-foreground",
                        children: "Prueba todos los endpoints de la API Metasync y visualiza los resultados"
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "mt-2 text-sm p-2 rounded border border-amber-200 bg-amber-50 text-amber-700",
                        children: [e.jsx("strong", {
                            children: "Nota:"
                        }), " Para recuperar vehículos, usar RecuperarCambiosCanalEmpresa, ya que también contiene datos de vehículos y el endpoint RecuperarCambiosVehiculosCanalEmpresa puede no responder correctamente."]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(M, {
                    variant: "outline",
                    onClick: o,
                    children: [e.jsx(ka, {
                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                    }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs($, {
                className: "mb-6",
                children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Parámetros globales"
                    }), e.jsx(qt, {
                        children: "Estos parámetros se aplican a todos los tests según corresponda"
                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "flex items-center justify-end mt-2",
                        children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                            variant: "outline",
                            size: "sm",
                            onClick: b,
                            disabled: v,
                            className: "flex items-center gap-1",
                            children: [v ? e.jsx(Xt, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                            }) : e.jsx(gt, {
                                className: "h-4 w-4"
                            }), "Actualizar Configuración"]
                        }), x && e.jsxs("div", {

                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "space-y-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                htmlFor: "date",
                                children: "Fecha (para todos los endpoints)"
                            }), e.jsx(cb, {
                                value: m,
                                onChange: z => z && f(z)
                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground mt-1",
                                children: ["Formato para API: ", k]
                            })]

                            })]

                                value: d,
                                onChange: z => u(z.target.value)
                            })]
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(ls, {
                value: y,
                onValueChange: g,
                children: [e.jsx(es, {
                    className: "mb-6",
                    children: P.map(z => e.jsx(Ve, {
                        value: z.id,
                        children: z.name
                    }, z.id))
                }), P.map(z => e.jsx(ze, {
                    value: z.id,
                    children: e.jsxs($, {
                        children: [e.jsxs(ne, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: z.name
                            }), e.jsx(qt, {
                                children: z.description
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx(V, {
                            children: e.jsx("div", {
                                className: "space-y-8",
                                children: z.tests.map(H => e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "border rounded-lg p-6",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex flex-col md:flex-row md:items-center justify-between gap-4 mb-4",

                                            children: [e.jsx("h3", {
                                                className: "text-lg font-semibold",

                                            }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                className: "text-muted-foreground",
                                                children: H.description
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "flex gap-2",
                                            children: e.jsxs(M, {
                                                variant: "default",

                                                children: [H.loading && e.jsx(Xt, {
                                                    className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                                }), "Ejecutar"]
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "mb-4",
                                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                                            className: "text-sm font-medium mb-2",
                                            children: "Headers"
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "bg-muted p-3 rounded-md overflow-x-auto",
                                            children: e.jsx("pre", {
                                                className: "text-xs",
                                                children: JSON.stringify(H.headers, null, 2)
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }), H.requiresBody && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "mb-4 border-t pt-4",
                                        children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-2",
                                            children: e.jsx("h4", {
                                                className: "text-sm font-medium",
                                                children: "Body (JSON)"
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "border border-input rounded-md",
                                            children: e.jsx("textarea", {
                                                className: "w-full p-3 font-mono text-xs bg-background resize-y min-h-[200px]",
                                                value: H.body || "",
                                                onChange: F => L(z.id, H.id, F.target.value),
                                                placeholder: "Escribe el body en formato JSON"
                                            })
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground mt-1",
                                            children: "El body debe estar en formato JSON válido"
                                        })]
                                    }), H.response && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "border-t pt-4 mt-4",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-2",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("h4", {
                                                className: "text-sm font-medium flex items-center",
                                                children: ["Resultado", H.success ? e.jsx(Rt, {
                                                    className: "ml-2 h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                                                }) : e.jsx(Ea, {
                                                    className: "ml-2 h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex gap-2",
                                                children: [e.jsx(M, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => N(H),
                                                    children: "Exportar JSON"
                                                }), e.jsx(M, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => C(H),
                                                    children: "Exportar CSV"
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }), H.error ? e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "bg-red-50 text-red-500 p-3 rounded-md overflow-x-auto",
                                            children: e.jsx("pre", {
                                                className: "text-xs",
                                                children: H.error
                                            })
                                        }) : e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "bg-muted p-3 rounded-md overflow-x-auto max-h-96",
                                            children: e.jsx("pre", {
                                                className: "text-xs",
                                                children: JSON.stringify(H.response, null, 2)
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }, H.id))
                            })
                        })]
                    })
                }, z.id))]
            })]
        })]
    })
}
var fb = "Radio",
    [oG, pM] = ws(fb),
    [lG, cG] = oG(fb),
    xM = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeRadio: r, name: n, checked: a=!1, required: i, disabled: o, value: l="on", onCheck: c, form: d, ...u} = t,
            [m, f] = h.useState(null),
            y = ot(s, j => f(j)),
            g = h.useRef(!1),
            x = m ? d || !!m.closest("form") : !0;
        return e.jsxs(lG, {
            scope: r,
            checked: a,
            disabled: o,
            children: [e.jsx(Re.button, {
                type: "button",
                role: "radio",
                "aria-checked": a,
                "data-state": yM(a),
                "data-disabled": o ? "" : void 0,
                disabled: o,
                value: l,
                ...u,
                ref: y,
                onClick: Ne(t.onClick, j => {
                    a || c == null || c(),
                    x && (g.current = j.isPropagationStopped(), g.current || j.stopPropagation())
                })
            }), x && e.jsx(dG, {
                control: m,
                bubbles: !g.current,
                name: n,
                value: l,
                checked: a,
                required: i,
                disabled: o,
                form: d,
                style: {
                    transform: "translateX(-100%)"
                }
            })]
        })
    });
xM.displayName = fb;
var gM = "RadioIndicator",
    vM = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeRadio: r, forceMount: n, ...a} = t,
            i = cG(gM, r);
        return e.jsx(Ts, {
            present: n || i.checked,
            children: e.jsx(Re.span, {
                "data-state": yM(i.checked),
                "data-disabled": i.disabled ? "" : void 0,
                ...a,
                ref: s
            })
        })
    });
vM.displayName = gM;
var dG = t => {
    const {control: s, checked: r, bubbles: n=!0, ...a} = t,
        i = h.useRef(null),
        o = Lp(r),
        l = Pp(s);
    return h.useEffect(() => {
        const c = i.current,
            d = window.HTMLInputElement.prototype,
            m = Object.getOwnPropertyDescriptor(d, "checked").set;
        if (o !== r && m) {
            const f = new Event("click", {
                bubbles: n
            });
            m.call(c, r),
            c.dispatchEvent(f)
        }
    }, [o, r, n]), e.jsx("input", {
        type: "radio",
        "aria-hidden": !0,
        defaultChecked: r,
        ...a,
        tabIndex: -1,
        ref: i,
        style: {
            ...t.style,
            ...l,
            position: "absolute",
            pointerEvents: "none",
            opacity: 0,
            margin: 0
        }
    })
};
function yM(t) {
    return t ? "checked" : "unchecked"
}
var uG = ["ArrowUp", "ArrowDown", "ArrowLeft", "ArrowRight"],
    pb = "RadioGroup",
    [mG, yQ] = ws(pb, [rd, pM]),
    jM = rd(),
    bM = pM(),

            y = jM(r),
            g = wl(d),
            [x, j] = Yr({
                prop: i,
                defaultProp: a,
                onChange: m
            });
        return e.jsx(hG, {
            scope: r,
            name: n,
            required: o,
            disabled: l,
            value: x,
            onValueChange: j,
            children: e.jsx(c0, {
                asChild: !0,
                ...y,
                orientation: c,
                dir: g,
                loop: u,
                children: e.jsx(Re.div, {
                    role: "radiogroup",
                    "aria-required": o,
                    "aria-orientation": c,
                    "data-disabled": l ? "" : void 0,

                })
            })
        })
    });
NM.displayName = pb;
var wM = "RadioGroupItem",
    CM = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {
        const {__scopeRadioGroup: r, disabled: n, ...a} = t,
            i = fG(wM, r),
            o = i.disabled || n,
            l = jM(r),
            c = bM(r),
            d = h.useRef(null),
            u = ot(s, d),
            m = i.value === a.value,
            f = h.useRef(!1);
        return h.useEffect(() => {
            const y = x => {
                    uG.includes(x.key) && (f.current = !0)
                },
                g = () => f.current = !1;
            return document.addEventListener("keydown", y), document.addEventListener("keyup", g), () => {
                document.removeEventListener("keydown", y),
                document.removeEventListener("keyup", g)
            }
        }, []), e.jsx(d0, {
            asChild: !0,
            ...l,
            focusable: !o,
            active: m,
            children: e.jsx(xM, {
                disabled: o,
                required: i.required,
                checked: m,
                ...c,
                ...a,
                name: i.name,
                ref: u,
                onCheck: () => i.onValueChange(a.value),
                onKeyDown: Ne(y => {
                    y.key === "Enter" && y.preventDefault()
                }),
                onFocus: Ne(a.onFocus, () => {
                    var y;
                    f.current && ((y = d.current) == null || y.click())
                })
            })
        })
    });
CM.displayName = wM;
var pG = "RadioGroupIndicator",
    SM = h.forwardRef((t, s) => {

        })

const jy = h.forwardRef(({className: t, ...s}, r) => e.jsx(kM, {
    ref: r,
    className: ue("aspect-square h-4 w-4 rounded-full border border-primary text-primary ring-offset-background focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50", t),
    ...s,
    children: e.jsx(xG, {
        className: "flex items-center justify-center",
        children: e.jsx(OE, {
            className: "h-2.5 w-2.5 fill-current text-current"
        })
    })
}));
jy.displayName = kM.displayName;
const U1 = "guestSessionId";
function gG() {
    const t = Date.now().toString(36),
        s = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 15);
    return `guest_${t}_${s}`
}
function by() {
    let t = localStorage.getItem(U1);
    return t || (t = gG(), localStorage.setItem(U1, t)), t
}
function vG() {
    const {toast: t} = tt(),
        {items: s, clearCart: r, setItems: n} = Nl(),
        [, a] = ut(),
        [i, o] = h.useState([]),
        [l, c] = h.useState([]),
        [d, u] = h.useState([]),
        [m, f] = h.useState(!0),
        [y, g] = h.useState(!1),
        [x, j] = h.useState(0),
        [v, p] = h.useState(!1),
        [b, N] = h.useState("guest"),
        [w, C] = h.useState(""),
        [k, P] = h.useState(""),
        [D, W] = h.useState(!1),
        [L, I] = h.useState(null),
        [z, H] = h.useState(null),
        [F, A] = h.useState(!1),
        [S, R] = h.useState({
            customerName: "",
            customerLastName: "",
            customerEmail: "",
            customerPhone: "",
            shippingAddress: "",
            shippingCity: "",
            shippingProvince: "",
            shippingPostalCode: "",
            billingAddress: "",
            billingCity: "",
            billingProvince: "",
            billingPostalCode: "",
            useSameAddress: !0,
            paymentMethodId: "",
            shippingMethodId: "",
            notes: "",
            createAccount: !1,
            password: ""
        });
    h.useEffect(() => {
        if (oe(), B(), s.length === 0) {
            const T = sessionStorage.getItem("backup_cart_data");
            if (T)
                try {
                    const te = JSON.parse(T);
                    Array.isArray(te) && te.length > 0 && (console.log("🔄 Restaurando carrito desde backup en checkout:", te.length, "items"), n(te), sessionStorage.removeItem("backup_cart_data"))
                } catch (te) {
                    console.error("Error restaurando carrito en checkout:", te)
                }
        }
    }, []),
    h.useEffect(() => {
        S.shippingProvince && s.length > 0 && O()
    }, [S.shippingProvince, s]);
    const B = async () => {
            try {
                const T = await fetch("/api/auth/me", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (T.ok) {
                    const te = await T.json();
                    I(te);
                    const G = await fetch("/api/user/permissions", {
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (G.ok) {
                        const se = await G.json();
                        H(se)
                    }
                    te && (R(se => ({
                        ...se,
                        customerName: te.firstName || "",
                        customerLastName: te.lastName || "",
                        customerEmail: te.email || "",
                        customerPhone: te.phone || "",
                        shippingAddress: te.address || "",
                        shippingCity: te.city || "",
                        shippingProvince: te.province || "",
                        shippingPostalCode: te.postalCode || "",
                        billingAddress: te.billingAddress || te.address || "",
                        billingCity: te.billingCity || te.city || "",
                        billingProvince: te.billingProvince || te.province || "",
                        billingPostalCode: te.billingPostalCode || te.postalCode || "",
                        useSameAddress: !te.billingAddress
                    })), N("authenticated"))
                }
            } catch (T) {
                console.error("Error checking user auth:", T)
            }
        },
        oe = async () => {
            try {
                const [T, te] = await Promise.all([Ie("GET", "/api/payment-modules/demo"), Ie("GET", "/api/provinces")]),
                    G = await T.json(),
                    se = await te.json();
                o(G),
                u(se),
                G.length > 0 && R(de => ({
                    ...de,
                    paymentMethodId: G[0].provider
                }))
            } catch (T) {
                console.error("Error loading methods:", T),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: "No se pudieron cargar los métodos de pago y provincias",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                f(!1)
            }
        },
        O = async () => {
            if (!(!S.shippingProvince || s.length === 0)) {
                p(!0),
                console.log(`🚚 Calculando envío para ${s.length} items distintos:`),
                s.forEach(T => {
                    console.log(`  - ID: ${T.partId}, Código: ${T.partCode}, Cantidad: ${T.quantity}, Peso almacenado: ${T.partWeight}g`)
                });
                try {
                    const T = await Promise.all(s.map(async se => {
                        let de = se.partWeight;
                        if (console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} (${se.partCode}) - peso almacenado: ${de}g`), !de || de === 500)
                            try {
                                let me = await fetch(`/api/parts/${se.partId}`),
                                    ve = null;
                                if (me.ok)
                                    ve = await me.json();
                                else if (se.partCode && (console.log(`Buscando pieza por código: ${se.partCode}`), me = await fetch(`/api/search-parts?search=${encodeURIComponent(se.partCode)}&limit=1`), me.ok)) {
                                    const lt = await me.json();
                                    lt.data && lt.data.length > 0 && (ve = lt.data[0], console.log(`Encontrada pieza por código ${se.partCode}: ID ${ve.id}, peso ${ve.peso}g`))
                                }
                                if (ve) {
                                    const lt = ve.peso ? parseInt(ve.peso.toString()) : null;
                                    console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} - peso de API: ${lt}g`),
                                    de = lt || 500
                                } else
                                    console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} - no encontrada, usando 500g por defecto`),
                                    de = 500
                            } catch (me) {
                                console.error("Error fetching part weight:", me),
                                de = 500
                            }
                        const le = de * se.quantity;
                        return console.log(`Pieza ${se.partId} - peso final: ${de}g × ${se.quantity} = ${le}g`), {
                            partId: se.partId,
                            quantity: se.quantity,
                            price: se.price,
                            peso: de
                        }
                    }));
                    console.log("📤 Enviando datos al servidor para cálculo de envío:"),
                    console.log("  - Provincia:", S.shippingProvince),
                    console.log("  - Items del carrito:", T),
                    console.log("  - Total items:", T.length),
                    T.forEach((se, de) => {
                        console.log(`    [${de}] ID: ${se.partId}, Cantidad: ${se.quantity}, Peso unitario: ${se.peso}g, Peso total: ${se.peso * se.quantity}g`)
                    });
                    const G = await (await Ie("POST", "/api/shipping/calculate", {
                        province: S.shippingProvince,
                        cartItems: T,
                        postalCode: S.shippingPostalCode
                    })).json();
                    if (G.shippingOptions && (c(G.shippingOptions), G.shippingOptions.length > 0)) {
                        const se = G.shippingOptions[0];
                        R(de => ({
                            ...de,
                            shippingMethodId: se.id.toString()
                        })),
                        j(se.cost)
                    }
                } catch (T) {
                    console.error("Error calculating shipping options:", T),
                    t({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudieron calcular las opciones de envío",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    }),
                    c([])
                } finally {
                    p(!1)
                }
            }
        },
        E = async T => {
            if (T.preventDefault(), A(!0), g(!0), !ye()) {
                g(!1),
                t({
                    title: "Error en el formulario",
                    description: "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios antes de continuar.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                });
                return
            }
            try {
                const te = s.reduce((le, me) => le + me.price * me.quantity, 0),
                    G = i.find(le => le.provider === S.paymentMethodId);
                if (!G)
                    throw new Error("Método de pago no seleccionado");
                const se = by(),
                    de = {
                        customerName: S.customerName,
                        customerLastName: S.customerLastName,
                        customerEmail: S.customerEmail,
                        customerPhone: S.customerPhone,
                        shippingAddress: S.shippingAddress,
                        shippingCity: S.shippingCity,
                        shippingProvince: S.shippingProvince,
                        shippingPostalCode: S.shippingPostalCode,
                        shippingCountry: "España",
                        billingAddress: S.useSameAddress ? S.shippingAddress : S.billingAddress,
                        billingCity: S.useSameAddress ? S.shippingCity : S.billingCity,
                        billingProvince: S.useSameAddress ? S.shippingProvince : S.billingProvince,
                        billingPostalCode: S.useSameAddress ? S.shippingPostalCode : S.billingPostalCode,
                        paymentMethodId: S.paymentMethodId,
                        shippingMethodId: parseInt(S.shippingMethodId),
                        notes: S.notes,

                            partId: le.partId,
                            quantity: le.quantity,
                            price: le.price,
                            partName: le.partName
                        })),
                        subtotal: te.toString(),
                        shippingCost: x.toString(),
                        total: (te + x).toString(),
                        createAccount: S.createAccount,
                        password: S.password,
                        sessionId: se
                    };
                if (G.provider === "stripe") {
                    const le = {
                            amount: parseFloat(de.total),
                            currency: "EUR",
                            description: "Pedido - Desguace Murcia",
                            customerEmail: de.customerEmail,
                            customerName: `${de.customerName} ${de.customerLastName}`,
                            metadata: {
                                sessionId: se
                            }
                        },
                        me = await Ie("POST", "/api/payment/stripe/process", le);
                    if (me.ok) {
                        const ve = await me.json();
                        if (ve.success) {
                            sessionStorage.setItem("pending_order_data", JSON.stringify(de)),
                            window.location.href = `${ve.data.redirectUrl}&session_id=${se}`;
                            return
                        }
                    }
                } else if (G.provider === "paypal") {
                    const le = {
                            amount: parseFloat(de.total),
                            currency: "EUR",
                            description: "Pedido - Desguace Murcia",
                            customerEmail: de.customerEmail,
                            customerName: `${de.customerName} ${de.customerLastName}`,
                            metadata: {
                                sessionId: se
                            }
                        },
                        me = await Ie("POST", "/api/payment/paypal/process", le);
                    if (me.ok) {
                        const ve = await me.json();
                        if (ve.success) {
                            sessionStorage.setItem("pending_order_data", JSON.stringify(de)),
                            window.location.href = `${ve.data.redirectUrl}&session_id=${se}`;
                            return
                        }
                    }
                } else if (G.provider === "redsys") {
                    sessionStorage.setItem("backup_cart_data", JSON.stringify(s));
                    const le = await Ie("POST", "/api/orders/local", de);
                    if (le.ok) {
                        const me = await le.json(),
                            ve = {
                                id: me.id,
                                orderNumber: me.orderNumber,
                                amount: parseFloat(de.total),
                                currency: "EUR",
                                description: `Pedido #${me.orderNumber} - Desguace Murcia`,
                                customerEmail: de.customerEmail,
                                customerName: `${de.customerName} ${de.customerLastName}`,
                                returnUrl: `${window.location.origin}/order-confirmation/${me.id}?payment=redsys&sessionId=${se}`,
                                cancelUrl: `${window.location.origin}/checkout?error=payment_cancelled`,
                                metadata: {
                                    orderId: me.id
                                }
                            },
                            lt = await Ie("POST", "/api/payment/redsys/process", ve);
                        if (lt.ok) {
                            const dt = await lt.json();
                            if (dt.success && dt.data.formHtml) {
                                console.log("🚨 CHECKOUT DEBUG - Enviando directamente a Redsys:", {
                                    success: dt.success,
                                    hasFormHtml: !!dt.data.formHtml,
                                    actionUrl: dt.data.actionUrl,
                                    orderNumber: dt.data.orderNumber,
                                    redsysOrderNumber: dt.data.redsysOrderNumber,
                                    amount: dt.data.amount
                                });
                                const U = document.createElement("div"),
                                    De = di.sanitize(dt.data.formHtml);
                                U.innerHTML = De,
                                U.style.display = "none",
                                document.body.appendChild(U);
                                const mt = U.querySelector("form");
                                if (mt)
                                    console.log("🚨 FORM FOUND - Submitting directly to Redsys"),
                                    document.body.appendChild(mt),
                                    mt.submit();
                                else
                                    throw console.error("❌ No se encontró el formulario en el HTML generado"), new Error("Error en la configuración del pago");
                                return
                            } else
                                throw new Error("Error al procesar el pago con Redsys")
                        } else
                            throw new Error("Error al procesar el pago con Redsys")
                    } else {
                        const me = await le.json();
                        if (le.status === 400 && me.error) {
                            let ve = "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios";
                            throw me.error.includes("customerPhone") ? ve = "El teléfono es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : me.error.includes("customerName") ? ve = "El nombre es obligatorio" : me.error.includes("customerLastName") ? ve = "Los apellidos son obligatorios" : me.error.includes("customerEmail") ? ve = "El email es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : me.error.includes("shippingAddress") ? ve = "La dirección de envío es obligatoria" : me.error.includes("shippingCity") ? ve = "La ciudad es obligatoria" : me.error.includes("shippingProvince") ? ve = "La provincia es obligatoria" : me.error.includes("shippingPostalCode") ? ve = "El código postal es obligatorio" : me.error.includes("paymentMethodId") ? ve = "Debe seleccionar un método de pago" : me.error.includes("shippingMethodId") && (ve = "Debe seleccionar un método de envío"), new Error(ve)
                        }
                        throw new Error(me.error || "Error al crear el pedido")
                    }
                } else {
                    const le = await Ie("POST", "/api/orders/local", de);
                    if (le.ok) {
                        const me = await le.json(),
                            ve = by();
                        G.provider === "bank_transfer" ? (t({
                            title: "¡Pedido creado!",
                            description: `Tu pedido #${me.orderNumber} ha sido creado. Consulta los datos de transferencia en la página de confirmación.`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${me.id}?payment=bank_transfer&sessionId=${ve}`)) : G.provider === "stripe" ? (t({

                            description: `Tu pedido #${me.orderNumber} ha sido creado. Serás redirigido al pago.`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${me.id}?payment=stripe&sessionId=${ve}`)) : G.provider === "paypal" ? (t({
                            title: "¡Pedido creado!",
                            description: `Tu pedido #${me.orderNumber} ha sido creado. Serás redirigido al pago con PayPal.`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${me.id}?payment=paypal&sessionId=${ve}`)) : (t({
                            title: "¡Pedido creado!",
                            description: `Tu pedido #${me.orderNumber} ha sido creado correctamente`
                        }), r(), a(`/order-confirmation/${me.id}?sessionId=${ve}`))
                    } else {
                        const me = await le.json();
                        if (le.status === 400 && me.error) {
                            let ve = "Por favor, completa todos los campos obligatorios";
                            throw me.error.includes("customerPhone") ? ve = "El teléfono es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : me.error.includes("customerName") ? ve = "El nombre es obligatorio" : me.error.includes("customerLastName") ? ve = "Los apellidos son obligatorios" : me.error.includes("customerEmail") ? ve = "El email es obligatorio y debe tener un formato válido" : me.error.includes("shippingAddress") ? ve = "La dirección de envío es obligatoria" : me.error.includes("shippingCity") ? ve = "La ciudad es obligatoria" : me.error.includes("shippingProvince") ? ve = "La provincia es obligatoria" : me.error.includes("shippingPostalCode") ? ve = "El código postal es obligatorio" : me.error.includes("paymentMethodId") ? ve = "Debe seleccionar un método de pago" : me.error.includes("shippingMethodId") && (ve = "Debe seleccionar un método de envío"), new Error(ve)
                        }
                        throw new Error(me.error || "Error al crear el pedido")
                    }
                }
            } catch (te) {
                console.error("Error submitting order:", te),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: te instanceof Error ? te.message : "No se pudo procesar el pedido. Inténtalo de nuevo.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                g(!1)
            }
        },
        K = (T, te) => {
            R(G => ({
                ...G,
                [T]: te
            }))
        },
        re = (T, te) => {
            if (!F && (!te || te.trim().length === 0))
                return null;
            switch (T) {
            case "customerName":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "El nombre es obligatorio" : te.trim().length < 2 ? "El nombre debe tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "customerLastName":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "Los apellidos son obligatorios" : te.trim().length < 2 ? "Los apellidos deben tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "customerEmail":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "El email es obligatorio" : /^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(te) ? null : "El email debe tener un formato válido";
            case "customerPhone":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "El teléfono es obligatorio" : te.trim().length < 9 ? "El teléfono debe tener al menos 9 dígitos" : null;
            case "shippingAddress":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "La dirección es obligatoria" : te.trim().length < 5 ? "La dirección debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            case "shippingCity":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "La ciudad es obligatoria" : te.trim().length < 2 ? "La ciudad debe tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "shippingPostalCode":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "El código postal es obligatorio" : te.trim().length < 5 ? "El código postal debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            case "billingAddress":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "La dirección de facturación es obligatoria" : te.trim().length < 5 ? "La dirección debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            case "billingCity":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "La ciudad de facturación es obligatoria" : te.trim().length < 2 ? "La ciudad debe tener al menos 2 caracteres" : null;
            case "billingPostalCode":
                return !te || te.trim().length === 0 ? "El código postal de facturación es obligatorio" : te.trim().length < 5 ? "El código postal debe tener al menos 5 caracteres" : null;
            default:
                return null
            }
        },
        ye = () => {
            const T = ["customerName", "customerLastName", "customerEmail", "customerPhone", "shippingAddress", "shippingCity", "shippingProvince", "shippingPostalCode"];
            return S.useSameAddress || T.push("billingAddress", "billingCity", "billingProvince", "billingPostalCode"), T.every(te => {
                const G = S[te];
                return G && typeof G == "string" && G.trim().length > 0 && !re(te, G)
            }) && S.paymentMethodId && S.shippingMethodId
        },
        Se = async T => {
            T.preventDefault(),
            W(!0);
            try {
                const te = await Ie("POST", "/api/auth/login", {
                    email: w,
                    password: k
                });
                if (te.ok) {
                    const G = await te.json();
                    t({
                        title: "¡Bienvenido!",
                        description: `Has iniciado sesión como ${G.firstName || w}`
                    }),
                    G.firstName && G.lastName && R(se => ({
                        ...se,
                        customerName: G.firstName,
                        customerLastName: G.lastName,
                        customerEmail: G.email || w,
                        customerPhone: G.phone || "",
                        shippingAddress: G.address || "",
                        shippingCity: G.city || "",
                        shippingPostalCode: G.postalCode || "",
                        billingAddress: G.billingAddress || G.address || "",
                        billingCity: G.billingCity || G.city || "",
                        billingProvince: G.billingProvince || G.province || "",
                        billingPostalCode: G.billingPostalCode || G.postalCode || "",
                        useSameAddress: !G.billingAddress
                    })),
                    N("guest")
                } else {
                    const G = await te.json();
                    throw new Error(G.error || "Error en el inicio de sesión")
                }
            } catch (te) {
                console.error("Error logging in:", te),
                t({
                    title: "Error",
                    description: te instanceof Error ? te.message : "No se pudo iniciar sesión. Verifica tus credenciales.",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            } finally {
                W(!1)
            }
        };
    return m ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: e.jsx("div", {
            className: "text-center",
            children: "Cargando opciones de pago y envío..."
        })
    }) : s.length === 0 ? e.jsx("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: e.jsx($, {
            children: e.jsxs(V, {
                className: "p-8 text-center",
                children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                    className: "text-2xl font-bold mb-4",
                    children: "Carrito vacío"
                }), e.jsx("p", {
                    className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                    children: "Añade productos a tu carrito para proceder con la compra"
                }), e.jsx(M, {
                    onClick: () => a("/parts"),
                    children: "Ver productos"
                })]
            })
        })
    }) : e.jsx("div", {
        className: "container mx-auto px-4 py-8",
        children: e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8",
            children: [e.jsx("div", {
                className: "lg:col-span-2",
                children: e.jsxs(ls, {
                    value: b,
                    onValueChange: N,
                    className: "w-full",
                    children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                        className: `grid w-full ${L ? "grid-cols-3" : "grid-cols-2"}`,
                        children: [e.jsxs(Ve, {
                            value: "guest",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(K5, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                            }), "Comprar como invitado"]
                        }), !L && e.jsxs(Ve, {
                            value: "login",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(nw, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                            }), "Iniciar sesión"]
                        }), L && e.jsxs(Ve, {
                            value: "authenticated",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(ao, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                            }), "Usar mis datos"]
                        }), L && (z == null ? void 0 : z.isAdmin) && e.jsxs(Ve, {
                            value: "admin",
                            className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                            children: [e.jsx(Lr, {
                                className: "w-4 h-4"
                            }), "Pedido administrativo"]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(ze, {
                        value: "login",
                        className: "mt-6",
                        children: e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(nw, {
                                        className: "w-5 h-5"
                                    }), "Iniciar sesión"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                children: [e.jsxs("form", {
                                    onSubmit: Se,
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                            htmlFor: "loginEmail",
                                            children: "Email *"
                                        }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                            id: "loginEmail",
                                            type: "email",
                                            value: w,
                                            onChange: T => C(T.target.value),
                                            required: !0,
                                            placeholder: "tu@email.com"
                                        })]

            color: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border-blue-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Rt, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Tu pedido ha sido verificado"
        },
        embalado: {
            label: "Embalado",
            color: "bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 border-purple-200",
            icon: e.jsx(At, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Tu pedido está embalado"
        },
        enviado: {
            label: "Enviado",
            color: "bg-indigo-100 text-indigo-800 border-indigo-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Ws, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Tu pedido ha sido enviado"
        },
        incidencia: {
            label: "Incidencia",
            color: "bg-red-100 text-red-800 border-red-200",
            icon: e.jsx(_s, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Hay una incidencia con tu pedido"
        }
    },
    bG = {
        pending: {
            label: "Pendiente",
            color: "bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 border-yellow-200",
            icon: e.jsx(bl, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Tu pedido está pendiente de verificación"
        },
        processing: {
            label: "En Proceso",
            color: "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border-blue-200",
            icon: e.jsx(At, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Tu pedido está siendo procesado"
        },
        shipped: {
            label: "Enviado",
            color: "bg-purple-100 text-purple-800 border-purple-200",
            icon: e.jsx(Ws, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Tu pedido ha sido enviado"
        },
        delivered: {
            label: "Entregado",
            color: "bg-green-100 text-green-800 border-green-200",
            icon: e.jsx(At, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Tu pedido ha sido entregado"
        },
        cancelled: {
            label: "Cancelado",
            color: "bg-red-100 text-red-800 border-red-200",
            icon: e.jsx(_s, {
                className: "h-4 w-4"
            }),
            description: "Tu pedido ha sido cancelado"
        }
    },
    NG = () => {
        const {user: t, isLoading: s} = As(),
            r = nm(),
            [, n] = ut(),
            a = parseInt(r.id),
            {data: i, isLoading: o, error: l} = _e({
                queryKey: [`/api/orders/${a}`],
                enabled: !!(t != null && t.id) && !isNaN(a)
            });
        if (s)
            return e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
                children: [e.jsx(Cs, {
                    className: "h-10 w-48 mb-6"
                }), e.jsxs($, {
                    children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                        children: e.jsx(Cs, {
                            className: "h-7 w-36"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(V, {
                        children: e.jsx(Cs, {
                            className: "h-64 w-full"
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            });
        if (!t)
            return e.jsx("div", {
                className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "text-center py-10",
                    children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-4",
                        children: "Acceso no autorizado"
                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                        className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                        children: "Debes iniciar sesión para ver los detalles de tu pedido."
                    }), e.jsx(M, {
                        onClick: () => n("/login"),
                        children: "Iniciar Sesión"
                    })]
                })
            });
        if (o)
            return e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center mb-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        onClick: () => n("/pedidos"),
                        className: "mr-4",
                        children: [e.jsx(Nr, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                        }), " Volver"]
                    }), e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                        children: "Detalles del Pedido"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    className: "mb-6",
                    children: e.jsx(V, {
                        className: "pt-6",
                        children: e.jsx(Cs, {
                            className: "h-64 w-full"
                        })
                    })
                })]
            });
        if (l || !i)
            return e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex items-center mb-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        onClick: () => n("/pedidos"),
                        className: "mr-4",
                        children: [e.jsx(Nr, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                        }), " Volver"]
                    }), e.jsx("h1", {
                        className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                        children: "Detalles del Pedido"
                    })]
                }), e.jsx($, {
                    children: e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "flex flex-col items-center py-10",
                        children: [e.jsx(_s, {
                            className: "h-12 w-12 text-red-500 mb-4"
                        }), e.jsx("h2", {
                            className: "text-xl font-semibold mb-2",
                            children: "Error al cargar el pedido"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-600 mb-6",
                            children: "No se pudieron cargar los detalles del pedido. Por favor, intenta de nuevo más tarde."
                        }), e.jsx(M, {
                            onClick: () => window.location.reload(),
                            children: "Reintentar"
                        })]
                    })
                })]
            });
        const c = H1[i.paymentStatus] || H1.pendiente,
            d = W1[i.orderStatus] || bG[i.status] || W1.pendiente_verificar;
        return e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "container max-w-4xl mx-auto px-4 py-8",
            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex items-center mb-6",
                children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                    variant: "ghost",
                    size: "sm",
                    onClick: () => n("/pedidos"),
                    className: "mr-4",
                    children: [e.jsx(Nr, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 mr-2"
                    }), " Volver"]
                }), e.jsxs("h1", {
                    className: "text-3xl font-bold",
                    children: ["Pedido #", i.id]
                })]
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6 mb-6",
                children: [e.jsx($, {
                    children: e.jsxs(V, {
                        className: "pt-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(bl, {
                                className: "h-5 w-5 mr-2 text-gray-500"
                            }), e.jsx("h3", {
                                className: "font-semibold",
                                children: "Fecha del Pedido"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            children: Bt(new Date(i.createdAt), "PPP", {
                                locale: ks
                            })
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-sm text-gray-500",
                            children: Bt(new Date(i.createdAt), "p", {
                                locale: ks
                            })
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx($, {

                        className: "pt-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex items-center mb-4",
                            children: [e.jsx(At, {

                                children: "Total del Pedido"
                            })]
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                            children: jt(i.total, !1)
                        }), e.jsx("p", {

                            children: "IVA incluido"
                        })]
                    })
                }), e.jsx($, {

                            })]

                                })]
                            })]

                                children: d.description
                            })]

                    })

                        })]
                    })]

                        })

                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            children: i.shippingCountry
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            }), (i.transportAgency || i.expeditionNumber || i.adminObservations) && e.jsxs($, {
                className: "mb-6",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                        children: [e.jsx(Ws, {
                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                        }), "Información de Transporte"]
                    })
                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                    className: "space-y-3",
                    children: [i.transportAgency && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700",
                            children: "Agencia de transporte:"
                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                            className: "text-gray-900",
                            children: i.transportAgency
                        })]
                    }), i.expeditionNumber && e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("span", {

                        })]
                    }), i.shippingCost && e.jsxs("div", {

                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            }), i.documents && i.documents.length > 0 || i.invoicePdf ? e.jsxs($, {
                className: "mb-6",

                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",

                        }), "Documentos del Pedido"]
                    })
                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                    className: "space-y-4",

                        children: [e.jsx("h4", {
                            className: "font-medium text-gray-700 mb-3",
                            children: "Documentos:"
                        }), e.jsx("div", {

                            children: i.documents.map((u, m) => e.jsxs("div", {

                            }, m))
                        })]

                                    className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2 text-blue-500"
                                }), e.jsx("span", {

                                })]

                                size: "sm",

                                children: [e.jsx(Or, {
                                    className: "w-4 h-4 mr-1"
                                }), "Descargar"]
                            })]
                        })]
                    })]
                })]
            }) : null, e.jsxs($, {
                className: "mb-6",
                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                        children: "Artículos del Pedido"
                    })
                }), e.jsx(V, {
                    children: i.items && i.items.length > 0 ? e.jsxs("div", {
                        className: "space-y-4",

                            className: "flex items-start justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",

                                className: "flex-1",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2 mb-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(At, {
                                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                                    }), e.jsx("h4", {
                                        className: "font-semibold",
                                        children: u.partName
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-1 text-sm text-gray-600",

                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {

                                            children: "Familia:"
                                        }), " ", u.partFamily]
                                    }), u.partReference && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Referencia:"
                                        }), " ", u.partReference]
                                    }), (u.vehicleBrand || u.vehicleModel) && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {

                                            children: "Vehículo:"
                                        }), u.vehicleBrand && ` ${u.vehicleBrand}`, u.vehicleModel && ` ${u.vehicleModel}`, u.vehicleYear && ` (${u.vehicleYear})`]
                                    }), u.vehicleVersion && e.jsxs("p", {
                                        children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                            className: "font-medium",
                                            children: "Versión:"
                                        }), " ", u.vehicleVersion]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs("div", {

                                }), e.jsxs("p", {

                                })]
                            })]
                        }, m)), e.jsx(Ca, {
                            className: "my-4"
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "flex justify-between items-center",

                                className: "text-lg font-semibold",
                                children: "Total del Pedido:"
                            }), e.jsx("span", {
