    mY = () => {
        const [, t] = ut(),
            {toast: s} = tt(),
            {user: r, logout: n} = As(),
            [a, i] = h.useState({
                vehiclesIncremental: !1,
                vehiclesComplete: !1,
                partsIncremental: !1,
                partsComplete: !1,
                allComplete: !1,
                allIncremental: !1,
                updateCounters: !1
            }),
            [o, l] = h.useState([]),
            [c, d] = h.useState({
                type: "vehicles",
                frequency: "12h",
                active: !0,
                isFullImport: !1,
                days: ["monday", "tuesday", "wednesday", "thursday", "friday"]
            }),
            [u, m] = h.useState(null),
            [f, y] = h.useState({
                fromDate: void 0,
                fullImport: !1,
                batchSize: 1e3,
                autoRecovery: !0
            }),
            [g, x] = h.useState([]),
            [j, v] = h.useState(!0),
            [p, b] = h.useState(!0),
            [N, w] = h.useState("import");
        h.useState(!1),
        h.useState(null);
        const {data: C, isLoading: k, refetch: P} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/import/history"],
                queryFn: () => ss.getHistory(20),
                refetchInterval: p ? 5e3 : !1
            }),
            {data: D, isLoading: W, refetch: L} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/import/schedule"],
                queryFn: () => ss.getSchedules(),
                refetchInterval: p ? 1e4 : !1
            }),
            {data: I, refetch: z, error: H} = _e({
                queryKey: ["/api/import/stats"],
                queryFn: () => ss.getImportStats(),
                refetchInterval: p ? 3e4 : !1,
                retry: 3,
                retryDelay: G => Math.min(1e3 * 2 ** G, 3e4)
            });
        h.useEffect(() => {
            D && l(D)
        }, [D]),
        h.useEffect(() => {
            if (!C)
                return;
            const G = C.some(se => se.status === "in_progress" || se.status === "processing");
            v(G),
            x(C.filter(se => se.status === "in_progress" || se.status === "processing"))
        }, [C]);
        const F = async () => {
                try {
                    await n(),
                    t("/admin")
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al cerrar sesión:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo cerrar la sesión",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            A = async (G, se=!1) => {
                try {
                    const de = S(G, se);
                    i(ve => ({
                        ...ve,
                        [de]: !0
                    }));
                    const le = {
                        fromDate: !se && f.fromDate ? Bt(f.fromDate, "yyyy-MM-dd") : void 0,
                        fullImport: se,
                        batchSize: f.batchSize,
                        autoRecovery: f.autoRecovery
                    };
                    await ss.startOptimizedImport(G, le),
                    s({
                        title: "Importación iniciada",
                        description: `La importación ${se ? "completa" : "incremental"} de ${G === "vehicles" ? "vehículos" : G === "parts" ? "piezas" : "vehículos y piezas"} ha comenzado`
                    }),
                    w("monitor"),
                    P(),
                    z()
                } catch (de) {
                    console.error("Error al iniciar importación:", de),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo iniciar la importación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        const de = S(G, se);
                        i(le => ({
                            ...le,
                            [de]: !1
                        }))
                    }, 2e3)
                }
            },
            S = (G, se) => G === "vehicles" ? se ? "vehiclesComplete" : "vehiclesIncremental" : G === "parts" ? se ? "partsComplete" : "partsIncremental" : se ? "allComplete" : "allIncremental",
            R = async () => {
                try {
                    i(de => ({
                        ...de,
                        updateCounters: !0
                    }));
                    const G = await fetch("/api/import/update-vehicle-counters", {
                        method: "POST",
                        headers: {
                            "Content-Type": "application/json"
                        },
                        credentials: "include"
                    });
                    if (!G.ok)
                        throw new Error("Error al actualizar contadores");
                    const se = await G.json();
                    s({
                        title: "Contadores actualizados",
                        description: "Los contadores de piezas en vehículos se han actualizado correctamente"
                    }),
                    z(),
                    P()
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al actualizar contadores:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudieron actualizar los contadores de piezas",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                } finally {
                    i(G => ({
                        ...G,
                        updateCounters: !1
                    }))
                }
            },
            B = async () => {
                try {
                    await ss.createSchedule(c);
                    const G = c.isFullImport ? "completa" : "incremental";
                    s({
                        title: "Programación creada",
                        description: `Importación ${G} de ${c.type} programada cada ${c.frequency}`
                    }),
                    L(),
                    d({
                        type: "vehicles",
                        frequency: "12h",
                        active: !0,
                        isFullImport: !1,
                        days: ["monday", "tuesday", "wednesday", "thursday", "friday"]
                    })
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al programar importación:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo programar la importación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            oe = async (G, se) => {
                try {
                    await ss.updateScheduleConfig(G, se),
                    s({
                        title: "Programación actualizada",
                        description: "La programación ha sido actualizada correctamente"
                    }),
                    L(),
                    m(null)
                } catch (de) {
                    console.error("Error al actualizar programación:", de),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar la programación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            O = G => {
                m(G)
            },
            E = () => {
                m(null)
            },
            K = async (G, se) => {
                try {
                    if (console.log(`Ejecutando acción ${se} para importación ID: ${G}`), se === "pause")
                        await ss.pauseImportOperation(G);
                    else if (se === "resume")
                        await ss.resumeImportOperation(G);
                    else if (se === "cancel")
                        await ss.cancelImportOperation(G);
                    else if (se === "delete") {
                        const le = await ss.deleteImportFromHistory(G);
                        console.log("Resultado de eliminación:", le)
                    }
                    const de = {
                        pause: "pausada",
                        resume: "reanudada",
                        cancel: "cancelada",
                        delete: "eliminada"
                    }[se];
                    s({
                        title: "Importación " + de,
                        description: `La importación ha sido ${de} correctamente`
                    }),
                    P()
                } catch (de) {
                    console.error(`Error al ${se} importación:`, de),
                    console.error("Error details:", de),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: de instanceof Error ? de.message : `No se pudo ${se} la importación`,
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            re = async () => {
                try {
                    await ss.deleteAllImportHistory(),
                    s({
                        title: "Historial eliminado",
                        description: "Todo el historial de importaciones ha sido eliminado correctamente"
                    }),
                    P(),
                    z()
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al eliminar historial:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar el historial de importaciones",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            ye = async () => {
                try {
                    await ss.clearImportStatistics(),
                    s({
                        title: "Estadísticas limpiadas",
                        description: "Las estadísticas de importación han sido reiniciadas"
                    }),
                    z()
                } catch (G) {
                    console.error("Error al limpiar estadísticas:", G),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudieron limpiar las estadísticas",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            Se = async (G, se) => {
                try {
                    await ss.updateScheduleConfig(G, {
                        active: se
                    }),
                    s({
                        title: se ? "Programación activada" : "Programación desactivada",
                        description: `La programación ha sido ${se ? "activada" : "desactivada"}`
                    }),
                    L()
                } catch (de) {
                    console.error("Error al actualizar programación:", de),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo actualizar la programación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            T = async G => {
                try {
                    await ss.deleteSchedule(G),
                    L(),
                    s({
                        title: "Programación eliminada",
                        description: "La programación ha sido eliminada correctamente"
                    })
                } catch (se) {
                    console.error("Error al eliminar programación:", se),
                    s({
                        title: "Error",
                        description: "No se pudo eliminar la programación",
                        variant: "destructive"
                    })
                }
            },
            te = G => {
                switch (G) {
                case "completed":
                    return e.jsx(Rt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-green-500"
                    });
                case "failed":
                    return e.jsx(Ea, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-red-500"
                    });
                case "in_progress":
                    return e.jsx(gt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-blue-500 animate-spin"
                    });
                case "paused":
                    return e.jsx(kv, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-yellow-500"
                    });
                default:
                    return e.jsx(_s, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 text-gray-500"
                    })
                }
            };
        return W ? e.jsx("div", {
            className: "flex items-center justify-center min-h-screen",
            children: e.jsx("div", {
                className: "animate-spin h-12 w-12 border-4 border-primary border-t-transparent rounded-full"
            })
        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex min-h-screen bg-gray-100",
            children: [e.jsx($s, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex-1 p-8",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center mb-8",
                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                        children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                            className: "text-3xl font-montserrat font-bold",
                            children: "Importación Optimizada"
                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                            className: "text-muted-foreground",
                            children: ["Sistema avanzado de importación y sincronización de datos", p && e.jsxs("span", {
                                className: "ml-2 inline-flex items-center text-green-600 font-medium",
                                children: [e.jsx(gt, {
                                    className: "h-3 w-3 mr-1 animate-spin"
                                }), "Actualización automática activa"]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(M, {
                        variant: "outline",
                        onClick: F,
                        children: [e.jsx(ka, {
                            className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                        }), "Cerrar sesión"]
                    })]
                }), g.length > 0 && e.jsxs(cr, {
                    className: "mb-6 border-blue-200 bg-blue-50",
                    children: [e.jsx(gt, {
                        className: "h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                    }), e.jsxs(dr, {
                        children: ["Hay ", g.length, " importación(es) en curso.", p ? " La página se actualiza automáticamente cada 5 segundos." : " Active la actualización automática en Configuración para monitoreo en tiempo real."]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs(ls, {
                    value: N,
                    onValueChange: w,
                    className: "space-y-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                        className: "grid w-full grid-cols-4",
                        children: [e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "import",
                            children: "Importación"
                        }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "schedule",
                            children: "Programación"
                        }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "monitor",
                            children: "Monitoreo"
                        }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                            value: "config",
                            children: "Configuración"
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                        value: "import",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6 mb-6",
                            children: [e.jsx(K0, {}), e.jsx(H0, {})]
                        }), e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Hs, {
                                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                                    }), "Configuración de Importación"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                            children: "Importar desde (fecha)"
                                        }), e.jsx(cb, {
                                            value: f.fromDate,
                                            onChange: G => y(se => ({
                                                ...se,
                                                fromDate: G
                                            }))
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                            children: "Tamaño de lote"
                                        }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                            value: f.batchSize.toString(),
                                            onValueChange: G => y(se => ({
                                                ...se,
                                                batchSize: parseInt(G)
                                            })),
                                            children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                            }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "500",
                                                    children: "500 elementos"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "1000",
                                                    children: "1000 elementos"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "2000",
                                                    children: "2000 elementos"
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                        id: "fullImport",
                                        checked: f.fullImport,
                                        onCheckedChange: G => y(se => ({
                                            ...se,
                                            fullImport: G
                                        }))
                                    }), e.jsx(q, {
                                        htmlFor: "fullImport",
                                        children: "Importación completa (todos los datos)"
                                    })]
                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                        id: "autoRecovery",
                                        checked: f.autoRecovery,
                                        onCheckedChange: G => y(se => ({
                                            ...se,
                                            autoRecovery: G
                                        }))
                                    }), e.jsx(q, {
                                        htmlFor: "autoRecovery",
                                        children: "Recuperación automática de errores"
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 gap-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(li, {
                                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                                        }), "Vehículos"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                                            onClick: () => A("vehicles", !1),
                                            disabled: a.vehiclesIncremental || a.vehiclesComplete,
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.vehiclesIncremental ? e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(Or, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Incremental"]
                                        }), e.jsxs(M, {
                                            onClick: () => A("vehicles", !0),
                                            disabled: a.vehiclesIncremental || a.vehiclesComplete,
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.vehiclesComplete ? e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(Or, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Completa"]
                                        })]
                                    }), (I == null ? void 0 : I.vehicles) && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: ["Total: ", I.vehicles.totalItems]
                                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: ["Nuevos: ", I.vehicles.newItems]
                                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: ["Actualizados: ", I.vehicles.updatedItems]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(li, {
                                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                                        }), "Piezas"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                                            onClick: () => A("parts", !1),
                                            disabled: a.partsIncremental || a.partsComplete,
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.partsIncremental ? e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(Or, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Incremental"]
                                        }), e.jsxs(M, {
                                            onClick: () => A("parts", !0),
                                            disabled: a.partsIncremental || a.partsComplete,
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.partsComplete ? e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(Or, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Completa"]
                                        })]
                                    }), (I == null ? void 0 : I.parts) && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: ["Total: ", I.parts.totalItems]
                                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: ["Nuevas: ", I.parts.newItems]
                                        }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                            children: ["Actualizadas: ", I.parts.updatedItems]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(li, {
                                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                                        }), "Todo"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                                            onClick: () => A("all", !1),
                                            disabled: a.allIncremental || a.allComplete,
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.allIncremental ? e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(Or, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Incremental"]
                                        }), e.jsxs(M, {
                                            onClick: () => A("all", !0),
                                            disabled: a.allIncremental || a.allComplete,
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.allComplete ? e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(Or, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Importación Completa"]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                                            children: "Importa vehículos y piezas en secuencia optimizada"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                        className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(gt, {
                                            className: "h-5 w-5"
                                        }), "Mantenimiento"]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: e.jsxs(M, {
                                            onClick: R,
                                            disabled: a.updateCounters,
                                            variant: "secondary",
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [a.updateCounters ? e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4 animate-spin"
                                            }) : e.jsx(gt, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Actualizar Contadores"]
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                        children: e.jsx("p", {
                                            children: "Actualiza los contadores de piezas en vehículos"
                                        })
                                    })]
                                })]
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                        value: "schedule",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: [e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsxs(ae, {
                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                    children: [e.jsx(Bs, {
                                        className: "h-5 w-5"
                                    }), "Nueva Programación"]
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(V, {
                                className: "space-y-4",
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                            children: "Tipo de importación"
                                        }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                            value: c.type,
                                            onValueChange: G => d(se => ({
                                                ...se,
                                                type: G
                                            })),
                                            children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                            }), e.jsxs(qe, {

                                                })]

                                            children: "Modalidad"
                                        }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                            value: c.isFullImport ? "complete" : "incremental",
                                            onValueChange: G => d(se => ({
                                                ...se,
                                                isFullImport: G === "complete"
                                            })),
                                            children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                            }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "incremental",
                                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {

                                                        }), e.jsx("span", {

                                                            children: "Últimos 7 días"
                                                        })]
                                                    })
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "complete",
                                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
