                                        }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                            value: c.frequency,
                                            onValueChange: G => d(se => ({
                                                ...se,
                                                frequency: G
                                            })),
                                            children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                            }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "1h",
                                                    children: "Cada hora"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "6h",
                                                    children: "Cada 6 horas"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "12h",
                                                    children: "Cada 12 horas"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "24h",
                                                    children: "Diariamente"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "7d",
                                                    children: "Semanalmente"
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                            children: "Hora de inicio"
                                        }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                            type: "time",
                                            value: c.startTime || "02:00",
                                            onChange: G => d(se => ({
                                                ...se,
                                                startTime: G.target.value
                                            })),
                                            className: "w-full"
                                        }), e.jsx("p", {
                                            className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                                            children: "Hora específica para iniciar las sincronizaciones programadas (formato 24h)"
                                        })]
                                    }), (c.frequency === "24h" || c.frequency === "7d") && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                            children: "Días de la semana"
                                        }), e.jsx("div", {
                                            className: "grid grid-cols-3 gap-2",
                                            children: [{
                                                value: "monday",
                                                label: "Lun"
                                            }, {
                                                value: "tuesday",
                                                label: "Mar"
                                            }, {
                                                value: "wednesday",
                                                label: "Mié"
                                            }, {
                                                value: "thursday",
                                                label: "Jue"
                                            }, {
                                                value: "friday",
                                                label: "Vie"
                                            }, {
                                                value: "saturday",
                                                label: "Sáb"
                                            }, {
                                                value: "sunday",
                                                label: "Dom"
                                            }].map(G => {
                                                var se;
                                                return e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                                    children: [e.jsx(yi, {
                                                        id: G.value,
                                                        checked: ((se = c.days) == null ? void 0 : se.includes(G.value)) || !1,
                                                        onCheckedChange: de => {
                                                            const le = c.days || [];
                                                            d(de ? {
                                                                ...c,
                                                                days: [...le, G.value]
                                                            } : {
                                                                ...c,
                                                                days: le.filter(me => me !== G.value)
                                                            })
                                                        }
                                                    }), e.jsx(q, {
                                                        htmlFor: G.value,
                                                        className: "text-sm",
                                                        children: G.label
                                                    })]
                                                }, G.value)
                                            })
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                            children: " "
                                        }), e.jsxs(M, {
                                            onClick: B,
                                            className: "w-full",
                                            children: [e.jsx(ur, {
                                                className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                            }), "Programar"]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })
                            })]
                        }), e.jsxs($, {
                            children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                    children: "Programaciones Activas"
                                })
                            }), e.jsx(V, {
                                children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [o.map(G => e.jsx("div", {
                                        className: "p-4 border rounded-lg",
                                        children: u && u.id === G.id ? e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "space-y-4",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                                    children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                        children: "Frecuencia"
                                                    }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                                        value: u.frequency,
                                                        onValueChange: se => m({
                                                            ...u,
                                                            frequency: se
                                                        }),
                                                        children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                            children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                                        }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                                            children: [e.jsx(Z, {
                                                                value: "1h",
                                                                children: "Cada hora"
                                                            }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                                value: "6h",
                                                                children: "Cada 6 horas"
                                                            }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                                value: "12h",
                                                                children: "Cada 12 horas"
                                                            }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                                value: "24h",
                                                                children: "Diariamente"
                                                            }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                                value: "7d",
                                                                children: "Semanalmente"
                                                            })]
                                                        })]
                                                    })]
                                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                                    children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                        children: "Tipo de importación"
                                                    }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                                        value: u.isFullImport ? "complete" : "incremental",
                                                        onValueChange: se => m({
                                                            ...u,
                                                            isFullImport: se === "complete"
                                                        }),
                                                        children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                            children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                                        }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                                            children: [e.jsx(Z, {
                                                                value: "incremental",
                                                                children: "Incremental"
                                                            }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                                value: "complete",
                                                                children: "Completa"
                                                            })]
                                                        })]
                                                    })]
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                                    children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                        children: "Hora de inicio"
                                                    }), e.jsx(ee, {
                                                        type: "time",
                                                        value: u.startTime || "02:00",
                                                        onChange: se => m({
                                                            ...u,
                                                            startTime: se.target.value
                                                        }),
                                                        className: "w-full"
                                                    }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                        className: "text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                                                        children: "Hora específica para iniciar las sincronizaciones programadas (formato 24h)"
                                                    })]
                                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    className: "space-y-2",
                                                    children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                        children: "Estado"
                                                    }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                                        children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                                            checked: u.active,
                                                            onCheckedChange: se => m({
                                                                ...u,
                                                                active: se
                                                            })
                                                        }), e.jsx(q, {
                                                            children: u.active ? "Activa" : "Inactiva"
                                                        })]
                                                    })]
                                                })]
                                            }), (u.frequency === "24h" || u.frequency === "7d") && e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "space-y-2",
                                                children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                                    children: "Días de la semana"
                                                }), e.jsx("div", {
                                                    className: "grid grid-cols-4 gap-2",
                                                    children: [{
                                                        value: "monday",
                                                        label: "Lun"
                                                    }, {
                                                        value: "tuesday",
                                                        label: "Mar"
                                                    }, {
                                                        value: "wednesday",
                                                        label: "Mié"
                                                    }, {
                                                        value: "thursday",
                                                        label: "Jue"
                                                    }, {
                                                        value: "friday",
                                                        label: "Vie"
                                                    }, {
                                                        value: "saturday",
                                                        label: "Sáb"
                                                    }, {
                                                        value: "sunday",
                                                        label: "Dom"
                                                    }].map(se => {
                                                        var de;
                                                        return e.jsxs("div", {
                                                            className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                                            children: [e.jsx(yi, {
                                                                id: `edit-${se.value}`,
                                                                checked: ((de = u.days) == null ? void 0 : de.includes(se.value)) || !1,
                                                                onCheckedChange: le => {
                                                                    const me = u.days || [];
                                                                    m(le ? {
                                                                        ...u,
                                                                        days: [...me, se.value]
                                                                    } : {
                                                                        ...u,
                                                                        days: me.filter(ve => ve !== se.value)
                                                                    })
                                                                }
                                                            }), e.jsx(q, {
                                                                htmlFor: `edit-${se.value}`,
                                                                className: "text-sm",
                                                                children: se.label
                                                            })]
                                                        }, se.value)
                                                    })
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                                children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                                                    onClick: () => oe(G.id, u),
                                                    className: "bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90",
                                                    children: [e.jsx(Rt, {
                                                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                                    }), "Guardar"]
                                                }), e.jsxs(M, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    onClick: E,
                                                    children: [e.jsx(Ea, {
                                                        className: "mr-2 h-4 w-4"
                                                    }), "Cancelar"]
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }) : e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "flex items-center justify-between",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex items-center gap-4",
                                                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                                    children: [te(G.active ? "completed" : "paused"), e.jsx(ge, {
                                                        variant: G.active ? "default" : "secondary",
                                                        children: G.type.toUpperCase()
                                                    }), e.jsx(ge, {
                                                        variant: G.isFullImport ? "destructive" : "outline",
                                                        children: G.isFullImport ? "Completa" : "Incremental"
                                                    })]
                                                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                    children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        className: "font-medium",
                                                        children: ["Cada ", G.frequency]
                                                    }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                                        children: [G.isFullImport ? "Todos los datos" : "Últimos 7 días", G.lastRun && ` • Última: ${new Date(G.lastRun).toLocaleString()}`, G.nextRun && ` • Próxima: ${new Date(G.nextRun).toLocaleString()}`]
                                                    }), G.days && G.days.length > 0 && e.jsxs("p", {
                                                        className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                                        children: ["Días: ", G.days.map(se => ({
                                                            monday: "Lun",
                                                            tuesday: "Mar",
                                                            wednesday: "Mié",
                                                            thursday: "Jue",
                                                            friday: "Vie",
                                                            saturday: "Sáb",
                                                            sunday: "Dom"
                                                        })[se]).join(", ")]
                                                    })]
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "flex items-center gap-2",
                                                children: [e.jsxs(M, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => O(G),
                                                    className: "text-blue-600 hover:text-blue-700",
                                                    children: [e.jsx(Hs, {
                                                        className: "h-4 w-4 mr-1"
                                                    }), "Editar"]
                                                }), e.jsx(St, {
                                                    checked: G.active,
                                                    onCheckedChange: se => Se(G.id, se)
                                                }), e.jsx(M, {
                                                    variant: "outline",
                                                    size: "sm",
                                                    onClick: () => T(G.id),
                                                    className: "text-red-600 hover:text-red-700",
                                                    children: e.jsx(Jt, {
                                                        className: "h-4 w-4"
                                                    })
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        })
                                    }, G.id)), o.length === 0 && e.jsx("p", {
                                        className: "text-center text-muted-foreground py-8",
                                        children: "No hay programaciones configuradas"
                                    })]
                                })
                            })]
                        })]
                    }), e.jsx(ze, {
                        value: "monitor",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: e.jsx(uY, {
                            importHistory: C || [],
                            onControlImport: K,
                            onDeleteAllHistory: re
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(ze, {
                        value: "config",
                        className: "space-y-6",
                        children: e.jsxs("div", {
                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                            children: [e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                        children: "Configuración del Sistema"
                                    })
                                }), e.jsxs(V, {
                                    className: "space-y-4",
                                    children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex items-center space-x-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(St, {
                                            id: "autoRefreshEnabled",
                                            checked: p,
                                            onCheckedChange: b
                                        }), e.jsxs(q, {
                                            htmlFor: "autoRefreshEnabled",
                                            children: ["Actualización automática de datos", e.jsx("span", {
                                                className: "block text-xs text-muted-foreground",
                                                children: "Actualiza automáticamente el historial y estado de las importaciones"
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx(Ca, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                            children: "Intervalo de actualización automática"
                                        }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                            defaultValue: "5000",
                                            children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                            }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "2000",
                                                    children: "2 segundos"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "5000",
                                                    children: "5 segundos"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "10000",
                                                    children: "10 segundos"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "30000",
                                                    children: "30 segundos"
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    }), e.jsx(Ca, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-2",
                                        children: [e.jsx(q, {
                                            children: "Tiempo límite de importación"
                                        }), e.jsxs(He, {
                                            defaultValue: "3600",
                                            children: [e.jsx(Ue, {
                                                children: e.jsx(We, {})
                                            }), e.jsxs(qe, {
                                                children: [e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "1800",
                                                    children: "30 minutos"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "3600",
                                                    children: "1 hora"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "7200",
                                                    children: "2 horas"
                                                }), e.jsx(Z, {
                                                    value: "14400",
                                                    children: "4 horas"
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })]
                                })]
                            }), e.jsxs($, {
                                children: [e.jsx(ne, {
                                    children: e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                                        children: [e.jsx(ae, {
                                            children: "Estadísticas Generales"
                                        }), e.jsxs(M, {
                                            size: "sm",
                                            variant: "outline",
                                            onClick: ye,
                                            className: "text-orange-600 hover:text-orange-700",
                                            children: [e.jsx(Jt, {
                                                className: "h-3 w-3 mr-1"
                                            }), "Limpiar Estadísticas"]
                                        })]
                                    })
                                }), e.jsx(V, {
                                    children: I && e.jsxs("div", {
                                        className: "space-y-4",
                                        children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "grid grid-cols-2 gap-4",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "text-center",
                                                children: [e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                                                    children: I.totalImports || 0
                                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                                    children: "Importaciones totales"
                                                })]
                                            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                                                className: "text-center",
                                                children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                                    className: "text-2xl font-bold",
                                                    children: [I.successRate || 0, "%"]
                                                }), e.jsx("p", {
                                                    className: "text-sm text-muted-foreground",
                                                    children: "Tasa de éxito"
                                                })]
                                            })]
                                        }), e.jsx(Ca, {}), e.jsxs("div", {
                                            className: "space-y-2",
                                            children: [e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm",
                                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                    className: "font-medium",
                                                    children: "Última importación:"
                                                }), " ", I.lastImport ? new Date(I.lastImport).toLocaleString() : "Nunca"]
                                            }), e.jsxs("p", {
                                                className: "text-sm",
                                                children: [e.jsx("span", {
                                                    className: "font-medium",
                                                    children: "Próxima programada:"
                                                }), " ", I.nextScheduled ? new Date(I.nextScheduled).toLocaleString() : "No programada"]
                                            })]
                                        })]
                                    })
                                })]
                            })]
                        })
                    })]
                })]
            })]
        })
    };
function XM({content: t, onChange: s, placeholder: r, className: n}) {
    const a = h.useRef(null),
        [i, o] = h.useState(!1),
        [l, c] = h.useState(t);
    h.useEffect(() => {
        if (c(t), a.current && a.current.innerHTML !== t) {
            const p = di.sanitize(t, {
                ALLOWED_TAGS: ["p", "br", "strong", "em", "u", "h1", "h2", "h3", "h4", "h5", "h6", "ul", "ol", "li", "a", "img", "div"],
                ALLOWED_ATTR: ["href", "target", "rel", "src", "alt", "style", "class"],
                ALLOWED_URI_REGEXP: /^(?:(?:(?:f|ht)tps?|mailto|tel|callto|cid|xmpp|data):|[^a-z]|[a-z+.\-]+(?:[^a-z+.\-:]|$))/i
            });
            a.current.innerHTML = p
        }
    }, [t]);
    const d = () => {
            if (a.current) {
                const p = a.current.innerHTML;
                c(p),
                s(p)
            }
        },
        u = p => {
            if (c(p), s(p), a.current) {
                const b = di.sanitize(p, {
                    ALLOWED_TAGS: ["p", "br", "strong", "em", "u", "h1", "h2", "h3", "h4", "h5", "h6", "ul", "ol", "li", "a", "img", "div"],
                    ALLOWED_ATTR: ["href", "target", "rel", "src", "alt", "style", "class"],
                    ALLOWED_URI_REGEXP: /^(?:(?:(?:f|ht)tps?|mailto|tel|callto|cid|xmpp|data):|[^a-z]|[a-z+.\-]+(?:[^a-z+.\-:]|$))/i
                });
                a.current.innerHTML = b
            }
        },
        m = (p, b) => {
            var N;
            try {
                document.queryCommandSupported && document.queryCommandSupported(p) ? document.execCommand(p, !1, b) : f(p, b)
            } catch (w) {
                console.warn("Error executing command:", p, w),
                f(p, b)
            }
            (N = a.current) == null || N.focus(),
            d()
        },
        f = (p, b) => {
            if (!a.current)
                return;
            const N = window.getSelection();
            if (!N || N.rangeCount === 0)
                return;
            const w = N.getRangeAt(0);
            switch (p) {
            case "bold":
                y("strong");
                break;
            case "italic":
                y("em");
                break;
            case "underline":
                y("u");
                break;
            case "createLink":
                if (b) {
                    const C = document.createElement("a");
                    C.href = b,
                    C.target = "_blank",
                    C.rel = "noopener noreferrer";
                    try {
                        w.surroundContents(C)
                    } catch {
                        w.deleteContents(),
                        w.insertNode(C)
                    }
                }
                break;
            case "insertImage":
                if (b) {
                    const C = document.createElement("img");
                    C.src = b,
                    C.style.maxWidth = "100%",
                    C.style.height = "auto",
                    w.insertNode(C)
                }
                break;
            case "insertUnorderedList":
                g("ul");
                break;
            default:
                if (p.startsWith("justify")) {
                    const C = p.replace("justify", "").toLowerCase(),
                        k = document.createElement("div");
                    k.style.textAlign = C === "left" ? "left" : C === "center" ? "center" : "right";
                    try {
                        w.surroundContents(k)
                    } catch {
                        w.deleteContents(),
                        w.insertNode(k)
                    }
                }
                break
            }
        },
        y = p => {
            const b = window.getSelection();
            if (!b || b.rangeCount === 0)
                return;
            const N = b.getRangeAt(0),
                w = N.toString();
            if (w) {
                const C = document.createElement(p);
                C.textContent = w,
                N.deleteContents(),
                N.insertNode(C)
            }
        },
        g = p => {
            const b = window.getSelection();
            if (!b || b.rangeCount === 0)
                return;
            const N = b.getRangeAt(0),
                w = N.toString();
            if (w) {
                const C = document.createElement(p),
                    k = document.createElement("li");
                k.textContent = w,
                C.appendChild(k),
                N.deleteContents(),
                N.insertNode(C)
            }
        },
        x = () => {
            const p = prompt("Ingrese la URL:");
            p && m("createLink", p)
        },
        j = () => {
            const p = prompt("Ingrese la URL de la imagen:");
            p && m("insertImage", p)
        },
        v = [{
            icon: v5,
            command: "bold",
            title: "Negrita"
        }, {
            icon: I5,
            command: "italic",
            title: "Cursiva"
        }, {
            icon: G5,
            command: "underline",
            title: "Subrayado"
        }, {
            icon: f5,
            command: "justifyLeft",
            title: "Alinear izquierda"
        }, {
            icon: h5,
            command: "justifyCenter",
            title: "Centrar"
        }, {
            icon: p5,
            command: "justifyRight",
            title: "Alinear derecha"
        }, {
            icon: wp,
            command: "insertUnorderedList",
            title: "Lista"
        }];
    return e.jsx("div", {
        className: ue("border rounded-lg overflow-hidden", n),
        children: e.jsxs(ls, {
            defaultValue: "visual",
            className: "w-full",
            children: [e.jsxs(es, {
                className: "grid w-full grid-cols-2",
                children: [e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "visual",
                    children: "Editor Visual"
                }), e.jsx(Ve, {
                    value: "html",
                    children: "Código HTML"
                })]
            }), e.jsxs(ze, {
                value: "visual",
                className: "m-0",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "border-b bg-gray-50 p-2 flex flex-wrap gap-1",
                    children: [v.map(p => e.jsx(M, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        className: "h-8 w-8 p-0",
                        onClick: () => m(p.command),
                        title: p.title,
                        type: "button",
                        children: e.jsx(p.icon, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    }, p.command)), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "w-px h-6 bg-gray-300 mx-1"
                    }), e.jsx(M, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        className: "h-8 w-8 p-0",
                        onClick: x,
                        title: "Insertar enlace",
                        type: "button",
                        children: e.jsx(D5, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx(M, {
                        variant: "ghost",
                        size: "sm",
                        className: "h-8 w-8 p-0",
                        onClick: j,
                        title: "Insertar imagen",
                        type: "button",
                        children: e.jsx(qs, {
                            className: "h-4 w-4"
                        })
                    }), e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "w-px h-6 bg-gray-300 mx-1"
                    }), e.jsxs("select", {
                        onChange: p => m("formatBlock", p.target.value),
                        className: "h-8 px-2 text-sm border rounded",
                        defaultValue: "",
                        children: [e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "",
                            children: "Formato"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "h1",
                            children: "Título 1"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "h2",
                            children: "Título 2"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "h3",
                            children: "Título 3"
                        }), e.jsx("option", {
                            value: "p",
                            children: "Párrafo"
                        })]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "relative",
                    children: [e.jsx("div", {
                        ref: a,
                        contentEditable: !0,
                        onInput: d,
                        onFocus: () => o(!0),
                        onBlur: () => o(!1),
                        className: ue("min-h-[300px] p-4 outline-none prose prose-sm max-w-none", "focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:ring-inset", !t && !i && "text-gray-400"),
                        style: {
                            whiteSpace: "pre-wrap",
                            wordWrap: "break-word"
                        },
                        suppressContentEditableWarning: !0
                    }), !t && !i && e.jsx("div", {
                        className: "absolute top-4 left-4 text-gray-400 pointer-events-none",
                        children: r || "Escriba el contenido aquí..."
                    })]
                })]
            }), e.jsx(ze, {
                value: "html",
                className: "m-0",
                children: e.jsx(Ut, {
                    value: l,
                    onChange: p => u(p.target.value),
                    placeholder: "Ingrese el código HTML aquí...",
                    className: "min-h-[400px] font-mono text-sm border-0 rounded-none resize-none"
                })
            })]
        })
    })
}
function hY() {
    const [t, s] = h.useState("pages"),
        [r, n] = h.useState(null),
        [a, i] = h.useState(null),
        [o, l] = h.useState({}),
        [c, d] = h.useState({}),
        [u, m] = h.useState(!1),
        [f, y] = h.useState(!1),
        {toast: g} = tt(),
        x = fr(),
        {data: j, isLoading: v} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const I = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/pages", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!I.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar páginas");
                return I.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: p, isLoading: b} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const I = await fetch("/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!I.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar bloques");
                return I.json()
            }
        }),
        {data: N, isLoading: w, error: C} = _e({
            queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"],
            queryFn: async () => {
                const I = await fetch("/api/cms/site-settings", {
                    credentials: "include"
                });
                if (!I.ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al cargar configuraciones");
                return I.json()
            }
        }),
        k = async () => {
            try {
                const I = r ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    z = r ? `/api/admin/cms/pages/${r.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/pages";
                if (!(await fetch(z, {
                    method: I,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify(o)
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al guardar página");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"]
                }),
                n(null),
                l({}),
                m(!1),
                g({
                    title: r ? "Página actualizada exitosamente" : "Página creada exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al guardar página",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        P = async I => {
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/admin/cms/pages/${I}`, {
                    method: "DELETE",
                    credentials: "include"
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al eliminar página");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/pages"]
                }),
                g({
                    title: "Página eliminada exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al eliminar página",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        D = async () => {
            try {
                const I = a ? "PUT" : "POST",
                    z = a ? `/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks/${a.id}` : "/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks";
                if (!(await fetch(z, {
                    method: I,
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify(c)
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al guardar bloque");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"]
                }),
                i(null),
                d({}),
                y(!1),
                g({
                    title: a ? "Bloque actualizado exitosamente" : "Bloque creado exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al guardar bloque",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        W = async I => {
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks/${I}`, {
                    method: "DELETE",
                    credentials: "include"
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al eliminar bloque");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/admin/cms/footer-blocks"]
                }),
                g({
                    title: "Bloque eliminado exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al eliminar bloque",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        },
        L = async (I, z) => {
            try {
                if (!(await fetch(`/api/cms/site-settings/${I}`, {
                    method: "PUT",
                    headers: {
                        "Content-Type": "application/json"
                    },
                    credentials: "include",
                    body: JSON.stringify({
                        value: z
                    })
                })).ok)
                    throw new Error("Error al actualizar configuración");
                x.invalidateQueries({
                    queryKey: ["/api/cms/site-settings"]
                }),
                g({
                    title: "Configuración actualizada exitosamente"
                })
            } catch {
                g({
                    title: "Error al actualizar configuración",
                    variant: "destructive"
                })
            }
        };
    return e.jsxs("div", {
        className: "flex min-h-screen bg-background",
        children: [e.jsx($s, {
            activeTab: "admin_cms"
        }), e.jsxs("div", {
            className: "flex-1 p-6",
            children: [e.jsx("h1", {
                className: "text-3xl font-bold mb-8",
                children: "Sistema de Gestión de Contenido"
            }), e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "flex space-x-2 mb-6 border-b pb-4",
                children: [e.jsx(M, {
                    variant: t === "pages" ? "default" : "outline",
                    onClick: () => s("pages"),
                    children: "Páginas"
                }), e.jsx(M, {
                    variant: t === "footer" ? "default" : "outline",
                    onClick: () => s("footer"),
                    children: "Footer"
                }), e.jsx(M, {
                    variant: t === "settings" ? "default" : "outline",
                    onClick: () => s("settings"),
                    children: "Configuraciones"
                })]
            }), t === "pages" && e.jsxs("div", {
                className: "space-y-6",
                children: [e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "flex justify-between items-center",
                    children: [e.jsx("h2", {
                        className: "text-2xl font-semibold",
                        children: "Gestión de Páginas"
                    }), e.jsxs(M, {
                        onClick: () => {
                            m(!0),
                            l({
                                title: "",
                                slug: "",
                                content: "",
                                metaDescription: "",
                                isPublished: !0,
                                isEditable: !0,
                                pageType: "static"
                            })
                        },
                        children: [e.jsx(on, {
                            className: "w-4 h-4 mr-2"
                        }), "Nueva Página"]
                    })]
                }), e.jsxs("div", {
                    className: "grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-2 gap-6",
                    children: [e.jsxs($, {

                            children: e.jsx(ae, {
                                children: "Páginas Existentes"
                            })
                        }), e.jsx(V, {

                                children: "Cargando páginas..."
                            }) : j == null ? void 0 : j.map(I => e.jsxs("div", {
                                className: "flex items-center justify-between p-4 border rounded-lg",

                            }, I.id))
                        })]

                                className: "w-5 h-5"
                            }), "Configuración de Formularios"]

                            className: "grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-4",

                                            children: I.description || I.key
                                        })
                                    }), e.jsx(ge, {

                                    })]

                                    type: "email",
                                    defaultValue: I.value,
